atk-vin02a3:11_0: 1. Cūḷavaggassa paṭhame kammakkhandhake tāva paṇḍukalohitakāti paṇḍuko ceva lohitako
atk-vin02a3:11_1: cāti chabbaggiyesu dve janā; tesaṃ nissitakāpi paṇḍukalohitakātveva paññāyanti. Balavābalavaṃ
atk-vin02a3:14_0: 4. Asammukhā katantiādīsu saṅghadhammavinayapuggalasammukhānaṃ vinā kataṃ, cuditakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:14_1: appaṭipucchitvā kataṃ, tasseva appaṭiññāya kataṃ. Adesanāgāminiyāti pārājikāpattiyā
atk-vin02a3:14_2: vā saṅghādisesāpattiyā vā. Ettha purimakesu tīsu tikesu nava padā adhammenakataṃ
atk-vin02a3:14_3: vaggenakatanti imehi saddhiṃ ekekaṃ gahetvā nava tikā vuttā. Evaṃ sabbepi dvādasa
atk-vin02a3:14_4: tikā honti. Paṭipakkhavasena sukkapakkhesupi eteyeva dvādasa tikā vuttā.
atk-vin02a3:15: 6. Ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehīti pabbajitānaṃ ananucchavikehi sahasokitādīhi gihisaṃsaggehi.
atk-vin02a3:16_0: Tiṇṇaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnantiādi ekekenāpi aṅgena tajjanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
atk-vin02a3:16_1: dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tajjanīyassa hi visesena bhaṇḍanakārakattaṃ aṅgaṃ, niyassassa
atk-vin02a3:16_2: abhiṇhāpattikattaṃ, pabbājanīyassa kuladūsakattaṃ vuttaṃ. Imesu pana tīsu aṅgesu
atk-vin02a3:16_3: yena kenaci sabbānipi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Yadi evaṃ yaṃ campeyyakkhandhake vuttaṃ – “tajjanīyakammārahassa
atk-vin02a3:16_4: niyassakammaṃ karoti…pe… upasampadārahaṃ abbheti; evaṃ kho upāli adhammakammaṃ hoti
atk-vin02a3:16_5: avinayakammaṃ, evañca pana saṅgho sātisāro hotī”ti idaṃ virujjhatīti. Idañca na virujjhati.
atk-vin02a3:16_6: Kasmā? Vacanatthanānattato, “tajjanīyakammārahassā”ti imassa hi vacanassa kammasanniṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:16_7: attho. “Tiṇṇaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādivacanassa aṅgasambhavo, tasmā yadā saṅghena sannipatitvā
atk-vin02a3:16_8: “idaṃ nāma imassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ karomā”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ hoti, tadā kammāraho
atk-vin02a3:16_9: nāma hoti. Tassa iminā lakkhaṇena tajjanīyādikammārahassa niyassakammādikaraṇaṃ adhammakammañceva
atk-vin02a3:16_10: avinayakammañcāti veditabbaṃ. Yassa pana bhaṇḍanakārakādīsu aṅgesu aññataraṃ aṅgaṃ
atk-vin02a3:16_11: atthi, tassa ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho yathānuññātesu aṅgesu ca kammesu ca yena kenaci aṅgena
atk-vin02a3:16_12: yaṃkiñci kammaṃ vavatthapetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ kammārahaṃ katvā kammaṃ kareyya. Ayamettha
atk-vin02a3:17_0: Tattha kiñcāpi tajjanīyakamme bhaṇḍanakārakavasena kammavācā vuttā, atha kho bālassa
atk-vin02a3:17_1: abyattassa āpattibahulassa tajjanīyakammaṃ karontena bālaabyattavaseneva kammavācā
atk-vin02a3:17_2: kātabbā. Evañhi bhūtena vatthunā kataṃ kammaṃ hoti, na ca aññassa kammassa vatthunā.
atk-vin02a3:17_3: Kasmā? Yasmā idampi anuññātanti. Esa nayo sabbattha. Aṭṭhārasa sammāvattanavatthūni
atk-vin02a3:20_0: 8. Lomaṃ pātentīti pannalomā honti; bhikkhū anuvattantīti attho. Netthāraṃ vattantīti
atk-vin02a3:20_1: nittharantānaṃ etanti netthāraṃ; yena sakkā nissāraṇā nittharituṃ, taṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:20_2: sammāvattanaṃ vattantīti attho. Kittakaṃ kālaṃ vattaṃ pūretabbanti? Dasa vā pañca
atk-vin02a3:20_3: vā divasāni. Imasmiñhi kammakkhandhake ettakena vattaṃ pūritameva hoti.
atk-vin02a3:23: 11. Seyyasakavatthusmiṃ – apissu bhikkhū pakatāti apissu bhikkhū niccaṃ byāvaṭā honti. Sesaṃ tajjanīye vuttasadisameva.
atk-vin02a3:27_0: 27. Kāyikena davenātiādīsu panettha kāyiko davo nāma kāyakīḷā vuccati. Sesapadadvayepi
atk-vin02a3:27_1: eseva nayo. Kāyiko anācāro nāma kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadavītikkamo vuccati. Sesadvayepi
atk-vin02a3:27_2: eseva nayo. Kāyikaṃ upaghātikaṃ nāma kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadassa asikkhanabhāvena
atk-vin02a3:27_3: upahananaṃ vuccati; nāsanaṃ vināsananti attho. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Kāyiko micchājīvo
atk-vin02a3:27_5: nāma gihīnaṃ sāsanasampaṭicchanārocanādīni. Kāyikavācasiko nāma tadubhayaṃ. Sesaṃ
atk-vin02a3:30_0: 33. Sudhammavatthusmiṃ pana – anapaloketvāti na āpucchitvā. Etadavocāti kiṃ te gahapati
atk-vin02a3:30_1: therānaṃ paṭiyattanti sabbaṃ vivarāpetvā disvā etaṃ avoca. Ekā ca kho idha natthi
atk-vin02a3:30_2: yadidaṃ tilasaṃguḷikāti yā ayaṃ tilasakkhalikā nāma vuccati, sā natthīti attho. Tassa
atk-vin02a3:30_3: kira gahapatino vaṃse ādimhi eko pūviyo ahosi. Tena naṃ thero jātiyā khuṃsetukāmo
atk-vin02a3:30_4: evamāha. Yadeva kiñcīti evaṃ bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ ratanaṃ pahāya kiñcideva tilasaṃguḷikāvacanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:30_5: bhāsitaṃ. Kukkuṭapotakaudāharaṇena idaṃ dasseti “yathā so neva kākavassitaṃ na kukkuṭavassitaṃ
atk-vin02a3:30_6: akāsi, evaṃ tayāpi neva bhikkhuvacanaṃ na gihivacanaṃ vutta”nti.
atk-vin02a3:34_0: 39. Aṅgasamannāgamo purimehi asadiso. Tattha yathā lābhaṃ na labhanti; evaṃ parisakkanto
atk-vin02a3:34_1: parakkamanto alābhāya parisakkati nāma. Esa nayo anatthādīsu. Tattha anatthoti atthabhaṅgo.
atk-vin02a3:34_2: Anāvāsoti tasmiṃ ṭhāne avasanaṃ. Gihīnaṃ buddhassa avaṇṇanti gihīnaṃ santike buddhassa
atk-vin02a3:34_3: avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati. Dhammikaṃ paṭissavaṃ na saccāpetīti yathā sacco hoti, evaṃ na karoti;
atk-vin02a3:34_4: vassāvāsaṃ paṭissuṇitvā na gacchati, aññaṃ vā evarūpaṃ karoti. Pañcannaṃ bhikkhavetiādi
atk-vin02a3:34_5: ekaṅgenapi kammārahabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthañceva, tajjanīye ca vuttanayameva.
atk-vin02a3:37: 46. Channavatthusmiṃ – āvāsaparamparañca bhikkhave saṃsathāti sabbāvāsesu ārocetha.
atk-vin02a3:38: 50. Bhaṇḍanakārakotiādīsu bhaṇḍanādipaccayā āpannaṃ āpattiṃ ropetvā tassā adassaneyeva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tikā vuttappakārā eva.
atk-vin02a3:39_0: 51. Sammāvattanāyaṃ panettha tecattālīsa vattāni. Tattha na anuddhaṃsetabboti na
atk-vin02a3:39_1: codetabbo. Na bhikkhu bhikkhūhīti añño bhikkhu aññehi bhikkhūhi na bhinditabbo. Na
atk-vin02a3:39_2: gihiddhajoti odātavatthāni acchinnadasapupphadasāni ca na dhāretabbāni. Na titthiyaddhajoti
atk-vin02a3:39_3: kusacīrādīni na dhāretabbāni. Na āsādetabboti na apasādetabbo. Anto vā bahi vāti
atk-vin02a3:39_4: vihārassa anto vā bahi vā. Na titthiyādipadattayaṃ uttānameva. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ pārivāsikakkhandhake
atk-vin02a3:39_5: vaṇṇayissāma. Sesaṃ tajjanīye vuttanayameva. Āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammaṃ iminā sadisameva.
atk-vin02a3:40_1: nissāya bhaṇḍanādīni karoti, tassā appaṭinissaggeyeva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sesaṃ tajjanīye
atk-vin02a3:40_2: vuttanayameva. Sammāvattanāyampi hi idha tecattālīsaṃyeva vattānīti.
atk-vin02a3:45_0: 75. Pārivāsikakkhandhake – pārivāsikāti parivāsaṃ parivasantā. Tattha catubbidho
atk-vin02a3:45_2: Tesu “yo, bhikkhave, aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:45_3: ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ, tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabbo”ti evaṃ mahākhandhake
atk-vin02a3:45_4: vutto titthiyaparivāso appaṭicchannaparivāso nāma. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ vuttameva.
atk-vin02a3:45_5: Ayaṃ pana idha anadhippeto. Sesā tayo yena saṅghādisesāpatti āpannā ceva hoti paṭicchāditā
atk-vin02a3:45_6: ca, tassa dātabbā. Tesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ samuccayakkhandhake vakkhāma. Ete pana
atk-vin02a3:45_7: idha adhippetā. Tasmā etesu yaṃkiñci parivāsaṃ parivasantā “pārivāsikā”ti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a3:46_0: Pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnanti ṭhapetvā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ avasesānaṃ antamaso mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādīnampi.
atk-vin02a3:46_1: Abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānanti yaṃ te abhivādanādiṃ karonti, taṃ sādiyanti, sampaṭicchanti;
atk-vin02a3:46_2: na paṭikkhipantīti attho. Tattha sāmīcikammanti ṭhapetvā abhivādanādīni aññassa anucchavikassa
atk-vin02a3:46_3: bījanavātadānādino ābhisamācārikassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Āsanābhihāranti āsanassa abhiharaṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:46_4: āsanaṃ gahetvā abhigamanaṃ paññāpanameva vā. Seyyābhihārepi eseva nayo. Pādodakanti
atk-vin02a3:46_6: pādaghaṃsanaṃ vā. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti saddhivihārikānampi sādiyantassa dukkaṭameva,
atk-vin02a3:46_7: tasmā te vattabbā – “ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi, mayhaṃ vattaṃ mā karotha, mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:46_8: āpucchathā”ti. Sace saddhāpabbajitā kulaputtā “tumhe, bhante, tumhākaṃ vinayakammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:46_9: karothā”ti vatvā vattaṃ karonti, gāmappavesanampi āpucchantiyeva, vāritakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a3:46_10: anāpatti. Mithu yathāvuḍḍhanti pārivāsikabhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ yo yo vuḍḍho tena
atk-vin02a3:47_0: Pañca yathāvuḍḍhanti pakatattehipi saddhiṃ vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā eva. Tasmā pātimokkhe
atk-vin02a3:47_1: uddissamāne hatthapāse nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “pāḷiyā anisīditvā
atk-vin02a3:47_2: pāḷiṃ vihāya hatthapāsaṃ amuñcantena nisīditabba”nti vuttaṃ. Pārisuddhiuposathe karīyamāne
atk-vin02a3:47_3: saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā pārisuddhiuposatho
atk-vin02a3:47_4: kātabbo. Pavāraṇāyapi saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā
atk-vin02a3:47_5: pavāretabbaṃ. Saṅghena ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā bhājīyamānaṃ vassikasāṭikampi attano pattaṭṭhāne gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:48_0: Oṇojananti vissajjanaṃ vuccati. Sace hi pārivāsikassa dve tīṇi uddesabhattādīni pāpuṇanti,
atk-vin02a3:48_1: aññā cassa puggalikabhattapaccāsā hoti, tāni paṭipāṭiyā gahetvā “bhante, heṭṭhā gāhetha,
atk-vin02a3:48_2: ajja mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsā atthi, sve gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā vissajjetabbāni. Evaṃ tāni
atk-vin02a3:48_3: punadivasesu gaṇhituṃ labhati. Punadivase sabbapaṭhamaṃ etassa dātabbanti kurundiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:48_4: vuttaṃ. Yadi pana na gaṇhāti na vissajjeti, punadivase na labhati, idaṃ oṇojanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:48_5: nāma pārivāsikasseva odissa anuññātaṃ. Kasmā? Tassa hi saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisinnassa
atk-vin02a3:48_6: bhattagge yāgukhajjakādīni pāpuṇanti vā na vā, tasmā so “bhikkhāhārena mā kilamitthā”ti
atk-vin02a3:49_0: Bhattanti āgatāgatehi vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā gahetvā gantabbaṃ vihāre saṅghassa catussālabhattaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:49_1: etaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ labhati. Pāḷiyā pana gantuṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā na labhati, tasmā pāḷito
atk-vin02a3:49_2: osakkitvā hatthapāse ṭhitena hatthaṃ pasāretvā yathā seno nipatitvā gaṇhāti, evaṃ
atk-vin02a3:49_3: gaṇhitabbaṃ. Ārāmikasamaṇuddesehi āharāpetuṃ na labhati. Sace sayameva āharanti,
atk-vin02a3:49_4: vaṭṭati. Rañño mahāpeḷabhattepi eseva nayo. Catussālabhatte pana sace oṇojanaṃ kattukāmo
atk-vin02a3:49_5: hoti, attano atthāya ukkhitte piṇḍe “ajja me bhattaṃ atthi, sve gaṇhissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:49_6: Punadivase dve piṇḍe labhatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Uddesabhattādīnipi pāḷito osakkitvāva
atk-vin02a3:49_7: gahetabbāni. Yattha pana nisīdāpetvā parivisanti, tattha sāmaṇerānaṃ jeṭṭhakena bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:50_0: 76. Idāni yā ayaṃ sammāvattanā vuttā, tattha na upasampādetabbanti upajjhāyena hutvā
atk-vin02a3:50_1: na upasampādetabbaṃ; vattaṃ nikkhipitvā pana upasampādetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ācariyena hutvāpi
atk-vin02a3:50_2: kammavācā na sāvetabbā, aññasmiṃ asati vattaṃ nikkhipitvā sāvetuṃ vaṭṭati. Na nissayoti
atk-vin02a3:50_3: āgantukānaṃ nissayo na dātabbo. Yehipi pakatiyāva nissayo gahito, te vattabbā – “ahaṃ
atk-vin02a3:50_4: vinayakammaṃ karomi, asukattherassa nāma santike nissayaṃ gaṇhatha, mayhaṃ vattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:50_5: mā karotha, mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchathā”ti. Sace evaṃ vuttepi karontiyeva, vāritakālato
atk-vin02a3:51_0: Na sāmaṇeroti añño sāmaṇero na gahetabbo. Upajjhaṃ datvā gahitasāmaṇerāpi vattabbā
atk-vin02a3:51_1: – “ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi, mayhaṃ vattaṃ mā karotha, mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchathā”ti.
atk-vin02a3:51_2: Sace evaṃ vuttepi karontiyeva, vāritakālato paṭṭhāya karontesupi anāpatti. Bhikkhunovādakasammuti
atk-vin02a3:51_3: nāma ādhipaccaṭṭhānabhūtāti paṭikkhittā, tasmā bhikkhusaṅghassa vattabbaṃ – “bhante,
atk-vin02a3:51_4: ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi, bhikkhunovādakaṃ jānāthā”ti, paṭibalassa vā bhikkhussa
atk-vin02a3:51_5: bhāro kātabbo. Āgatā bhikkhuniyo “saṅghasantikaṃ gacchatha, saṅgho vo ovādadāyakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:51_6: jānissatī”ti vā “ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi, asukabhikkhussa nāma santikaṃ gacchatha,
atk-vin02a3:51_7: so vo ovādaṃ dassatī”ti vā vattabbā.
atk-vin02a3:52_0: Sā āpattīti sukkavissaṭṭhiyā parivāse dinne sukkavissaṭṭhi nāpajjitabbā. Aññā vā
atk-vin02a3:52_1: tādisikāti kāyasaṃsaggādigarukāpatti. Tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarāti pārājikāpatti; sattasu
atk-vin02a3:52_2: hi āpattīsu dubbhāsitāpatti pāpiṭṭhā; dukkaṭāpatti pāpiṭṭhatarā; dukkaṭāpatti pāpiṭṭhā,
atk-vin02a3:52_4: nayo netabbo. Tāsaṃ vatthūsupi dubbhāsitavatthu pāpiṭṭhaṃ, dukkaṭavatthu pāpiṭṭhataranti
atk-vin02a3:52_5: purimanayeneva bhedo veditabbo. Paṇṇattivajjasikkhāpade pana vatthupi āpattipi pāpiṭṭhā.
atk-vin02a3:53_0: Kammanti parivāsakammavācā vuccati. Taṃ kammaṃ “akataṃ dukkaṭa”ntiādīhi vā “kiṃ idaṃ
atk-vin02a3:53_1: kammaṃ nāma kasikammaṃ gorakkhakamma”ntiādīhi vā vacanehi na garahitabbaṃ. Kammikāti
atk-vin02a3:53_2: yehi bhikkhūhi kammaṃ kataṃ, te vuccanti, te “bālā abyattā”tiādīhi vacanehi na garahitabbā.
atk-vin02a3:53_3: Na savacanīyaṃ kātabbanti palibodhatthāya vā pakkosanatthāya vā savacanīyaṃ na kātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:53_4: palibodhatthāya hi karonto “ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ savacanīyaṃ karomi,
atk-vin02a3:53_5: imamhā āvāsā ekapadampi mā pakkāmi, yāva na taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a3:53_6: karoti. Pakkosanatthāya karonto “ahaṃ te savacanīyaṃ karomi, ehi mayā saddhiṃ vinayadharānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:53_7: sammukhībhāvaṃ gacchāmā”ti evaṃ karoti; tadubhayampi na kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:54_0: Na anuvādoti vihāre jeṭṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Pātimokkhuddesakena vā dhammajjhesakena
atk-vin02a3:54_1: vā na bhavitabbaṃ. Nāpi terasasu sammutīsu ekasammutivasenāpi issariyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:54_2: Na okāsoti “karotu me āyasmā okāsaṃ, ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ pakatattassa okāso
atk-vin02a3:54_3: na kāretabbo, vatthunā vā āpattiyā vā na codetabbo, “ayaṃ pubbe te doso”ti na sāretabbo.
atk-vin02a3:54_4: Na bhikkhūhi sampayojetabbanti aññamaññaṃ yojetvā kalaho na kāretabbo.
atk-vin02a3:55_0: Puratoti saṅghattherena hutvā purato na gantabbaṃ, dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ muñcitvā
atk-vin02a3:55_1: ekakena gantabbaṃ. Nisīdanepi eseva nayo. Āsanapariyantoti bhattaggādīsu saṅghanavakāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:55_2: vuccati; svāssa dātabbo, tattha nisīditabbaṃ. Seyyāpariyantoti seyyānaṃ pariyanto,
atk-vin02a3:55_3: sabbalāmakaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ. Ayañhi vassaggena attano pattaṭṭhāne seyyaṃ gahetuṃ na
atk-vin02a3:55_4: labhati. Sabbabhikkhūhi vicinitvā gahitāvasesā maṅkulagūthabharitā vettalatādivinaddhā
atk-vin02a3:55_5: lāmakaseyyā assa dātabbā. Vihārapariyantoti yathā ca seyyā, evaṃ vasanaāvāsopi vassaggena
atk-vin02a3:55_6: attano pattaṭṭhāne tassa na vaṭṭati. Sabbabhikkhūhi vicinitvā gahitāvasesā pana rajohatabhūmi
atk-vin02a3:55_7: jatukamūsikabharitā paṇṇasālā assa dātabbā. Sace pakatattā sabbe rukkhamūlikā abbhokāsikā
atk-vin02a3:55_8: ca honti, channaṃ na upenti, sabbepi etehi vissaṭṭhāvāsā nāma honti. Tesu yaṃ icchati,
atk-vin02a3:55_9: taṃ labhati. Vassūpanāyikadivase paccayaṃ ekapasse ṭhatvā vassaggena gaṇhituṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a3:55_10: Senāsanaṃ na labhati, nibaddhavassāvāsikaṃ senāsanaṃ gaṇhitukāmena vattaṃ nikkhipitvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:56_0: Tena ca so sāditabboti yaṃ assa āsanādipariyantaṃ bhikkhū denti, so eva sāditabbo.
atk-vin02a3:56_1: Puresamaṇena vā pacchāsamaṇena vāti ñātipavāritaṭṭhāne “ettake bhikkhū gahetvā āgacchathā”ti
atk-vin02a3:56_2: nimantitena “bhante, asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ bhikkhū nimantesi, etha tattha gacchāmā”ti
atk-vin02a3:56_3: evaṃ saṃvidhāya bhikkhū puresamaṇe vā pacchāsamaṇe vā katvā na gantabbaṃ. “Bhante,
atk-vin02a3:56_4: asukasmiṃ nāma gāme manussā bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ icchanti, sādhu vatassa sace tesaṃ
atk-vin02a3:56_5: saṅgahaṃ kareyyāthā”ti evaṃ pana pariyāyena kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:57_0: Na āraññikaṅganti āgatāgatānaṃ ārocetuṃ harāyamānena āraññikadhutaṅgaṃ na samādātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:57_1: Yenāpi pakatiyā samādinnaṃ, tena dutiyaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:57_2: na ca ekakena vatthabbaṃ. Tathā bhattaggādīsu āsanapariyante nisajjāya harāyamānena
atk-vin02a3:57_3: piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgampi na samādātabbaṃ. Yo pana pakatiyāva piṇḍapātiko tassa paṭisedho natthi.
atk-vin02a3:58_0: Na ca tappaccayāti “nīhaṭabhatto hutvā vihāreyeva nisīditvā bhuñjanto rattiyo gaṇayissāmi,
atk-vin02a3:58_1: gacchato me bhikkhuṃ disvā anārocentassa ratticchedo siyā”ti iminā kāraṇena piṇḍapāto
atk-vin02a3:58_2: na nīharāpetabbo. Mā maṃ jāniṃsūti “mā maṃ ekabhikkhupi jānātū”ti ca iminā ajjhāsayena
atk-vin02a3:58_3: vihāre sāmaṇerehi pacāpetvā bhuñjitumpi na labhati. Gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitabbameva.
atk-vin02a3:58_4: Gilānassa pana navakammaācariyupajjhāyakiccādipasutassa vā vihāreyeva acchituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:58_5: Sacepi gāme anekasatā bhikkhū vicaranti, na sakkā hoti ārocetuṃ, gāmakāvāsaṃ gantvā
atk-vin02a3:59_0: Āgantukenāti kañci vihāraṃ gatena tattha bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Sace sabbe ekaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a3:59_1: ṭhite passati, ekaṭṭhāne ṭhiteneva ārocetabbaṃ. Atha rukkhamūlādīsu visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitā
atk-vin02a3:59_2: honti, tattha tattha gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Sañcicca anārocentassa ratticchedo ca hoti,
atk-vin02a3:59_3: vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ. Atha vicinanto ekacce na passati, ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:60_0: Āgantukassāti attano vasanavihāraṃ āgatassāpi ekassa vā bahūnaṃ vā vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a3:60_1: ārocetabbaṃ. Ratticchedavattabhedāpi cettha vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Sace āgantukā
atk-vin02a3:60_2: muhuttaṃ vissamitvā vā avissamitvā eva vā vihāramajjhena gacchanti, tesampi ārocetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:60_3: Sace tassa ajānantasseva gacchanti, ayañca pana gatakāle jānāti, gantvā ārocetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:60_4: Sampāpuṇituṃ asakkontassa ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ. Yepi antovihāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:60_5: appavisitvā upacārasīmaṃ okkamitvā gacchanti, ayañca nesaṃ chattasaddaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddaṃ
atk-vin02a3:60_6: vā khipitasaddaṃ vā sutvāva āgantukabhāvaṃ jānāti, gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Gatakāle jānantenapi
atk-vin02a3:60_7: anubandhitvā ārocetabbameva. Sampāpuṇituṃ asakkontassa ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:60_8: Yopi rattiṃyeva āgantvā rattiṃyeva gacchati, sopissa ratticchedaṃ karoti, aññātattā
atk-vin02a3:60_9: pana vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ natthi. Sace ajānitvāva abbhānaṃ karoti, akatameva hotīti
atk-vin02a3:60_10: kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā adhikā rattiyo gahetvā kātabbaṃ, ayaṃ apaṇṇakapaṭipadā.
atk-vin02a3:61_0: Nadīādīsu nāvāya gacchantampi paratīre ṭhitampi ākāsena gacchantampi pabbatatalaaraññādīsu
atk-vin02a3:61_1: dūre ṭhitampi bhikkhuṃ disvā sace “bhikkhū”ti vavatthānaṃ atthi, nāvādīhi vā gantvā
atk-vin02a3:61_2: mahāsaddaṃ katvā vā vegena anubandhitvā vā ārocetabbaṃ, anārocentassa ratticchedo
atk-vin02a3:61_3: ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca. Sace vāyamantopi sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
atk-vin02a3:61_4: ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ. Saṅghasenābhayatthero pana visayāvisayena
atk-vin02a3:61_5: katheti – “visaye kira anārocentassa ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca hoti,
atk-vin02a3:61_6: avisaye pana ubhayampi natthī”ti. Karavīkatissatthero “samaṇo ayanti vavatthānameva
atk-vin02a3:61_7: pamāṇaṃ, sacepi avisayo hoti, vattabhedadukkaṭameva natthi, ratticchedo pana hotiyevā”ti āha.
atk-vin02a3:62_0: Uposatheti “uposathaṃ sampāpuṇissāmā”ti āgantukā bhikkhū āgacchanti, iddhiyā gacchantāpi
atk-vin02a3:62_1: uposathabhāvaṃ ñatvā otaritvā uposathaṃ karonti, tasmā āgantukasodhanatthaṃ uposathadivase
atk-vin02a3:62_2: ārocetabbaṃ. Pavāraṇāyapi eseva nayo. Gilānoti gantuṃ asamattho. Dūtenāti ettha anupasampannaṃ
atk-vin02a3:62_3: pesetuṃ na vaṭṭati, bhikkhuṃ pesetvā ārocāpetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:63_0: Abhikkhuko āvāsoti suññavihāro; yattha ekopi bhikkhu natthi, tattha vāsatthāya na
atk-vin02a3:63_1: gantabbaṃ. Na hi tattha vuttharattiyo gaṇanūpikā honti, pakatattena pana saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a3:63_2: vaṭṭati. Dasavidhantarāye pana sacepi rattiyo gaṇanūpikā na honti, antarāyato parimuccanatthāya
atk-vin02a3:63_3: gantabbameva. Tena vuttaṃ – “aññatra antarāyā”ti. Nānāsaṃvāsakehi saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:63_4: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tesaṃ anārocanepi ratticchedo natthi, abhikkhukāvāsasadisameva
atk-vin02a3:63_5: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “yatthassu bhikkhū nānāsaṃvāsakā”ti. Sesaṃ uposathakkhandhake vuttanayameva.
atk-vin02a3:64_0: 81. Ekacchanne āvāsetiādīsu āvāso nāma vasanatthāya katasenāsanaṃ. Anāvāso nāma cetiyagharaṃ
atk-vin02a3:64_1: bodhigharaṃ sammuñjaniaṭṭako dāruaṭṭako pānīyamāḷo vaccakuṭi dvārakoṭṭhakoti evamādi.
atk-vin02a3:64_2: Tatiyapadena tadubhayampi gahitaṃ. Etesu yattha katthaci ekacchanne chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānaparicchinne
atk-vin02a3:64_3: okāse ukkhittako vasituṃ na labhati. “Pārivāsiko pana antoāvāseyeva na labhatī”ti
atk-vin02a3:64_4: mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “avisesena udakapātena vārita”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:64_5: Kurundiyaṃ “etesu ettakesu pañcavaṇṇacchadanabaddhaṭṭhānesu pārivāsikassa ca ukkhittakassa
atk-vin02a3:64_6: ca pakatattena saddhiṃ udakapātena vārita”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmā nānūpacārepi ekacchanne
atk-vin02a3:64_7: na vaṭṭati. Sace panettha tadahupasampannepi pakatatte paṭhamaṃ pavisitvā nipanne
atk-vin02a3:64_8: saṭṭhivassopi pārivāsiko pacchā pavisitvā jānanto nipajjati, ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca.
atk-vin02a3:64_9: Ajānantassa ratticchedova na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ nipanne
atk-vin02a3:64_10: pacchā pakatatto pavisitvā nipajjati, pārivāsiko ca jānāti, ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca.
atk-vin02a3:64_11: No ce jānāti, ratticchedova na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:65_0: Vuṭṭhātabbaṃ nimantetabboti tadahupasampannampi disvā vuṭṭhātabbameva; vuṭṭhāya ca
atk-vin02a3:65_1: “ahaṃ iminā sukhanisinno vuṭṭhāpito”ti parammukhena na gantabbaṃ, “idaṃ ācariya-āsanaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:65_2: ettha nisīdathā”ti evaṃ nimantetabboyeva. Navakena pana “mahātheraṃ obaddhaṃ karomī”ti
atk-vin02a3:65_3: pārivāsikattherassa santikaṃ na gantabbaṃ. Ekāsaneti samānavassikāsane mañce vā pīṭhe
atk-vin02a3:65_4: vā. Na chamāyaṃ nisinneti pakatatte bhūmiyaṃ nisinne itarena antamaso tiṇasanthārepi
atk-vin02a3:65_5: uccatare vālikātalepi vā na nisīditabbaṃ, dvādasahatthaṃ pana upacāraṃ muñcitvā nisīdituṃ
atk-vin02a3:65_6: vaṭṭati. Ekacaṅkameti sahāyena viya saddhiṃ caṅkamanto ekasmiṃ caṅkame.
atk-vin02a3:66_0: Chamāyaṃ caṅkamantanti chamāyaṃ caṅkamante, ayameva vā pāṭho. Ayaṃ panettha attho
atk-vin02a3:66_1: – akataparicchedāya bhūmiyā caṅkamante paricchedaṃ katvā vālikaṃ ākiritvā ālambanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:66_2: yojetvā katacaṅkame nīcepi na caṅkamitabbaṃ, ko pana vādo iṭṭhakācayasampanne vedikāparikkhitteti!
atk-vin02a3:66_3: Sace pana pākāraparikkhitto hoti dvārakoṭṭhakayutto pabbatantaravanantaragumbantaresu
atk-vin02a3:66_4: vā suppaṭicchanno, tādise caṅkame caṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati. Appaṭicchannepi upacāraṃ muñcitvā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:67_0: Vuḍḍhatarenāti ettha sace vuḍḍhatare pārivāsike paṭhamaṃ nipanne itaro jānanto pacchā
atk-vin02a3:67_1: nipajjati, ratticchedo cassa hoti vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ. Vuḍḍhatarassa pana ratticchedova
atk-vin02a3:67_2: na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ. Ajānitvā nipajjati, dvinnampi vattabhedo natthi, ratticchedo
atk-vin02a3:67_3: pana hoti. Atha navakapārivāsike paṭhamaṃ nipanne vuḍḍhataro pacchā nipajjati, navako
atk-vin02a3:67_4: ca jānāti, ratti cassa chijjati, vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ hoti. Vuḍḍhatarassa ratticchedova
atk-vin02a3:67_5: na vattabhedo. No ce jānāti, dvinnampi vattabhedo natthi, ratticchedo pana hoti.
atk-vin02a3:67_6: Sace dvepi apacchāpurimaṃ nipajjanti, vuḍḍhatarassa ratticchedova itarassa vattabhedopīti
atk-vin02a3:67_7: kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Dve pārivāsikā samavassā, eko paṭhamaṃ nipanno, eko jānantova
atk-vin02a3:67_8: pacchā nipajjati, ratti ca chijjati, vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ nipannassa
atk-vin02a3:67_9: ratticchedova na vattabhedo. Sace pacchā nipajjantopi na jānāti, dvinnampi vattabhedo
atk-vin02a3:67_10: natthi, ratticchedo pana hoti. Sace dvepi apacchāpurimaṃ nipajjanti, dvinnampi ratticchedoyeva,
atk-vin02a3:67_11: na vattabhedo. Sace hi dve pārivāsikā ekato vaseyyuṃ, te aññamaññassa ajjhācāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:67_12: ñatvā agāravā vā vippaṭisārino vā hutvā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ vā āpattiṃ āpajjeyyuṃ vibbhameyyuṃ
atk-vin02a3:67_13: vā, tasmā nesaṃ sahaseyyā sabbappakārena paṭikkhittā. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:67_14: Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādayo cettha pārivāsikānaṃ pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a3:68_0: Pārivāsikacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsanti ettha pārivāsikaṃ catutthaṃ katvā aññassa
atk-vin02a3:68_1: parivāsadānādīni kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Etesvevāyaṃ gaṇapūrako na hoti, sesasaṅghakammesu
atk-vin02a3:68_2: hoti. Gaṇe pana appahonte vattaṃ nikkhipāpetvā gaṇapūrako kātabboti.
atk-vin02a3:69_0: 83. Imaṃ pana vattakathaṃ sutvā vinayadharaupālittherassa rahogatassa evaṃ parivitakko
atk-vin02a3:69_1: udapādi – “bhagavatā bahu pārivāsikavattaṃ paññattaṃ, katihi nu kho ettha kāraṇehi
atk-vin02a3:69_2: ratticchedo hotī”ti! So bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi. Bhagavā cassa
atk-vin02a3:69_3: byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho āyasmā upāli…pe… ratticchedā”ti. Tattha sahavāsoti
atk-vin02a3:69_4: yvāyaṃ pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchannetiādinā nayena vutto ekato vāso. Vippavāsoti
atk-vin02a3:69_5: ekakasseva vāso. Anārocanāti āgantukādīnaṃ anārocanā. Etesu tīsu ekekena kāraṇena ratticchedo hoti.
atk-vin02a3:70_0: 84. Na sakkontīti saṅghassa mahantatāya tattha tattha gantvā sabbesaṃ ārocetuṃ asakkontā
atk-vin02a3:70_1: sodhetuṃ na sakkonti. Parivāsaṃ nikkhipāmi, vattaṃ nikkhipāmīti imesu dvīsu padesu
atk-vin02a3:70_2: ekenāpi nikkhittova hoti parivāso; dvīhi sunikkhittoyeva. Samādānepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a3:70_3: Evaṃ vattaṃ samādiyitvā parivutthaparivāsassa mānattaṃ gaṇhato puna vattasamādānakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a3:70_4: natthi, samādinnavattoyeva hesa tasmāssa chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ, ciṇṇamānatto
atk-vin02a3:70_5: abbhetabbo. Evaṃ anāpattiko hutvā suddhante patiṭṭhito tisso sikkhā pūretvā dukkhassantaṃ karissatīti.
atk-vin02a3:73_0: 86. Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahā bhikkhū sādiyanti pakatattānanti ṭhapetvā navakataraṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanārahaṃ
atk-vin02a3:73_2: pañcannaṃ ṭhapetvā attano attano navakataraṃ, sesā sabbe pakatattā eva. Kasmā? Mithu
atk-vin02a3:73_3: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ anuññātattā. Tena vuttaṃ – “avasesānaṃ antamaso pārivāsikādīnampī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:73_4: Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādilakkhaṇaṃ pana nesaṃ parato āvibhavissati. Sesamettha ito
atk-vin02a3:73_5: paresu ca mānattārahādivattesu pārivāsikavatte vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:74: 87. Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahacatuttho cetiādīsupi yatheva pārivāsiko; evaṃ etepi etesu vinayakammesu gaṇapūrakā na honti, sesasaṅghakammesu honti.
atk-vin02a3:78_0: 92. Ratticchedesu ūne gaṇeti ettha gaṇoti cattāro vā atirekā vā; tasmā sacepi tīhi
atk-vin02a3:78_1: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasati, ratticchedo hotiyeva. Mānattanikkhepasamādānesu vuttasadisova
atk-vin02a3:83_0: 97. Samuccayakkhandhake – chārattaṃ mānattanti ettha catubbidhaṃ mānattaṃ – appaṭicchannamānattaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:83_2: nāma – yaṃ appaṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ adatvā kevalaṃ āpattiṃ āpannabhāveneva
atk-vin02a3:83_3: mānattārahassa mānattaṃ diyyati. Paṭicchannamānattaṃ nāma – yaṃ paṭicchannāya āpattiyā
atk-vin02a3:83_4: parivutthaparivāsassa diyyati. Pakkhamānattaṃ nāma – yaṃ paṭicchannāya vā appaṭicchannāya
atk-vin02a3:83_5: vā āpattiyā addhamāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ diyyati. Samodhānamānattaṃ nāma – yaṃ odhāya
atk-vin02a3:83_6: ekato katvā diyyati. Tesu idaṃ “appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānatta”nti vacanato “appaṭicchannamānatta”nti
atk-vin02a3:83_7: veditabbaṃ. Taṃ dentena sace ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti, idha vuttanayena dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:83_8: Sace dve vā tisso vā tatuttariṃ vā āpanno, yatheva “ekaṃ āpatti”nti vuttaṃ; evaṃ
atk-vin02a3:83_9: “dve āpattiyo, tisso āpattiyo”ti vattabbaṃ. Tatuttari pana sacepi sataṃ vā sahassaṃ
atk-vin02a3:83_10: vā hoti, “sambahulā”ti vattabbaṃ. Nānāvatthukāyopi ekato katvā dātabbā, tāsaṃ dānavidhiṃ
atk-vin02a3:84_0: Evaṃ āpattivasena kammavācaṃ katvā dinne mānatte “evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti kammavācāpariyosāne
atk-vin02a3:84_1: māḷakasīmāyameva “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vuttanayena vattaṃ samādātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:84_2: Vattaṃ samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetabbaṃ, ārocentena ca evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a3:85_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:85_1: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:85_2: mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya
atk-vin02a3:85_3: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi. Sohaṃ mānattaṃ carāmi, vedayāmahaṃ, bhante ‘vedayatī’ti
atk-vin02a3:86_0: Imañca pana atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci bhāsāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Ārocetvā sace
atk-vin02a3:86_1: nikkhipitukāmo, vuttanayeneva saṅghamajjhe nikkhipitabbaṃ. Māḷakato bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu
atk-vin02a3:86_2: ekassapi santike nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati. Māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena sahagacchantassa
atk-vin02a3:86_3: santike nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace sopi pakkanto, aññassa yassa māḷake nārocitaṃ, tassa
atk-vin02a3:86_4: ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ārocentena pana avasāne “vedayatīti maṃ āyasmā dhāretū”ti
atk-vin02a3:86_5: vattabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ ārocentena “āyasmantā dhārentū”ti, tiṇṇaṃ ārocentena “āyasmanto
atk-vin02a3:86_6: dhārentū”ti vattabbaṃ. Nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati.
atk-vin02a3:87_0: Sace appabhikkhuko vihāro hoti, sabhāgā bhikkhū vasanti, vattaṃ anikkhipitvā antovihāreyeva
atk-vin02a3:87_1: rattiyo gaṇetabbā. Atha na sakkā sodhetuṃ, vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye
atk-vin02a3:87_2: catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato, aparikkhittassa
atk-vin02a3:87_3: parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā
atk-vin02a3:87_4: vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ. Antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayena vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:87_5: Sace añño koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati, sace esa taṃ passati,
atk-vin02a3:87_6: saddaṃ vāssa suṇāti, ārocetabbaṃ. Anārocentassa ratticchedo ceva vattabhedo ca.
atk-vin02a3:88_0: Atha dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati, ratticchedo hoti eva,
atk-vin02a3:88_1: vattabhedo pana natthi. Ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya ca ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā sesehi sati
atk-vin02a3:88_2: karaṇīye gantumpi vaṭṭati. Aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa bhikkhussa santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:88_3: Sace sopi kenaci kammena purearuṇeyeva gacchati, aññaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ
atk-vin02a3:88_4: vā yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, tassa santike ārocetvā vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ayañca yasmā
atk-vin02a3:88_5: gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi, tenassa ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso
atk-vin02a3:88_6: vā vippavāso vā na hoti. Sace na kañci passati, vihāraṃ gantvā attanā saddhiṃ gatabhikkhūsu
atk-vin02a3:88_7: ekassa santike nikkhipitabbanti mahāsumatthero āha. Mahāpadumatthero pana “yaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a3:88_8: passati, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ; ayaṃ nikkhittavattassa parihāro”ti āha.
atk-vin02a3:89_0: Evaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ caritvā yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho, tattha
atk-vin02a3:89_1: so bhikkhu abbhetabbo. Abbhentehi ca paṭhamaṃ abbhānāraho kātabbo. Ayañhi nikkhittavattattā
atk-vin02a3:89_2: pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhito, pakatattassa ca abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā vattaṃ samādāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:89_3: Vatte samādinne abbhānāraho hoti. Tenāpi vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetvā abbhānaṃ yācitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:89_4: Anikkhittavattassa puna vattasamādānakiccaṃ natthi. So hi chārattātikkameneva abbhānāraho
atk-vin02a3:89_5: hoti, tasmā so abbhetabbo. Tatra yvāyaṃ “evañca pana, bhikkhave, abbhetabbo”ti pāḷiyaṃyeva
atk-vin02a3:89_6: abbhānavidhi vutto, ayañca ekāpattivasena vutto. Sace pana dve tisso sambahulā vā
atk-vin02a3:89_7: ekavatthukā vā nānāvatthukā vā āpattiyo honti, tāsaṃ vasena kammavācā kātabbā. Evaṃ
atk-vin02a3:89_8: appaṭicchannamānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. Paṭicchannamānattaṃ pana yasmā paṭicchannāya āpattiyā
atk-vin02a3:89_9: parivutthaparivāsassa dātabbaṃ hoti, tasmā naṃ parivāsakathāyaṃyeva kathayissāma.
atk-vin02a3:91_0: 102. “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya
atk-vin02a3:91_1: sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ detū”tiādinā nayena pāḷiyaṃ anekehi
atk-vin02a3:91_2: ākārehi parivāso ca mānattañca vuttaṃ. Tassa yasmā āgatāgataṭṭhāne vinicchayo vuccamāno
atk-vin02a3:91_3: pāḷi viya ativitthāraṃ āpajjati, na ca sakkā hoti sukhena pariggahetuṃ, tasmā naṃ
atk-vin02a3:92_0: Ayañhi idha adhippeto parivāso nāma – paṭicchannaparivāso, suddhantaparivāso, samodhānaparivāsoti
atk-vin02a3:92_1: tividho hoti. Tattha paṭicchannaparivāso tāva yathāpaṭicchannāya āpattiyā dātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:92_2: Kassaci hi ekāhapaṭicchannā āpatti hoti yathā ayaṃ udāyittherassa, kassaci dvīhādipaṭicchannā
atk-vin02a3:92_3: yathā parato āgatā udāyittherasseva, kassaci ekā āpatti hoti yathā ayaṃ, kassaci
atk-vin02a3:92_4: dve tisso tatuttari vā yathā parato āgatā, tasmā paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a3:93_0: Ayañhi āpatti nāma dasahākārehi paṭicchannā hoti. Tatthāyaṃ mātikā – āpatti ca hoti
atk-vin02a3:93_1: āpattisaññī ca, pakatatto ca hoti pakatattasaññī ca, anantarāyiko ca hoti anantarāyikasaññī
atk-vin02a3:93_2: ca, pahu ca hoti pahusaññī ca, chādetukāmo ca hoti chādeti cāti.
atk-vin02a3:94_0: Tattha āpatti ca hoti āpattisaññī cāti yaṃ āpanno, sā āpattiyeva hoti. Sopi ca tattha
atk-vin02a3:94_1: āpattisaññīyeva. Iti jānanto chādeti, channāva hoti. Atha panāyaṃ tattha anāpattisaññī,
atk-vin02a3:94_2: acchannā hoti, anāpatti pana āpattisaññāyapi anāpattisaññāyapi chādentenāpi acchāditāva
atk-vin02a3:94_3: hoti. Lahukaṃ vā garukāti garukaṃ vā lahukāti chādeti, alajjipakkhe tiṭṭhati, āpatti
atk-vin02a3:94_4: pana acchannā hoti. Garukaṃ lahukāti maññamāno deseti, neva desitā hoti, na channā.
atk-vin02a3:94_5: Garukaṃ garukāti ñatvā chādeti, channā hoti. Garukalahukabhāvaṃ na jānāti, āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a3:95_0: Pakatattoti tividhaṃ ukkhepanīyakammaṃ akato – so ce pakatattasaññī hutvā chādeti,
atk-vin02a3:95_1: channā hoti. Atha “mayhaṃ saṅghena kammaṃ kata”nti apakatattasaññī hutvā chādeti,
atk-vin02a3:95_2: acchannā hoti. Apakatattena pakatattasaññinā vā apakatattasaññinā vā chāditāpi acchannāva
atk-vin02a3:98: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:101_0: Anantarāyikoti yassa dasasu antarāyesu ekopi natthi, so ce anantarāyikasaññī hutvā
atk-vin02a3:101_1: chādeti, channā hoti. Sacepi so bhīrukajātikatāya andhakāre amanussacaṇḍamigabhayena
atk-vin02a3:101_2: antarāyikasaññī hutvā chādeti, acchannāva hoti. Yassa hi pabbatavihāre vasantassa
atk-vin02a3:101_3: kandaraṃ vā nadiṃ vā atikkamitvā ārocetabbaṃ hoti, antarāmagge ca caṇḍavāḷaamanussādibhayaṃ
atk-vin02a3:101_4: atthi, magge ajagarā nipajjanti, nadī pūrā hoti, ekasmiṃ pana satiyeva antarāye antarāyikasaññī
atk-vin02a3:101_5: hutvā chādeti, acchannāva hoti. Antarāyikassa pana antarāyikasaññāya vā anantarāyikasaññāya
atk-vin02a3:102_0: Pahūti yo sakkoti bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantuñceva ārocetuñca; so ce pahusaññī hutvā
atk-vin02a3:102_1: chādeti, channā hoti. Sacassa mukhe appamattako gaṇḍo vā hoti, hanukavāto vā vijjhati,
atk-vin02a3:102_2: danto vā rujjati, bhikkhā vā mandā laddhā hoti, tāvatakena pana neva vattuṃ na sakkoti
atk-vin02a3:102_3: na gantuṃ; apica kho na sakkomīti saññī hoti, ayaṃ pahu hutvā appahusaññī nāma. Iminā
atk-vin02a3:102_4: chāditāpi acchāditā. Appahunā pana vattuṃ vā gantuṃ vā asamatthena pahusaññinā vā
atk-vin02a3:103_0: Chādetukāmo ca hoti chādeti cāti idaṃ uttānatthameva. Sace pana chādessāmīti dhuranikkhepaṃ
atk-vin02a3:103_1: katvā purebhatte vā pacchābhatte vā paṭhamayāmādīsu vā lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā antoaruṇeyeva
atk-vin02a3:103_2: āroceti, ayaṃ chādetukāmo na chādeti nāma.
atk-vin02a3:104_0: Yassa pana abhikkhuke ṭhāne vasantassa āpattiṃ āpajjitvā sabhāgassa bhikkhuno āgamanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:104_1: āgamentassa sabhāgasantikaṃ vā gacchantassa addhamāsopi māsopi atikkamati, ayaṃ na
atk-vin02a3:104_2: chādetukāmo chādeti nāma, ayampi acchannāva hoti.
atk-vin02a3:105_0: Yo pana āpannamattova aggiṃ akkantapuriso viya sahasā apakkamitvā sabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:105_1: gantvā āvi karoti, ayaṃ na chādetukāmova na chādeti nāma. Sace pana sabhāgaṃ disvāpi
atk-vin02a3:105_2: “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”ti lajjāya nāroceti, channāva hoti āpatti. Upajjhāyādibhāvo
atk-vin02a3:105_3: hi idha appamāṇaṃ averisabhāgamattameva pamāṇaṃ, tasmā averisabhāgassa santike ārocetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:106_0: Yo pana visabhāgo hoti sutvā pakāsetukāmo, evarūpassa upajjhāyassāpi santike na ārocetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:106_1: Tattha purebhattaṃ vā āpattiṃ āpanno hotu pacchābhattaṃ vā, divā vā rattiṃ vā yāva
atk-vin02a3:106_2: aruṇaṃ na uggacchati tāva ārocetabbaṃ. Uddhaste aruṇe paṭicchannā hoti, paṭicchādanapaccayā
atk-vin02a3:106_3: ca dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:106_4: Sace āvi karoti, āpatti āvikatā hoti, dukkaṭā pana na muccati, tasmā suddhassa santike
atk-vin02a3:106_5: āvikātabbā. Āvikaronto ca “tuyhaṃ santike ekaṃ āpattiṃ āvikaromī”ti vā “ācikkhāmī”ti
atk-vin02a3:106_6: vā “ārocemī”ti vā “mama ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpannabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti vā vadatu, “ekaṃ garukāpattiṃ
atk-vin02a3:106_7: āvikaromī”tiādinā vā nayena vadatu, sabbehipi ākārehi appaṭicchannāva hotīti kurundiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:106_8: vuttaṃ. Sace pana lahukāpattiṃ āvikaromītiādinā nayena vadati, paṭicchannā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:106_9: vatthuṃ āroceti, āpattiṃ āroceti, ubhayaṃ āroceti, tividhenāpi ārocitāva hoti. Iti
atk-vin02a3:106_10: imāni dasa kāraṇāni upalakkhetvā paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ dentena paṭhamameva paṭicchannabhāvo jānitabbo.
atk-vin02a3:107_0: Tato paṭicchannadivase ca āpattiyo ca sallakkhetvā sace ekāhapaṭicchannā hoti – “ahaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:107_1: bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhapaṭicchanna”nti evaṃ
atk-vin02a3:107_2: yācāpetvā idha vuttanayeneva kammavācaṃ vatvā parivāso dātabbo. Atha dvīhatīhādipaṭicchannā
atk-vin02a3:107_3: hoti, dvīhapaṭicchannaṃ tīhapaṭicchannaṃ catūhapaṭicchannaṃ pañcāhapaṭicchannaṃ chāhapaṭicchannaṃ
atk-vin02a3:107_5: dvādasāhapaacchannaṃ terasāhapaṭicchannaṃ cuddasāhapaṭicchannanti evaṃ yāva cuddasa
atk-vin02a3:107_6: divasāni divasavasena yojanā kātabbā. Pañcadasa divasāni paṭicchannāya pakkhapaṭicchannanti
atk-vin02a3:107_7: vatvā yojanā kātabbā. Tato yāva ekūnatiṃsatimo divaso, tāva atirekapakkhapaṭicchannanti.
atk-vin02a3:108_5: ekādasamāsapaṭicchannaṃ atirekaekādasamāsapaṭicchannanti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā. Saṃvacchare
atk-vin02a3:108_6: paripuṇṇe ekasaṃvaccharapaṭicchannanti. Tato paraṃ atirekaekasaṃvacchara… dvesaṃvacchara…
atk-vin02a3:108_9: atirekasaṭṭhisaṃvaccharapaṭicchannanti vā tato vā bhiyyopi vatvā yojanā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:109_0: Sace pana dve tisso tatuttari vā āpattiyo honti, yathā idha ekaṃ āpattinti vuttaṃ;
atk-vin02a3:109_1: evaṃ dve āpattiyo tisso āpattiyoti vattabbaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana sataṃ vā hotu sahassaṃ
atk-vin02a3:109_2: vā, sambahulāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Nānāvatthukāsupi “ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā
atk-vin02a3:109_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ – ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ, ekaṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ, ekaṃ duṭṭhullavācaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:109_4: ekaṃ attakāmaṃ, ekaṃ sañcarittaṃ, ekāhapaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ gaṇanavasena vā “ahaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:109_5: bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyo ekāhapaṭicchannāyo”ti
atk-vin02a3:109_6: evaṃ vatthukittanavasena vā, “ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ
atk-vin02a3:109_7: ekāhapaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ nāmamattavasena vā yojanā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:110_0: Tattha nāmaṃ duvidhaṃ – sajātisādhāraṇañca sabbasādhāraṇañca. Tattha saṅghādisesoti
atk-vin02a3:110_1: sajātisādhāraṇaṃ, āpattīti sabbasādhāraṇaṃ; tasmā “sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhapaṭicchannāyo”ti
atk-vin02a3:110_2: evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇanāmavasenapi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Idañhi sabbampi parivāsādikaṃ vinayakammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:110_3: vatthuvasena gottavasena nāmavasena āpattivasena ca kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:111_0: Tattha “sukkavissaṭṭhī”ti vatthu ceva gottañca. “Saṅghādiseso”ti nāmañceva āpatti
atk-vin02a3:111_1: ca. “Kāyasaṃsaggo”ti vatthu ceva gottañca. “Saṅghādiseso”ti nāmañceva āpatti ca,
atk-vin02a3:111_3: vatthu ceva gottañca gahitaṃ hoti. “Saṅghādiseso”ti vacanenāpi “āpattiyo”ti vacanenāpi
atk-vin02a3:111_4: nāmañceva āpatti ca gahitā hoti. Idha pana ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ “sukkavissaṭṭhi”nti
atk-vin02a3:111_5: nāmampi vatthugottānipi gahitāneva. Yathā ca idha “ayaṃ udāyi bhikkhū”ti vuttaṃ;
atk-vin02a3:111_6: evaṃ yo yo āpanno hoti, tassa tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā “ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhū”ti kammavācā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:112_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca tena bhikkhunā māḷakasīmāyameva “parivāsaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:112_1: samādiyāmī”ti vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādātabbaṃ. Samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:113_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhapaṭicchannaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:113_1: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ
atk-vin02a3:113_2: yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya
atk-vin02a3:113_3: ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasāmi – ‘vedayāmahaṃ, bhante, vedayatī’ti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti.
atk-vin02a3:114_0: Imañca panatthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci bhāsāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Ārocetvā sace
atk-vin02a3:114_1: nikkhipitukāmo, vuttanayeneva saṅghamajjhe nikkhipitabbaṃ. Māḷakato bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu
atk-vin02a3:114_2: ekassāpi santike nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati. Māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena sahagacchantassa
atk-vin02a3:114_3: santike nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace sopi pakkanto, aññassa yassa māḷake nārocitaṃ, tassa
atk-vin02a3:114_4: ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ārocentena ca avasāne “vedayatīti maṃ āyasmā dhāretū”ti
atk-vin02a3:114_5: vattabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ ārocentena “āyasmantā dhārentū”ti, tiṇṇaṃ ārocentena “āyasmanto
atk-vin02a3:114_6: dhārentū”ti vattabbaṃ. Nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati.
atk-vin02a3:115_0: Sace appabhikkhuko vihāro hoti, sabhāgā bhikkhū vasanti, vattaṃ anikkhipitvā vihāreyeva
atk-vin02a3:115_1: rattipariggaho kātabbo. Atha na sakkā sodhetuṃ, vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā
atk-vin02a3:115_2: paccūsasamaye ekena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mānattavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva upacārasīmaṃ
atk-vin02a3:115_3: atikkamitvā mahāmaggā okkamma paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīditvā antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a3:115_4: vattaṃ samādiyitvā tassa bhikkhuno parivāso ārocetabbo. Ārocentena sace navakataro
atk-vin02a3:115_5: hoti, “āvuso”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace vuḍḍhataro, “bhante”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace añño koci
atk-vin02a3:115_6: bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati, sace esa taṃ passati, saddaṃ
atk-vin02a3:115_7: vāssa suṇāti, ārocetabbaṃ; anārocentassa ratticchedo ceva vattabhedo ca. Atha dvādasahatthaṃ
atk-vin02a3:115_8: upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati, ratticchedoyeva hoti, vattabhedo pana natthi.
atk-vin02a3:116_0: Uggate aruṇe vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace so bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkanto
atk-vin02a3:116_1: hoti, yaṃ aññaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ passati, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace pana kañci
atk-vin02a3:116_2: na passati, vihāraṃ gantvā attanā saddhiṃ gatabhikkhussa santike nikkhipitabbanti
atk-vin02a3:116_3: mahāsumatthero āha. Mahāpadumatthero pana “yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:117_0: Evaṃ yattakāni divasāni āpatti paṭicchannā hoti, tattakāni tato adhikatarāni vā kukkuccavinodanatthāya
atk-vin02a3:117_1: parivasitvā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ samādiyitvā mānattaṃ yācitabbaṃ. Ayañhi
atk-vin02a3:117_2: vatte samādinne eva mānattāraho hoti nikkhittavattena parivutthattā. Anikkhittavattassa
atk-vin02a3:117_3: pana puna samādānakiccaṃ natthi, so hi paṭicchannadivasātikkameneva mānattāraho hoti,
atk-vin02a3:117_4: tasmā tassa mānattaṃ dātabbameva. Idaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ nāma. Taṃ dentena sace
atk-vin02a3:117_5: ekāpatti hoti, pāḷiyaṃ vuttanayeneva dātabbaṃ. Atha dve vā tisso vā “sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso
atk-vin02a3:117_6: saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhapaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:117_7: yācāmī”ti parivāse vuttanayeneva āpattiyo ca divase ca sallakkhetvā yojanā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:118: Appaṭicchannāpattiṃ paṭicchannāpattiyā samodhānetvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Kathaṃ? Paṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ vasitvā –
atk-vin02a3:119_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhapaṭicchannaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:119_1: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ
atk-vin02a3:119_2: yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya
atk-vin02a3:119_3: ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso. Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ
atk-vin02a3:119_4: sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ. Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:119_5: sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭicchannāya ca appaṭicchannāya ca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:120_0: Athassa tadanurūpaṃ kammavācaṃ katvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. Sace paṭicchannā dve, appaṭicchannā
atk-vin02a3:120_1: ekā “paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannāya cā”ti vattabbaṃ. Atha paṭicchannā ekā, appaṭicchannā
atk-vin02a3:120_2: dve, “paṭicchannāya ca appaṭicchannānañcā”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace paṭicchannāpi dve, appaṭicchannāpi
atk-vin02a3:120_3: dve, “paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañcā”ti vattabbaṃ. Sabbattha anurūpaṃ kammavācaṃ
atk-vin02a3:120_4: katvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. Ciṇṇamānattassa ca tadanurūpameva kammavācaṃ katvā abbhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:120_5: kātabbaṃ. Idha pana ekāpattivasena vuttaṃ. Iti yaṃ paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsāvasāne
atk-vin02a3:120_6: mānattaṃ diyyati, idaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ nāma. Evamettha ekeneva yojanāmukhena
atk-vin02a3:120_7: paṭicchannaparivāso ca paṭicchannamānattañca vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Pakkhamānattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:121_0: Suddhantaparivāso samodhānaparivāsoti hi dve parivāsā avasesā. Tattha “suddhantaparivāso”
atk-vin02a3:121_1: nāma parato adhammikamānattacārāvasāne “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sambahulā
atk-vin02a3:121_2: saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpanno hoti, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na
atk-vin02a3:121_3: jānātī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaparivāso. So duvidho – cūḷasuddhanto, mahāsuddhantoti.
atk-vin02a3:121_4: Duvidhopi cesa rattiparicchedaṃ sakalaṃ vā ekaccaṃ vā ajānantassa ca assarantassa
atk-vin02a3:121_5: ca tattha vematikassa ca dātabbo. Āpattipariyantaṃ pana ettakā ahaṃ āpattiyo āpannoti
atk-vin02a3:122_0: Tattha yo upasampadato paṭṭhāya anulomakkamena vā ārocitadivasato paṭṭhāya paṭilomakkamena
atk-vin02a3:122_1: vā “asukañca asukañca divasaṃ vā pakkhaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā tava suddhabhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a3:122_2: jānāsī”ti pucchiyamāno “āma, bhante, jānāmi, ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a3:123_0: Taṃ gahetvā parivasantena yattakaṃ kālaṃ attano suddhiṃ jānāti, tattakaṃ apanetvā
atk-vin02a3:123_1: avasesaṃ māsaṃ vā dvemāsaṃ vā parivasitabbaṃ. Sace māsamattaṃ asuddhomhīti sallakkhetvā
atk-vin02a3:123_2: aggahesi parivasanto ca puna aññaṃ māsaṃ sarati, tampi māsaṃ parivasitabbameva. Puna
atk-vin02a3:123_3: parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Atha dvemāsaṃ asuddhomhīti sallakkhetvā aggahesi, parivasanto
atk-vin02a3:123_4: ca māsamattamevāhaṃ asuddhomhīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti, māsameva parivasitabbaṃ. Puna
atk-vin02a3:123_5: parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Ayañhi suddhantaparivāso nāma uddhampi ārohati, heṭṭhāpi
atk-vin02a3:123_6: orohati, idamassa lakkhaṇaṃ. Aññasmiṃ pana āpattivuṭṭhāne idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ – yo appaṭicchannaṃ
atk-vin02a3:123_7: āpattiṃ paṭicchannāti vinayakammaṃ karoti, tassa āpatti vuṭṭhāti. Yo paṭicchannaṃ
atk-vin02a3:123_8: appaṭicchannāti vinayakammaṃ karoti, tassa na vuṭṭhāti. Acirapaṭicchannaṃ cirapaṭicchannāti
atk-vin02a3:123_9: karontassāpi vuṭṭhāti. Cirapaṭicchannaṃ acirapaṭicchannāti karontassa na vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a3:123_10: Ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā sambahulāti karontassāpi vuṭṭhāti, ekaṃ vinā sambahulānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:123_11: abhāvato. Sambahulā pana āpajjitvā ekaṃ āpajjinti karontassa na vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a3:124_0: Yo pana yathāvuttena anulomapaṭilomanayena pucchiyamānopi rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti
atk-vin02a3:124_1: neva sarati vematiko vā hoti, tassa dinno suddhantaparivāso “mahāsuddhanto”ti vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:124_2: Taṃ gahetvā gahitadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva upasampadadivaso, tāva rattiyo gaṇetvā parivasitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:124_3: Ayaṃ uddhaṃ nārohati, heṭṭhā pana orohati. Tasmā sace parivasanto rattiparicchede
atk-vin02a3:124_4: sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti, māso vā saṃvaccharo vā mayhaṃ āpannassāti māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ
atk-vin02a3:124_5: vā parivasitabbaṃ. Parivāsayācanadānalakkhaṇaṃ panettha parato pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva
atk-vin02a3:125_0: “Samodhānaparivāso” nāma tividho hoti – odhānasamodhāno, agghasamodhāno, missakasamodhānoti.
atk-vin02a3:125_1: Tattha “odhānasamodhāno” nāma – antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādentassa parivutthadivase
atk-vin02a3:125_2: odhunitvā makkhetvā purimāya āpattiyā mūladivasaparicchede pacchā āpannaṃ āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a3:125_3: samodahitvā dātabbaparivāso vuccati. So parato “tena hi bhikkhave saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-vin02a3:125_4: antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhapaṭicchannāya mūlāya
atk-vin02a3:125_5: paṭikassitvā purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ detū”ti ito paṭṭhāya vitthārato pāḷiyaṃyeva āgato.
atk-vin02a3:126_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – yo paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ gahetvā parivasanto
atk-vin02a3:126_1: vā mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho vā aññaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā purimāya
atk-vin02a3:126_2: āpattiyā samā vā ūnatarā vā rattiyo paṭicchādeti, tassa mūlāyapaṭikassanena te parivutthadivase
atk-vin02a3:126_3: ca mānattaciṇṇadivase ca sabbe odhunitvā adivase katvā pacchā āpannāpattiṃ mūlāpattiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:126_4: samodhāya parivāso dātabbo. Tena sace mūlāpatti pakkhapaṭicchannā, antarāpatti ūnakapakkhapaṭicchannā,
atk-vin02a3:126_5: puna pakkhameva parivāso parivasitabbo. Athāpi antarāpatti pakkhapaṭicchannāva pakkhameva
atk-vin02a3:126_6: parivasitabbaṃ. Etenupāyena yāva saṭṭhivassapaṭicchannā mūlāpatti, tāva vinicchayo
atk-vin02a3:126_7: veditabbo. Saṭṭhivassāni parivasitvā mānattāraho hutvāpi hi ekadivasaṃ antarāpattiṃ
atk-vin02a3:127_0: Sace pana antarāpatti mūlāpattito atirekapaṭicchannā hoti, tattha “kiṃ kātabba”nti
atk-vin02a3:127_1: vutte mahāsumatthero āha – “atekiccho ayaṃ puggalo, atekiccho nāma āvikārāpetvā vissajjetabbo”ti.
atk-vin02a3:127_2: Mahāpadumatthero panāha – “kasmā atekiccho nāma, nanu ayaṃ samuccayakkhandhako nāma
atk-vin02a3:127_3: buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadiso, āpatti nāma paṭicchannā vā hotu appaṭicchannā vā samakaūnataraatirekapaṭicchannā
atk-vin02a3:127_4: vā vinayadharassa kammavācaṃ yojetuṃ samatthabhāvoyevettha pamāṇaṃ, tasmā yā atirekapaṭicchannā
atk-vin02a3:127_5: hoti, taṃ mūlāpattiṃ katvā tattha itaraṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabbo”ti. Ayaṃ “odhānasamodhāno” nāma.
atk-vin02a3:128_0: “Agghasamodhāno” nāma sambahulāsu āpattīsu yā ekā vā dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā
atk-vin02a3:128_1: āpattiyo sabbacirapaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena samodhāya tāsaṃ rattiparicchedavasena
atk-vin02a3:128_2: avasesānaṃ ūnatarapaṭicchannānaṃ āpattīnaṃ parivāso diyyati. Ayaṃ vuccati agghasamodhāno.
atk-vin02a3:128_3: Sopi parato “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
atk-vin02a3:128_4: āpanno hoti, ekā āpatti ekāhapaṭicchannā ekā āpatti dvīhapaṭicchannā”tiādinā nayena pāḷiyaṃ āgatoyeva.
atk-vin02a3:129_0: Yassa pana sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannā, aparampi sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannāti
atk-vin02a3:129_1: evaṃ dasakkhattuṃ katvā āpattisahassaṃ divasasatapaṭicchannaṃ hoti, tena kiṃ kātabbanti?
atk-vin02a3:129_2: Sabbaṃ samodahitvā dasa divase parivasitabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekeneva dasāhena divasasatampi
atk-vin02a3:133: “Missakasamodhāno” nāma – yo nānāvatthukā āpattiyo ekato katvā diyyati. Tatrāyaṃ nayo –
atk-vin02a3:134_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ, ekaṃ
atk-vin02a3:134_1: kāyasaṃsaggaṃ, ekaṃ duṭṭhullavācaṃ, ekaṃ attakāmaṃ, ekaṃ sañcarittaṃ, ekaṃ kuṭikāraṃ,
atk-vin02a3:134_2: ekaṃ vihārakāraṃ, ekaṃ duṭṭhadosaṃ, ekaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ, ekaṃ saṅghabhedaṃ, ekaṃ bhedānuvattakaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:134_3: ekaṃ dubbacaṃ, ekaṃ kuladūsakaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācāmī”ti –
atk-vin02a3:135: Tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā tadanurūpāya kammavācāya parivāso dātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:136_0: Ettha ca saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyotipi saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjintipi
atk-vin02a3:136_1: evaṃ pubbe vuttanayena vatthuvasenapi gottavasenapi nāmavasenapi āpattivasenapi yojetvā
atk-vin02a3:136_2: kammavācaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyevāti ayaṃ missakasamodhāno. Sabbaparivāsakammavācāvasāne
atk-vin02a3:138_1: kathayissāmā”ti, tassokāso sampatto, tasmā vuccati – “pakkhamānatta”nti bhikkhuniyā
atk-vin02a3:138_2: dātabbamānattaṃ. Taṃ pana paṭicchannāyapi appaṭicchannāyapi āpattiyā aḍḍhamāsameva
atk-vin02a3:138_3: dātabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:138_4: caritabba”nti. Taṃ pana bhikkhunīhi attano sīmaṃ sodhetvā vihārasīmāya vā vihārasīmaṃ
atk-vin02a3:138_5: sodhetuṃ asakkontīhi khaṇḍasīmāya vā sabbantimena paricchedena catuvaggagaṇaṃ sannipātāpetvā
atk-vin02a3:138_6: dātabbaṃ. Sace ekā āpatti hoti ekissā vasena, sace dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā ekavatthukā
atk-vin02a3:138_7: vā nānāvatthukā vā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ vasena vatthugottanāmaāpattīsu yaṃ yaṃ icchati taṃ
atk-vin02a3:139_0: Tatridaṃ ekāpattivasena mukhamattadassanaṃ, tāya āpannāya bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
atk-vin02a3:139_1: upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:139_2: nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo – “ahaṃ, ayye, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ
atk-vin02a3:139_3: gāmantaraṃ, sāhaṃ, ayye, ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācāmī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:140: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
atk-vin02a3:141_0: “Suṇātu me ayye saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji gāmantaraṃ,
atk-vin02a3:141_1: sā saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:141_2: saṅgho itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ dadeyya, esā ñatti.
atk-vin02a3:142_0: “Suṇātu me ayye saṅgho, ayaṃ…pe… dutiyampi… tatiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi. Suṇātu me
atk-vin02a3:142_1: ayye saṅgho…pe… deti… dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya
atk-vin02a3:142_2: pakkhamānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī; evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:143_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhumānattakathāya vuttanayeneva saṅghassa
atk-vin02a3:143_1: ārocetvā nikkhittavattaṃ vasitukāmāya tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu
atk-vin02a3:143_2: ekabhikkhuniyā vā dutiyikāya vā santike vuttanayeneva nikkhipitabbaṃ. Aññissā pana
atk-vin02a3:143_3: āgantukāya santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a3:143_4: tiṭṭhati. Puna samādiyitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpentiyā pana bhikkhunīnaṃyeva santike vasituṃ
atk-vin02a3:143_5: na labhati. “Ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabba”nti hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā assā ācariyupajjhāyāhi
atk-vin02a3:143_6: vihāraṃ gantvā saṅgāhakapakkhe ṭhito eko mahāthero vā dhammakathiko vā bhikkhu vattabbo
atk-vin02a3:143_7: – “ekissā bhikkhuniyā vinayakammaṃ kattabbamatthi, tatra no ayyā, cattāro bhikkhū
atk-vin02a3:143_8: pesethā”ti. Saṅgahaṃ akātuṃ na labbhati, pesessāmīti vattabbaṃ. Catūhi pakatattabhikkhunīhi
atk-vin02a3:143_9: mānattacāriniṃ bhikkhuniṃ gahetvā antoaruṇeyeva nikkhamitvā gāmūpacārato dve leḍḍupāte
atk-vin02a3:143_10: atikkamitvā maggā okkamma gumbavatiādīhi paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ. Vihārūpacāratopi
atk-vin02a3:143_11: dve leḍḍupātā atikkamitabbā catūhi pakatattabhikkhūhipi tattha gantabbaṃ. Gantvā
atk-vin02a3:143_12: pana bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ na ekaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ, paṭikkamitvā avidūraṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:143_13: Kurundimahāpaccarīsu pana “bhikkhunīhipi byattaṃ ekaṃ vā dve vā upāsikāyo bhikkhūhipi
atk-vin02a3:143_14: ekaṃ vā dve vā upāsake attarakkhaṇatthāya gahetvā gantabba”nti vuttaṃ. Kurundiyaṃyeva
atk-vin02a3:143_15: ca bhikkhunupassayassa ca vihārassa ca upacāraṃ muñcituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, gāmassāti na vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:144: Evaṃ nisinnesu pana bhikkhūsu ca bhikkhunīsu ca tāya bhikkhuniyā “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhunīsaṅghassa tāva evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a3:145_0: “Ahaṃ, ayye, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ gāmantaraṃ, sāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya
atk-vin02a3:145_1: pakkhamānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:145_2: adāsi, sāhaṃ pakkhamānattaṃ carāmi, ‘vedayāmahaṃ, ayye, vedayatī’ti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti.
atk-vin02a3:146_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ – “ahaṃ, ayyā, ekaṃ āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a3:146_1: āpajjiṃ …pe… vedayāmahaṃ, ayyā, vedayatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti. Idhāpi yāya kāyaci
atk-vin02a3:147_0: Ārocetvā ca bhikkhunisaṅghasseva santike nisīditabbaṃ, ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:147_1: gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace sāsaṅkaṃ hoti, bhikkhuniyo tattheva ṭhānaṃ paccāsīsanti, ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:147_2: Sace añño bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā taṃ ṭhānaṃ eti, passantiyā ārocetabbaṃ. No ce āroceti,
atk-vin02a3:147_3: ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca. Sace ajānantiyā eva upacāraṃ okkamitvā gacchati,
atk-vin02a3:147_4: ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ. Sace bhikkhuniyo upajjhāyādīnaṃ vattakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-vin02a3:147_6: bhikkhuniṃ ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ. Tāya aruṇe uṭṭhite tassā santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:147_7: Etenupāyena akhaṇḍā pañcadasa rattiyo mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:148_0: Anikkhittavattāya pana pārivāsikakkhandhake vuttanayeneva sammā vattitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-vin02a3:148_1: pana viseso – “āgantukassa ārocetabba”nti ettha yattakā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:148_2: vā taṃ gāmaṃ bhikkhū vā bhikkhuniyo vā āgacchanti, sabbesaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Anārocentiyā
atk-vin02a3:148_3: ratticchedo ca vattabhedadukkaṭañca. Sacepi rattiṃ koci bhikkhu taṃ gāmūpacāraṃ okkamitvā
atk-vin02a3:148_4: gacchati, ratticchedo hotiyeva, ajānanapaccayā pana vattabhedato muccati. Kurundiādīsu
atk-vin02a3:148_5: pana anikkhittavattabhikkhūnaṃ vuttanayeneva kathetabbanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pārivāsikavattādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:148_6: upacārasīmāya paricchinnattā yuttataraṃ dissati. Uposathe ārocetabbaṃ, pavāraṇāya
atk-vin02a3:148_7: ārocetabbaṃ, catunnaṃ bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca devasikaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Sace bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:148_8: tasmiṃ gāme bhikkhācāro sampajjati, tattheva gantabbaṃ. No ce sampajjati, aññatra
atk-vin02a3:148_9: caritvāpi tatra āgantvā attānaṃ dassetvā gantabbaṃ. Bahigāme vā saṅketaṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ
atk-vin02a3:148_10: – “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne amhe passissasī”ti. Tāya saṅketaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:148_11: Saṅketaṭṭhāne adisvā vihāraṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Vihāre sabbabhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:148_12: Sace sabbesaṃ sakkā na hoti ārocetuṃ, bahiupacārasīmāya ṭhatvā bhikkhuniyo pesetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:148_13: Tāhi ānītānaṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Sace vihāro dūro hoti sāsaṅko, upāsake
atk-vin02a3:148_14: ca upāsikāyo ca gahetvā gantabbaṃ. Sace pana ayaṃ ekā vasati, rattivippavāsaṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin02a3:148_15: tasmāssā ekā pakatattā bhikkhunī sammannitvā dātabbā ekacchanne vasanatthāya.
atk-vin02a3:149_0: Evaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ mānattaṃ caritvā vīsatigaṇe bhikkhunisaṅghe vuttanayeneva abbhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:149_1: kātabbaṃ. Sace mānattaṃ caramānā antarāpattiṃ āpajjati, mūlāya paṭikassitvā tassā
atk-vin02a3:149_2: āpattiyā mānattaṃ dātabbanti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Idaṃ “pakkhamānattaṃ” nāma.
atk-vin02a3:150_0: “Samodhānamānattaṃ” pana tividhaṃ hoti – odhānasamodhānaṃ, agghasamodhānaṃ, missakasamodhānanti.
atk-vin02a3:150_1: Tattha yadetaṃ parato udāyittherassa pañcāhapaṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ parivasantassa
atk-vin02a3:150_2: parivāse ca mānattārahaṭṭhāne ca antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā mūlāyapaṭikassitassa “tena
atk-vin02a3:150_3: hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detū”ti
atk-vin02a3:150_4: mānattaṃ anuññātaṃ, idaṃ “odhānasamodhānaṃ” nāma. Idañhi punappunaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanena
atk-vin02a3:150_5: parivutthadivase odhunitvā purimāpattīhi saddhiṃ samodhāya dinnaṃ, tasmā odhānasamodhānanti
atk-vin02a3:150_6: vuccati. Kurundiyaṃ pana “samodhānaparivāsaṃ vutthassa dātabbaṃ mānattaṃ samodhānamānatta”nti
atk-vin02a3:151_1: dātabbamānattameva vuccati, taṃ parivāsakammavācānusārena yojetvā dātabbaṃ. Ettāvatā
atk-vin02a3:151_2: yaṃ vuttaṃ “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya
atk-vin02a3:151_3: sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ detūtiādinā nayena pāḷiyaṃ anekehi
atk-vin02a3:151_4: ākārehi parivāso ca mānattañca vuttaṃ, tassa yasmā āgatāgataṭhāne vinicchayo vuccamāno
atk-vin02a3:151_5: pāḷi viya ativitthāraṃ āpajjati, na ca sakkā hoti sukhena pariggahetuṃ, tasmā naṃ
atk-vin02a3:151_6: samodhānetvā idheva dassessāmā”ti, tadidaṃ atthato sampāditaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:153: 102. Idāni yā tāva ayaṃ paṭicchannāya ekissā āpattiyā vasena pāḷi vuttā, sā uttānatthāva.
atk-vin02a3:154_0: 108. Tato paraṃ dvīhatīhacatūhapañcāhapaṭicchannānaṃ vasena pāḷiṃ vatvā pañcāhapaṭicchannāya
atk-vin02a3:154_1: parivāsato paṭṭhāya antarāpatti dassitā. Yasmā pana taṃ āpattiṃ āpanno mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho
atk-vin02a3:154_2: nāma hoti, tasmāssa tattha mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ anuññātaṃ. Sace pana nikkhittavatto
atk-vin02a3:154_3: āpajjati, mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho na hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā na so parivasanto āpanno, pakatattaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a3:154_4: ṭhito āpanno, tasmā tassā āpattiyā visuṃ mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ. Sace paṭicchannā hoti
atk-vin02a3:154_5: parivāsopi vasitabbo. Yañcetaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmimpi kate parivutthadivasā
atk-vin02a3:154_6: makkhitā honti. Iti parivāse antarāpattiṃ dassetvā puna mānattārahassa antarāpattiṃ
atk-vin02a3:154_7: dassetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmimpi kate parivutthadivasā makkhitāva honti.
atk-vin02a3:154_8: Tato parivutthaparivāsassa tāsaṃ tissannampi āpattīnaṃ samodhānamānattaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:154_9: Tato mānattacārikassa antarāpattiṃ dassetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana
atk-vin02a3:154_10: paṭikassane kate mānattaciṇṇadivasāpi parivutthadivasāpi makkhitāva honti. Tato abbhānārahassa
atk-vin02a3:154_11: antarāpattiṃ dassetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmimpi kate sabbe te makkhitāva
atk-vin02a3:154_12: honti. Tato paraṃ sabbā antarāpattiyo yojetvā abbhānakammaṃ dassitaṃ. Evaṃ paṭicchannavāre
atk-vin02a3:154_13: ekāhapaṭicchannādivasena pañca, antarāpattivasena catassoti nava kammavācā dassitā honti.
atk-vin02a3:157_0: 125. Tato paraṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāya āpattiyā antoparivāsato paṭṭhāya pañcāhapaṭicchannāya
atk-vin02a3:157_1: antarāpattiyā vasena samodhānaparivāso ca, samodhānamānattañca dassitaṃ. Ettha ca
atk-vin02a3:157_2: mānattacārikamānattārahakālepi āpannāya āpattiyā mūlāyapaṭikassane kate mānattaciṇṇadivasāpi
atk-vin02a3:157_3: parivāsaparivutthadivasāpi sabbe makkhitāva honti. Kasmā? Yasmā paṭicchannā antarāpatti.
atk-vin02a3:157_4: Teneva vuttaṃ – “mūlāya paṭikassitvā purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ datvā chārattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:157_5: mānattaṃ detū”ti. Tato paraṃ sabbā antarāpattiyo yojetvā abbhānakammaṃ dassetvā sukkavissaṭṭhivatthu niṭṭhāpitaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:161: 134. Tato ekāpattimūlakañca āpattivaḍḍhanakañcāti dve naye dassetvā agghasamodhānaparivāso dassito.
atk-vin02a3:162_0: Tato sañcicca anārocitāpattivatthuṃ dassetvā sañcicca ajānanaassaraṇavematikabhāvehi
atk-vin02a3:162_1: anārocitāya āpattiyā pacchā lajjidhamme vā ñāṇasaraṇanibbematikabhāvesu vā uppannesu
atk-vin02a3:162_2: yaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “idha pana bhikkhave”tiādinā nayena pāḷi ṭhapitā. Tato
atk-vin02a3:162_3: ajānanaassaraṇavematikapaṭicchannānaṃ appaṭicchannabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ tatheva pāḷi ṭhapitā.
atk-vin02a3:165_0: 138. Tato dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsapaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsayācanavatthuṃ dassetvā
atk-vin02a3:165_1: asañcicca ajānanaassaraṇavematikabhāvehi anārocite itarasmiṃ māse pacchā lajjidhammādīsu
atk-vin02a3:165_2: uppannesu yaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ajānanaassaraṇavematikapaṭicchannassa ca āpannabhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a3:168: 156. Tato “āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānātī”tiādinā nayena suddhantaparivāso dassito.
atk-vin02a3:169: 160. Tato paraṃ pārivāsikaṃ ādiṃ katvā vibbhamitvā punaupasampannādīsu paṭipattidassanatthaṃ pāḷi ṭhapitā.
atk-vin02a3:170: 165. Tattha “antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā appaṭicchannāyo”tiādīsu āpattiparicchedavasena parimāṇāyo ceva appaṭicchannāyo cāti attho.
atk-vin02a3:171: 166. Pacchimasmiṃ āpattikkhandheti ekova so āpattikkhandho, pacchā chāditattā pana “pacchimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe”ti vuttaṃ. Purimasminti etthāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a3:175_0: 181. Tato paraṃ yo paṭicchādeti, tasmiṃ paṭipattidassanatthaṃ “dve bhikkhū”tiādi
atk-vin02a3:175_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha missakanti thullaccayādīhi missakaṃ. Suddhakanti saṅghādisesaṃ vinā
atk-vin02a3:176_0: 184. Tato paraṃ avisuddhavisuddhabhāvadassanatthaṃ “idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
atk-vin02a3:176_1: sambahulā saṅghādisesā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha byañjanato vā adhippāyato vā anuttānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:176_2: nāma kiñci natthi, tasmā tañca ito pubbe avuttañca sabbaṃ pāḷianusāreneva veditabbanti.
atk-vin02a3:181_1: “adhammavādī puggalo dhammavādiṃ puggalaṃ saññāpetī”tiādinā nayena vitthāro vutto.
atk-vin02a3:181_2: Tattha saññāpetīti kāraṇapatirūpakāni vatvā paritosetvā jānāpeti. Nijjhāpetīti yathā
atk-vin02a3:181_3: so taṃ atthaṃ nijjhāyati, oloketi; evaṃ karoti. Pekkhati anupekkhatīti yathā so taṃ
atk-vin02a3:181_4: atthaṃ pekkhati ceva punappunañca pekkhati; evaṃ karoti. Dasseti anudassetīti tesaññeva
atk-vin02a3:181_5: pariyāyavacanāni. Adhammena vūpasammatīti yasmā so adhammameva “ayaṃ dhammo”tiādinā
atk-vin02a3:181_6: nayena mohetvā dasseti, tasmā adhammena vūpasammati nāma.
atk-vin02a3:182: 188. Dhammena vūpasammatīti yasmā dhammavādī dhammameva “ayaṃ dhammo”tiādinā nayena amohetvā dasseti, tasmā dhammena vūpasammati nāma.
atk-vin02a3:185_0: 195. Pañcimāni bhikkhave dhammikāni sativinayassa dānānīti ettha suddhassa anāpattikassa
atk-vin02a3:185_1: dānaṃ ekaṃ, anuvaditassa dānaṃ ekaṃ, yācitassa dānaṃ ekaṃ, saṅghena dānaṃ ekaṃ, dhammena
atk-vin02a3:185_2: samaggadānaṃ ekanti evaṃ pañca. Etāni pana ekekaaṅgavasena na labbhanti, tasmā desanāmattamevetaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:185_3: pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ pana sativinayadānaṃ dhammikanti ayamettha attho. Tattha ca
atk-vin02a3:185_4: anuvadantīti codenti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Ayaṃ pana sativinayo khīṇāsavasseva dātabbo
atk-vin02a3:185_5: na aññassa, antamaso anāgāminopi. So ca kho aññena codiyamānasseva, na acodiyamānassa.
atk-vin02a3:185_6: Dinne ca pana tasmiṃ codakassa kathā na ruhati. Codentopi “ayaṃ khīṇāsavo sativinayaladdho,
atk-vin02a3:185_7: ko tuyhaṃ kathaṃ gahessatī”ti apasādetabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a3:188_0: 196. Bhāsitaparikkantanti vācāya bhāsitaṃ kāyena parikkantaṃ; parikkamitvā katanti
atk-vin02a3:188_1: attho. Saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitāti ettha saratu āyasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a3:188_2: āpajjitā; āyasmā evarūpiyā āpattiyāti ayamattho. Āpajjitvāti vā pāṭho, tassattho
atk-vin02a3:188_3: – paṭhamaṃ āpajjitvā pacchā taṃ āpattiṃ saratu āyasmāti.
atk-vin02a3:191: 202. Yebhuyyasikāya vūpasametunti ettha yassā kiriyāya dhammavādino bahutarā, esā yebhuyyasikā nāma.
atk-vin02a3:192_1: Na ca gatigatanti dve tayo āvāse na gataṃ, tattha tattheva vā dvattikkhattuṃ avinicchitaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:192_2: Na ca saritasāritanti dvattikkhattuṃ tehi bhikkhūhi sayaṃ saritaṃ vā aññehi sāritaṃ
atk-vin02a3:192_3: vā na hoti. Jānātīti salākaṃ gāhento jānāti “adhammavādī bahutarā”ti. Appeva nāmāti
atk-vin02a3:192_4: iminā nīhārena salākāya gāhiyamānāya “api nāma adhammavādino bahutarā assū”ti ayamassa
atk-vin02a3:192_5: ajjhāsayo hoti. Aparesupi dvīsu eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a3:193_0: Adhammena gaṇhantīti adhammavādino “evaṃ mayaṃ bahū bhavissāmā”ti dve dve salākāyo
atk-vin02a3:193_1: gaṇhanti. Vaggā gaṇhantīti dve dhammavādino ekaṃ dhammavādisalākaṃ gaṇhanti “evaṃ
atk-vin02a3:193_2: dhammavādino na bahū bhavissantī”ti maññamānā. Na ca yathādiṭṭhiyā gaṇhantīti dhammavādino
atk-vin02a3:193_4: ayamevattho parivattetvā veditabbo. Evaṃ salākaṃ gāhetvā sace bahutarā dhammavādino
atk-vin02a3:193_5: honti; yathā te vadanti, evaṃ taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ, evaṃ yebhuyyasikāya
atk-vin02a3:193_6: vūpasantaṃ hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana paratopi āgamissati.
atk-vin02a3:196_0: 207. Asucīti asucīhi kāyavacīkammehi samannāgato. Alajjīti sañcicca āpajjanādinā
atk-vin02a3:196_1: alajjilakkhaṇena samannāgato. Sānuvādoti saupavādo. Iti imesañca tiṇṇaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena
atk-vin02a3:196_2: tīṇi karaṇāni, saṅghena karaṇaṃ, dhammena samaggena karaṇanti imāni ca dveti pañca
atk-vin02a3:196_3: tassapāpiyasikākammassa karaṇāni nāma honti. Sesamettha tajjanīyādīsu vuttanayameva.
atk-vin02a3:196_4: Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho – idañhi yo pāpussannatāya pāpiyo puggalo, tassa kattabbato
atk-vin02a3:199_0: 212. Kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāyāti kakkhaḷabhāvāya ceva vāḷabhāvāya ca. Bhedāyāti saṅghabhedāya.
atk-vin02a3:199_1: Sabbeheva ekajjhanti kassaci chandaṃ anāharitvā gilānepi tattheva ānetvā ekato sannipatitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:199_2: Tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyyāti ettha idaṃ kammaṃ tiṇavatthārakasadisattā “tiṇavatthārako”ti
atk-vin02a3:199_3: vuttaṃ. Yathā hi gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā ghaṭṭiyamānaṃ duggandhatāya bādhati, tiṇehi
atk-vin02a3:199_4: avattharitvā suppaṭicchāditassa panassa so gandho na bādhati; evameva yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a3:199_5: mūlānumūlaṃ gantvā vūpasamiyamānaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvattati, taṃ
atk-vin02a3:199_6: iminā kammena vūpasantaṃ gūthaṃ viya tiṇavatthārakena paṭicchannaṃ suvūpasantaṃ hotīti
atk-vin02a3:200: 213. Thullavajjanti pārājikañceva saṅghādisesañca. Gihipaṭisaṃyuttanti gihīnaṃ hīnena khuṃsanavambhanadhammikapaṭissavesu āpannaṃ āpattiṃ.
atk-vin02a3:201_0: 214. Evañca pana bhikkhave te bhikkhū tāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhitā hontīti evaṃ tiṇavatthārakakammavācāya
atk-vin02a3:201_1: katāya kammavācāpariyosāne yattakā tattha sannipatitā antamaso suttāpi samāpannāpi
atk-vin02a3:201_2: aññavihitāpi sabbe te bhikkhū yāva upasampadamaṇḍalato paṭṭhāya thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca
atk-vin02a3:201_3: ṭhapetvā avasesā āpattiyo āpannā, sabbāhi tāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhitā honti. Ye pana “na
atk-vin02a3:201_4: metaṃ khamatī”ti aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ karonti, tehi vā saddhiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi
atk-vin02a3:201_5: tattha anāgatā, āgantvā vā chandaṃ datvā pariveṇādīsu nisinnā, te āpattīhi na vuṭṭhahanti.
atk-vin02a3:201_6: Tena vuttaṃ – “ṭhapetvā diṭṭhāvikammaṃ ṭhapetvā ye na tattha hontī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:204_0: 215. Bhikkhunīnaṃ anupakhajjāti bhikkhunīnaṃ anto pavisitvā. Vivādādhikaraṇādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:204_1: vacanattho duṭṭhadosavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyeva. Vipaccatāya vohāroti cittadukkhatthaṃ
atk-vin02a3:204_2: vohāro; pharusavacananti attho. Yo tattha anuvādoti yo tesu anuvadantesu upavādo.
atk-vin02a3:204_3: Anuvadanāti ākāranidassanametaṃ; upavadanāti attho. Anullapanā anubhaṇanāti ubhayaṃ
atk-vin02a3:204_5: sampavaṅkatā; anuvadanabhāvoti attho. Abbhussahanatāti “kasmā evaṃ na upavadissāmi,
atk-vin02a3:204_6: upavadissāmiyevā”ti ussāhaṃ katvā anuvadanā. Anubalappadānanti purimavacanassa kāraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a3:205_0: Kiccayatā karaṇīyatāti ettha kiccameva kiccayaṃ, kiccayassa bhāvo kiccayatā, karaṇīyassa
atk-vin02a3:205_1: bhāvo karaṇīyatā; ubhayampetaṃ saṅghakammasseva adhivacanaṃ. Apalokanakammantiādi
atk-vin02a3:205_2: pana tasseva pabhedavacanaṃ. Tattha apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā
atk-vin02a3:205_3: chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā
atk-vin02a3:205_4: kattabbakammaṃ. Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya
atk-vin02a3:205_5: ñattiyā kattabbakammaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa
atk-vin02a3:205_6: anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anussāvanāyāti evaṃ ñattidutiyāya anussāvanāya kattabbakammaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:205_7: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā
atk-vin02a3:205_8: tīhi ca anussāvanāhīti evaṃ ñatticatutthāhi tīhi anussāvanāhi kattabbakammaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:206_0: Tattha apalokanakammaṃ apaloketvāva kātabbaṃ, ñattikammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Ñattikammampi
atk-vin02a3:206_1: ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvāva kātabbaṃ, apalokanakammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:206_2: pana apaloketvā kattabbampi atthi, akattabbampi atthi. Tattha sīmāsammuti sīmāsamūhananaṃ
atk-vin02a3:206_3: kathinadānaṃ kathinubbhāro kuṭivatthudesanā vihāravatthudesanāti imāni cha kammāni
atk-vin02a3:206_4: garukāni, apaloketvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭanti. Ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ sāvetvāva kātabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:206_6: lahukakammāni apaloketvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭanti. Ñattikammañatticatutthakammavasena pana
atk-vin02a3:206_7: na kātabbameva. Ñatticatutthakammaṃ ñattiñca tisso ca kammavācāyo sāvetvāva kātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:207_0: Vitthārato pana imāni cattāri kammāni “katihākārehi vipajjantī”tiādinā nayena parivārāvasāne
atk-vin02a3:207_1: kammavagge etesaṃ vinicchayo āgatoyeva. Yaṃ pana tattha anuttānaṃ, taṃ kammavaggeyeva
atk-vin02a3:207_2: vaṇṇayissāma. Evañhi sati na aṭṭhāne vaṇṇanā bhavissati, ādito paṭṭhāya ca tassa
atk-vin02a3:209: 220. “Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusala”ntiādīsu yena vivadanti, so cittuppādo vivādo, samathehi ca adhikaraṇīyatāya adhikaraṇanti evamādinā nayena attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a3:210_0: 222. Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ, natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusalanti
atk-vin02a3:210_1: ettha sandhāya bhāsitavasena attho veditabbo. Yasmiñhi pathavikhaṇanādike āpattādhikaraṇe
atk-vin02a3:210_2: kusalacittaṃ aṅgaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ sati na sakkā vattuṃ “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti,
atk-vin02a3:210_3: tasmā nayidaṃ aṅgappahonakacittaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Idaṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ
atk-vin02a3:210_4: tāva āpattādhikaraṇaṃ lokavajjaṃ, taṃ ekantato akusalameva, tattha “siyā akusala”nti
atk-vin02a3:210_5: vikappo natthi. Yaṃ pana paṇṇattivajjaṃ, taṃ yasmā sañcicca “imaṃ āpattiṃ vītikkamāmī”ti
atk-vin02a3:210_6: vītikkamantasseva akusalaṃ hoti, asañcicca pana kiñci ajānantassa sahaseyyādivasena
atk-vin02a3:210_7: āpajjato abyākataṃ hoti, tasmā tattha sañciccāsañciccavasena imaṃ vikappabhāvaṃ sandhāya
atk-vin02a3:210_8: idaṃ vuttaṃ – “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ, natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti.
atk-vin02a3:211_0: Sace pana “yaṃ kusalacitto āpajjati, idaṃ vuccati āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti vadeyya,
atk-vin02a3:211_1: acittakānaṃ pana eḷakalomapadasodhammādisamuṭṭhānānampi kusalacittaṃ āpajjeyya, na
atk-vin02a3:211_2: ca tattha vijjamānampi kusalacittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ. Kāyavacīviññattivasena pana calitappavattānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:211_3: kāyavācānaṃ aññatarameva aṅgaṃ, tañca rūpakkhandhapariyāpannattā abyākatanti.
atk-vin02a3:212_0: Yaṃ jānantotiādimhi pana ayamattho – yaṃ cittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ hoti, tena vatthuṃ
atk-vin02a3:212_1: jānanto “idaṃ vītikkamāmī”ti ca vītikkamākārena saddhiṃ jānanto sañjānanto vītikkamacetanāvasena
atk-vin02a3:212_2: cetetvā pakappetvā upakkamavasena maddanto abhivitaritvā nirāsaṅkacittaṃ pesetvā
atk-vin02a3:212_3: yaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ vītikkamaṃ āpajjati, tassa evaṃ vītikkamato yo vītikkamo, idaṃ
atk-vin02a3:213_0: Abyākatavārepi yaṃ cittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ hoti, tassa abhāvena ajānanto vītikkamākārena
atk-vin02a3:213_1: ca saddhiṃ ajānanto asañjānanto āpattiaṅgabhūtāya vītikkamacetanāya abhāvena acetetvā
atk-vin02a3:213_2: sañcicca maddanassa abhāvena anabhivitaritvā nirāsaṅkacittaṃ apesetvā yaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a3:213_3: vītikkamaṃ āpajjati, tassa evaṃ vītikkamato yo vītikkamo, idaṃ vuccati “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ abyākata”nti.
atk-vin02a3:214: 224. Ayaṃ vivādo no adhikaraṇantiādīsu samathehi adhikaraṇīyatāya abhāvato noadhikaraṇanti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a3:217: 228. Yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattāti ettha catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro, pañcavaggakaraṇe pañca, dasavaggakaraṇe dasa, vīsativaggakaraṇe vīsati bhikkhū kammappattāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a3:218_0: 230. Supariggahitanti suṭṭhu pariggahitaṃ katvā sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Sampaṭicchitvā
atk-vin02a3:218_1: ca pana “ajja bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovāma, ajja pattaṃ pacāma, ajjeko palibodho atthī”ti mānaniggahatthāya
atk-vin02a3:219_0: 231. Anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyantīti aparimāṇāni ito cito ca vacanāni uppajjanti.
atk-vin02a3:219_1: “Bhāsānī”tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. Ubbāhikāya sammannitabboti apaloketvā vā sammannitabbo
atk-vin02a3:219_2: parato vuttāya ñattidutiyāya vā kammavācāya. Evaṃ sammatehi pana bhikkhūhi visuṃ
atk-vin02a3:219_3: vā nisīditvā tassāyeva vā parisāya “aññehi asammatehi na kiñci kathetabba”nti sāvetvā
atk-vin02a3:220_0: 233. Tatrāssāti tassaṃ parisati bhaveyya. Neva suttaṃ āgatanti na mātikā āgatā. No
atk-vin02a3:220_1: suttavibhaṅgoti vinayopi na paguṇo. Byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhatīti byañjanamattameva
atk-vin02a3:220_3: bhikkhūhi āpattiyā kāriyamāne disvā “kiṃ ime āpattiyā kāretha, ‘nanu jātarūparajatapaṭiggahaṇā
atk-vin02a3:220_4: paṭivirato hotī’ti evaṃ sutte paṭiviratimattameva vuttaṃ, natthi ettha āpattī”ti
atk-vin02a3:220_5: vadati. Aparo dhammakathiko suttassa āgatattā olambetvā nivāsentānaṃ āpattiyā āropiyamānāya
atk-vin02a3:220_6: “kiṃ imesaṃ āpattiṃ ropetha, ‘nanu parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā’ti
atk-vin02a3:220_7: evaṃ sikkhākaraṇamattamevettha vuttaṃ, natthi ettha āpattī”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a3:221: 234. Yathā bahutarā bhikkhūti ettha ekenapi adhikā bahutarāva ko pana vādo dvīhi tīhīti.
atk-vin02a3:224_0: 235. Saññattiyāti saññāpanatthāya. Gūḷhakantiādīsu alajjussannāya parisāya gūḷhako
atk-vin02a3:224_1: salākaggāho kātabbo, lajjussannāya parisāya vivaṭako, bālussannāya sakaṇṇajappako.
atk-vin02a3:224_2: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇāyo katvāti dhammavādīnañca adhammavādīnañca salākāyo nimittasaññaṃ āropetvā
atk-vin02a3:224_3: aññamaññaṃ visabhāgā kātabbā. Tato tā sabbāpi cīvarabhoge katvā vuttanayena gāhetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:224_4: Duggahoti paccukkaḍḍhitabbanti “duggahitā salākāyo”ti vatvā puna gahetvā yāvatatiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:224_5: gāhetabbā. Suggahoti sāvetabbanti ekasmimpi dhammavādimhi atirekajāte “suggahitā
atk-vin02a3:224_6: salākāyo”ti sāvetabbaṃ. Yathā ca te dhammavādino vadanti tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbanti.
atk-vin02a3:224_7: Atha yāvatatiyampi adhammavādinova bahutarā honti, ajja “akālo, sve jānissāmā”ti
atk-vin02a3:224_8: vuṭṭhahitvā alajjīnaṃ pakkhabhedatthāya dhammavādipakkhaṃ pariyesitvā punadivase
atk-vin02a3:225_0: Sakaṇṇajappake pana gahite vattabboti ettha sace saṅghatthero adhammavādisalākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:225_1: gaṇhāti, so evaṃ avabodhetabbo – “bhante, tumhe mahallakā vayoanuppattā, tumhākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:225_2: etaṃ na yuttaṃ, ayaṃ pana dhammavādisalākā”ti assa itarā salākā dassetabbā. Sace
atk-vin02a3:225_3: so taṃ gaṇhāti, dātabbā. Atha neva avabujjhati, tato “mā kassaci ārocehī”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin02a3:228_0: 238. Pārājikasāmantaṃ vāti ettha methunadhamme pārājikasāmantaṃ nāma dukkaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:228_1: Adinnādānādīsu thullaccayaṃ. Nibbeṭhentanti “na sarāmī”ti vacanena nibbeṭhayamānaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:228_2: Ativeṭhetīti “iṅghāyasmā”tiādivacanehi ativeṭhiyati. Sarāmi kho ahaṃ āvusoti pārājikapaṭicchādanatthāya
atk-vin02a3:228_3: evaṃ paṭijānāti. Puna tena ativeṭhiyamāno “sarāmi kho”ti paṭiññaṃ datvā “idāni maṃ
atk-vin02a3:228_4: nāsessantī”ti bhayena “davāya me”tiādimāha. Etassa tassapāpiyasikākammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:228_5: Sace sīlavā bhavissati, vattaṃ paripūretvā paṭippassaddhiṃ labhati, no ce tathā nāsitakova
atk-vin02a3:233_1: nāgarikamanussā. Gāmamoddavātipi pāṭho; esevattho. Thambheti nhānatitthe nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitatthambhe.
atk-vin02a3:234_0: Kuṭṭeti iṭṭhakāsilādārukuṭṭānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. Aṭṭāne nhāyantīti ettha aṭṭānaṃ nāma
atk-vin02a3:234_1: rukkhaṃ phalakaṃ viya tacchetvā aṭṭhapadākārena rājiyo chinditvā nhānatitthe nikhaṇanti,
atk-vin02a3:234_2: tattha cuṇṇāni ākiritvā manussā kāyaṃ ghaṃsanti. Gandhabbahatthakenāti nhānatitthe
atk-vin02a3:234_3: ṭhapitena dārumayahatthena, tena kira cuṇṇāni gahetvā manussā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti.
atk-vin02a3:234_5: vuccati, taṃ ubhosu antesu gahetvā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti. Viggayha parikammaṃ kārāpentīti
atk-vin02a3:234_6: aññamaññaṃ sarīrena sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti. Mallakaṃ nāma makaradantake chinditvā mallakamūlasaṇṭhānena
atk-vin02a3:234_7: kataṃ mallakanti vuccati, idaṃ gilānassāpi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:235_0: 244. Akatamallakaṃ nāma dante acchinditvā kataṃ, idaṃ agilānasseva na vaṭṭati; iṭṭhakākhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a3:235_1: pana kapālakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati. Ukkāsikanti vatthavaṭṭiṃ; tasmā nhāyantassa yassa
atk-vin02a3:235_2: kassaci nhānasāṭakavaṭṭiyā piṭṭhiṃ ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭati. Puthupāṇikanti hatthaparikammaṃ
