atk-vin02a3:235_3: vuccati, tasmā sabbesaṃ hatthena piṭṭhiparikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:236_0: 245. Vallikāti kaṇṇato nikkhantamuttolambakādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ; na kevalañca
atk-vin02a3:236_1: vallikā eva, yaṃkiñci kaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ antamaso tālapaṇṇampi na vaṭṭati. Pāmaṅganti
atk-vin02a3:236_2: yaṃkiñci palambakasuttaṃ. Kaṇṭhasuttakanti yaṃkiñci gīvūpagaābharaṇaṃ. Kaṭisuttakanti
atk-vin02a3:236_3: yaṃkiñci kaṭipiḷandhanaṃ antamaso suttatantumattampi. Ovaṭṭikanti valayaṃ. Kāyūrādīni
atk-vin02a3:236_4: pākaṭāneva, akkhakānaṃ heṭṭhā bāhābharaṇaṃ yaṃkiñci ābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:237_0: 246. Dumāsikaṃ vā duvaṅgulaṃ vāti ettha sace kesā antodvemāse dvaṅgulaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-vin02a3:237_1: antodvemāseva chinditabbā. Dvaṅgulehi atikkāmetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sacepi na dīghā, dvemāsato
atk-vin02a3:237_2: ekadivasampi atikkāmetuṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva; evamayaṃ ubhayenapi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedova
atk-vin02a3:237_3: vutto, tato oraṃ pana navaṭṭanabhāvo nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a3:238_0: Kocchena osaṇṭhentīti kocchena olikhitvā sannisīdāpenti. Phaṇakenāti dantamayādīsu
atk-vin02a3:238_1: yena kenaci. Hatthaphaṇakenāti hattheneva phaṇakiccaṃ karontā aṅgulīhi osaṇṭhenti.
atk-vin02a3:238_2: Sitthatelakenāti madhusitthakaniyyāsādīsu yena kenaci cikkalena. Udakatelakenāti
atk-vin02a3:238_3: udakamissakena telena. Maṇḍanatthāya sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ, uddhalomena pana anulomanipātanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a3:238_4: hatthaṃ temetvā sīsaṃ puñchitabbaṃ. Uṇhābhitattarajasirānampi allahatthena puñchituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:239_0: 247. Na bhikkhave ādāse vā udakapatte vāti ettha kaṃsapattādīnipi yesu mukhanimittaṃ
atk-vin02a3:239_1: paññāyati, sabbāni ādāsasaṅkhameva gacchanti. Kañjiyādīnipi ca udakapattasaṅkhameva.
atk-vin02a3:239_2: Tasmā yattha katthaci olokentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Ābādhapaccayāti “sañchavi nu kho me vaṇo,
atk-vin02a3:239_3: udāhu na tāvā”ti jānanatthaṃ; “jiṇṇo nu khomhi no”ti evaṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokanatthampi vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:240_0: Mukhaṃ ālimpantīti vippasannachavirāgakarehi mukhālepanehi ālimpanti. Ummaddentīti
atk-vin02a3:240_1: nānāummaddanehi ummaddenti. Cuṇṇentīti mukhacuṇṇakena makkhenti. Manosilikāya mukhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:240_2: lañchentīti manosilāya tilakādīni lañchanāni karonti, tāni haritālādīhipi na vaṭṭantiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:241_0: 248. Na bhikkhave naccaṃ vātiādīsu yaṃkiñci naccaṃ antamaso moranaccampi dassanāya
atk-vin02a3:241_1: gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sayampi naccantassa vā naccāpentassa vā dukkaṭameva. Gītampi
atk-vin02a3:241_2: yaṃkiñci naṭagītaṃ vā sādhugītaṃ vā antamaso dantagītampi “yaṃ gāyissāmā”ti pubbabhāge
atk-vin02a3:241_3: okūjantā karonti, etampi na vaṭṭati. Sayaṃ gāyantassāpi gāyāpentassāpi dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin02a3:241_4: Vāditampi yaṃkiñci na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana niṭṭhubhanto vā sāsaṅke vā ṭhito accharikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:241_5: vā phoṭeti, pāṇiṃ vā paharati, tattha anāpatti. Sabbaṃ antarārāme ṭhitassa passato
atk-vin02a3:241_6: anāpatti. “Passissāmī”ti vihārato vihāraṃ gacchantassa āpattiyeva. Āsanasālāya nisinno
atk-vin02a3:241_7: passati, anāpatti. “Passissāmī”ti uṭṭhahitvā gacchato āpatti. Vīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā gīvaṃ
atk-vin02a3:242_0: 249. Sarakuttinti sarakiriyaṃ. Bhaṅgo hotīti aladdhaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkoti; laddhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:242_1: samāpajjituṃ. Pacchimā janatāti amhākaṃ ācariyāpi upajjhāyāpi evaṃ gāyiṃsūti pacchimo
atk-vin02a3:242_2: jano diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati; tatheva gāyati. Na bhikkhave āyatakenāti ettha āyatako
atk-vin02a3:242_3: nāma taṃ taṃ vattaṃ bhinditvā akkharāni vināsetvā pavatto. Dhamme pana suttantavattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:242_4: nāma atthi, jātakavattaṃ nāma atthi, gāthāvattaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ vināsetvā atidīghaṃ
atk-vin02a3:242_5: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Caturassena vattena parimaṇḍalāni padabyañjanāni dassetabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:242_6: Sarabhaññanti sarena bhaṇanaṃ. Sarabhaññe kira taraṅgavattadhotakavattagalitavattādīni
atk-vin02a3:242_7: dvattiṃsa vattāni atthi. Tesu yaṃ icchati, taṃ kātuṃ labhati. Sabbesaṃ padabyañjanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:242_8: avināsetvā vikāraṃ akatvā samaṇasāruppena caturassena nayena pavattanaṃyeva lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:243_0: Bāhiralomiṃ uṇṇinti uṇṇalomāni bahi katvā uṇṇapāvāraṃ pārupanti; tathā dhārentassa
atk-vin02a3:243_1: dukkaṭaṃ. Lomāni anto katvā pārupituṃ vaṭṭati. Samaṇakappakathā bhūtagāmasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttā.
atk-vin02a3:244_0: 251. Na bhikkhave attano aṅgajātanti aṅgajātaṃ chindantasseva thullaccayaṃ. Aññaṃ
atk-vin02a3:244_1: pana kaṇṇanāsāaṅguliādiṃ yaṃkiñci chindantassa tādisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ uppādentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:244_2: Ahikīṭadaṭṭhādīsu pana aññaābādhapaccayā vā lohitaṃ vā mocentassa chindantassa vā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a3:245_0: 252. Candanagaṇṭhi uppannā hotīti candanaghaṭikā uppannā hoti. So kira uddhañca adho
atk-vin02a3:245_1: ca jālāni parikkhipāpetvā gaṅgāya nadiyā kīḷati, tassa nadīsotena vuyhamānā candanagaṇṭhi
atk-vin02a3:245_2: āgantvā jāle laggā, tamassa purisā āharitvā adaṃsu; evaṃ sā uppannā hoti. Iddhipāṭihāriyanti
atk-vin02a3:245_3: ettha vikubbaniddhipāṭihāriyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ, adhiṭṭhāniddhi pana appaṭikkhittāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a3:246_0: Na bhikkhave sovaṇṇamayo pattotiādīsu sacepi gihī bhattagge suvaṇṇataṭṭikādīsu byañjanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:246_1: katvā upanāmenti, āmasitumpi na vaṭṭati. Phalikamayakācamayakaṃsamayāni pana taṭṭikādīni
atk-vin02a3:246_2: bhājanāni puggalikaparibhogeneva na vaṭṭanti, saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭāni
atk-vin02a3:246_3: vā vaṭṭanti. “Tambalohamayopi pattova na vaṭṭati, thālakaṃ pana vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-vin02a3:246_4: kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Maṇimayoti ettha pana indanīlādimaṇimayo vutto. Kaṃsamayoti ettha
atk-vin02a3:248_1: kate bhūmiādhārake tayo, dāruādhārake dve patte uparūpari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:248_2: vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ – “bhūmiādhārake tiṇṇaṃ pattānaṃ anokāso, dve
atk-vin02a3:248_3: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dāruādhārakadaṇḍādhārakesupi susajjitesu eseva nayo. Bhamakoṭisadiso
atk-vin02a3:248_4: pana dāruādhārako tīhi daṇḍakehi baddho daṇḍakādhāro ca ekassapi pattassa anokāso,
atk-vin02a3:248_5: tattha ṭhapetvāpi hatthena gahetvā eva nisīditabbaṃ. Bhūmiyaṃ pana nikkujjitvā ekameva ṭhapetabba”nti.
atk-vin02a3:249_0: Miḍḍhanteti ālindakamiḍḍhikādīnaṃ ante. Sace pana parivattetvā tattheva patiṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a3:249_1: evarūpāya vitthiṇṇāya miḍḍhiyā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Paribhaṇḍanteti bāhirapasse katāya
atk-vin02a3:249_2: tanukamiḍḍhikāya ante. Miḍḍhiyaṃ vuttanayenevetthāpi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin02a3:250_0: Coḷakanti yaṃ pattharitvā patto ṭhapīyati; tasmiṃ pana asati kaṭasārake vā taṭṭikāya
atk-vin02a3:250_1: vā mattikāparibhaṇḍakatāya bhūmiyā vā yattha na dussati, tathārūpāya vālikāya vā
atk-vin02a3:250_2: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Paṃsurajādīsu pana kharabhūmiyaṃ vā ṭhapentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Pattamāḷakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:250_3: iṭṭhakāhi vā dārūhi vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Pattakuṇḍolikāti mahāmukhakuṇḍasaṇṭhānā bhaṇḍakukkhalikā
atk-vin02a3:250_4: vuccati. Yo laggeyyāti yattha katthaci laggentassa dukkaṭameva. Cīvaravaṃsepi bandhitvā
atk-vin02a3:250_5: ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanatthameva vā kataṃ hotu nisīdanasayanatthaṃ vā
atk-vin02a3:250_6: yattha katthaci mañce vā pīṭhe vā ṭhapentassa dukkaṭaṃ, aññena pana bhaṇḍakena saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a3:250_7: bandhitvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Aṭaniyaṃ bandhitvā olambetuṃ vā vaṭṭati, bandhitvāpi
atk-vin02a3:250_8: upari ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva. Sace pana mañco vā pīṭhaṃ vā ukkhipitvā cīvaravaṃsādīsu
atk-vin02a3:250_9: aṭṭakachannena ṭhapitaṃ hoti, tattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Aṃsavaddhanakena aṃsakūṭe
atk-vin02a3:250_10: laggetvā aṅke ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Chatte bhattapūropi aṃsakūṭe laggitapattopi ṭhapetuṃ
atk-vin02a3:250_11: na vaṭṭati, bhaṇḍakena pana saddhiṃ bandhitvā vā aṭṭakaṃ katvā vā ṭhapite yo koci ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:251_0: 255. Pattahatthenāti ettha na kevalaṃ yassa patto hatthe, so eva pattahattho, na
atk-vin02a3:251_1: kevalañca kavāṭameva paṇāmetuṃ na labhati; apica kho pana hatthe vā piṭṭhipāde vā
atk-vin02a3:251_2: yattha katthaci sarīrāvayave pattasmiṃ sati hatthena vā pādena vā sīsena vā yena
atk-vin02a3:251_3: kenaci sarīrāvayavena kavāṭaṃ vā paṇāmetuṃ ghaṭikaṃ vā ukkhipituṃ sūciṃ vā kuñcikāya
atk-vin02a3:251_4: apāpurituṃ na labhati. Aṃsakūṭe pana pattaṃ laggetvā yathāsukhaṃ avāpurituṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a3:252_0: Tumbakaṭāhanti lābukaṭāhaṃ vuccati, taṃ pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati. Labhitvā pana tāvakālikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:252_1: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Ghaṭikaṭāhepi eseva nayo. Ghaṭikaṭāhanti ghaṭikapālaṃ. Abhuṃ
atk-vin02a3:252_2: meti utrāsavacanametaṃ. Sabbapaṃsukūlikenāti ettha cīvarañca mañcapīṭhañca paṃsukūlaṃ
atk-vin02a3:253_0: Calakānīti cabbetvā apaviddhāmisāni. Aṭṭhikānīti macchamaṃsaaṭṭhikāni. Ucchiṭṭhodakanti
atk-vin02a3:253_1: mukhavikkhālanodakaṃ. Etesu yaṃkiñci pattena nīharantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ
atk-vin02a3:253_2: katvā hatthaṃ dhovitumpi na labhati. Hatthadhotapādadhotaudakampi patte ākiritvā
atk-vin02a3:253_3: nīharituṃ na vaṭṭati. Anucchiṭṭhaṃ suddhapattaṃ ucchiṭṭhahatthena gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:253_4: vāmahatthena panettha udakaṃ āsiñcitvā ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvā ucchiṭṭhahatthena
atk-vin02a3:253_5: gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Ettāvatāpi hi so ucchiṭṭhapatto hoti, hatthaṃ pana bahi udakena
atk-vin02a3:253_6: vikkhāletvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Macchamaṃsaphalāphalādīni khādanto yaṃ tattha aṭṭhiṃ
atk-vin02a3:253_7: vā calakaṃ vā chaḍḍetukāmo hoti, taṃ patte ṭhapetuṃ na labhati. Yaṃ pana paṭikhāditukāmo
atk-vin02a3:253_8: hoti, taṃ patte ṭhapetuṃ labhati. Aṭṭhikakaṇṭakādīni tattheva katvā hatthena luñcitvā
atk-vin02a3:253_9: khādituṃ vaṭṭati. Mukhato nīhaṭaṃ pana yaṃkiñci puna khāditukāmo hoti, taṃ patte
atk-vin02a3:253_10: ṭhapetuṃ na labhati. Siṅgiveranāḷikerakhaṇḍāni ḍaṃsitvā puna ṭhapetuṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a3:254: 256. Namatakanti satthakaveṭhanakaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ. Daṇḍasatthakanti pipphalakaṃ vā aññampi vā yaṃkiñci daṇḍaṃ yojetvā katasatthakaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:255_0: Kaṇṇakitā hontīti malaggahitā honti. Kiṇṇena pūretunti kiṇṇacuṇṇena pūretuṃ. Sattuyāti
atk-vin02a3:255_1: haliddimissakena piṭṭhacuṇṇena. Saritakanti pāsāṇacuṇṇaṃ vuccati; tena pūretuṃ anujānāmīti
atk-vin02a3:255_2: attho. Madhusitthakena sāretunti madhusitthakena makkhetuṃ. Saritakaṃ paribhijjatīti
atk-vin02a3:255_3: taṃ makkhitamadhusitthakaṃ bhijjati. Saritasipāṭikanti madhusitthakapilotikaṃ; satthakosakasipāṭiyā
atk-vin02a3:255_4: pana saritasipāṭikāya anulomāti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Kathinanti nisseṇimpi tattha attharitabbakaṭasārakakilañjānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:255_5: aññatarampi. Kathinarajjunti yāya dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ sibbantā kathine cīvarampi bandhanti.
atk-vin02a3:255_6: Kathinaṃ nappahotīti dīghassa bhikkhuno pamāṇena kataṃ kathinaṃ; tattha rassassa
atk-vin02a3:255_7: bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ patthariyamānaṃ nappahoti, antoyeva hoti; daṇḍake na pāpuṇātīti
atk-vin02a3:255_8: attho. Daṇḍakathinanti tassa majjhe itarassa bhikkhuno pamāṇena aññaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:256_0: Bidalakanti daṇḍakathinappamāṇena kaṭasārakassa pariyante paṭisaṃharitvā duguṇakaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:256_1: Salākanti dupaṭṭacīvarassa antare pavesanasalākaṃ. Vinandhanarajjunti mahānisseṇiyā
atk-vin02a3:256_2: saddhiṃ khuddakaṃ nisseṇiṃ vinandhituṃ rajjuṃ. Vinandhanasuttanti khuddakanisseṇiyā
atk-vin02a3:256_3: cīvaraṃ vinandhituṃ suttakaṃ. Vinandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbetunti tena suttakena tattha
atk-vin02a3:256_4: cīvaraṃ vinandhitvā sibbituṃ. Visamā hontīti kāci khuddakā honti, kāci mahantā. Kaḷimbhakanti
atk-vin02a3:256_5: pamāṇasaññākaraṇaṃ yaṃkiñci tālapaṇṇādiṃ. Moghasuttakanti vaḍḍhakīnaṃ dārūsu kāḷasuttena
atk-vin02a3:256_6: viya haliddisuttena saññākaraṇaṃ. Aṅguliyā paṭiggaṇhantīti sūcimukhaṃ aṅguliyā paṭicchanti.
atk-vin02a3:257_0: 257. Āvesanavitthakaṃ nāma yaṃkiñci pāticaṅkoṭakādi. Uccavatthukanti paṃsuṃ ākiritvā
atk-vin02a3:257_1: uccavatthukaṃ kātuṃ anujānāmīti attho. Ogumphetvā ullittāvalittaṃ kātunti chadanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:257_2: odhunitvā ghanadaṇḍakaṃ katvā anto ceva bahi ca mattikāya limpitunti attho. Goghaṃsikāyāti
atk-vin02a3:257_3: veḷuṃ vā rukkhadaṇḍaṃ vā antokatvā tena saddhiṃ saṅgharitunti attho. Bandhanarajjunti
atk-vin02a3:258: 258. Kaṭacchuparissāvanaṃ nāma tīsu daṇḍakesu vinandhitvā kataṃ.
atk-vin02a3:259_0: 259. Yo na dadeyyāti aparissāvanakasseva yo na dadāti, tassa āpatti. Yo pana attano
atk-vin02a3:259_1: hatthe parissāvane vijjamānepi yācati, tassa na akāmā dātabbaṃ. Daṇḍaparissāvananti
atk-vin02a3:259_2: rajakānaṃ khāraparissāvanaṃ viya catūsu pādesu baddhanisseṇikāya sāṭakaṃ bandhitvā
atk-vin02a3:259_3: majjhedaṇḍake udakaṃ āsiñcitabbaṃ, taṃ ubhopi koṭṭhāse pūretvā parissavati. Ottharakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:259_4: nāma yaṃ udake ottharitvā ghaṭakena udakaṃ gaṇhanti, tañhi catūsu daṇḍakesu vatthaṃ
atk-vin02a3:259_5: bandhitvā udake cattāro khāṇuke nikhaṇitvā tesu bandhitvā sabbapariyante udakato
atk-vin02a3:259_6: mocetvā majjhe ottharitvā ghaṭena udakaṃ gaṇhanti. Makasakuṭikāti cīvarakuṭikā vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:260_0: 260. Abhisannakāyāti semhādidosussannakāyā. Aggaḷavaṭṭi nāma dvārabāhāya samappamāṇoyeva
atk-vin02a3:260_1: aggaḷatthambho vuccati, yattha tīṇi cattāri chiddāni katvā sūciyo denti. Kapisīsakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:260_2: nāma dvārabāhaṃ vijjhitvā tattha pavesito aggaḷapāsako vuccati. Sūcikāti tattha majjhe
atk-vin02a3:260_3: chiddaṃ katvā pavesitā. Ghaṭikāti upari yojitā. Maṇḍalikaṃ kātunti nīcavatthukaṃ
atk-vin02a3:260_4: cinituṃ. Dhūmanettanti dhūmanikkhamanachiddaṃ. Vāsetunti gandhena vāsetuṃ. Udakaṭṭhānanti
atk-vin02a3:260_5: udakatthapanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha ghaṭena udakaṃ ṭhapetvā sarāvakena vaḷañjetabbaṃ. Koṭṭhakoti dvārakoṭṭhako.
atk-vin02a3:261_0: 261. Tisso paṭicchādiyoti ettha jantāgharapaṭicchādi ca udakapaṭicchādi ca parikammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:261_1: karontasseva vaṭṭati, sesesu abhivādanādīsu na vaṭṭati. Vatthapaṭicchādi sabbakammesu
atk-vin02a3:261_2: vaṭṭati. Udakaṃ na hotīti nhānodakaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a3:262_0: 262. Tulanti paṇṇikānaṃ viya udakaubbāhanakatulaṃ. Karakaṭako vuccati goṇe vā yojetvā
atk-vin02a3:262_1: hatthehi vā gahetvā dīghavarattādīhi ākaḍḍhanayantaṃ. Cakkavaṭṭakanti arahaṭaghaṭiyantaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:262_2: Cammakhaṇḍaṃ nāma tulāya vā karakaṭake vā yojetabbakaṃ cammabhājanaṃ. Pākaṭā hotīti
atk-vin02a3:262_3: aparikkhittā hoti. Udakapuñchanīti daṇḍamayāpi visāṇamayāpi dārumayāpi vaṭṭati, tassā
atk-vin02a3:263_0: 263. Udakamātikanti udakassa āgamanamātikaṃ. Nillekhajantāgharaṃ nāma āviddhapakkhapāsakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:263_1: vuccati, gopānasīnaṃ upari maṇḍale pakkhapāsake ṭhapetvā katakūṭacchadanassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:263_2: Cātumāsaṃ nisīdanenāti nisīdanena cattāro māse na vippavasitabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a3:264_0: 264. Pupphābhikiṇṇesūti pupphehi santhatesu. Namatakaṃ nāma eḷakalomehi kataṃ avāyimaṃ
atk-vin02a3:264_1: cammakhaṇḍaparihārena paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Āsittakūpadhānaṃ nāma tambalohena vā rajatena
atk-vin02a3:264_2: vā katāya peḷāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ, paṭikkhittattā pana dārumayāpi na vaṭṭati. Maḷorikāti
atk-vin02a3:264_4: Ādhārakasaṅkhepagamanato hi paṭṭhāya chiddaṃ viddhampi aviddhampi vaṭṭatiyeva. Ekabhājaneti
atk-vin02a3:264_5: ettha sace eko bhikkhu bhājanato phalaṃ vā pūvaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati, tasmiṃ apagate
atk-vin02a3:264_6: itarassa sesakaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Itarassāpi tasmiṃ khīṇe puna gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:265_0: 265. Aṭṭhahaṅgehīti ettha ekekenapi aṅgena samannāgatassa antosīmāya vā nissīmaṃ
atk-vin02a3:265_1: gantvā nadīādīsu vā nikkujjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Evaṃ nikkujjite pana patte tassa gehe
atk-vin02a3:265_2: koci deyyadhammo na gahetabbo – “asukassa gehe bhikkhaṃ mā gaṇhitthā”ti aññesu vihāresupi
atk-vin02a3:265_3: pesetabbaṃ. Ukkujjanakāle pana yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā hatthapāsaṃ vijahāpetvā ñattidutiyakammena ukkujjitabbo.
atk-vin02a3:266_0: 268. Purakkhatvāti aggato katvā. Saṃharantūti saṃhariyantu. Celapaṭikanti celasantharaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:266_1: So kira “sace ahaṃ puttaṃ lacchāmi, akkamissati me bhagavā celapaṭika”nti iminā ajjhāsayena
atk-vin02a3:266_2: santhari, abhabbo cesa puttalābhāya; tasmā bhagavā na akkami. Yadi akkameyya, pacchā
atk-vin02a3:266_3: puttaṃ alabhanto “nāyaṃ sabbaññū”ti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇheyya. Idaṃ tāva bhagavato anakkamane
atk-vin02a3:266_4: kāraṇaṃ. Yasmā pana bhikkhūpi ye ajānantā akkameyyuṃ, te gihīnaṃ paribhūtā bhaveyyuṃ;
atk-vin02a3:266_5: tasmā bhikkhū paribhavato mocetuṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi. Idaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpane kāraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:267_0: Maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānenāti apagatagabbhā vā hotu garugabbhā vā, evarūpesu ṭhānesu
atk-vin02a3:267_1: maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānena akkamituṃ vaṭṭati. Dhotapādakaṃ nāma pādadhovanaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a3:267_2: dhotehi pādehi akkamanatthāya paccattharaṇaṃ atthataṃ hoti, taṃ akkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:268_0: 269. Katakaṃ nāma padumakaṇṇikākāraṃ pādaghaṃsanatthaṃ kaṇṭake uṭṭhāpetvā kataṃ.
atk-vin02a3:268_1: Taṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā hotu caturassādibhedaṃ vā, bāhulikānuyogattā paṭikkhittameva, neva
atk-vin02a3:268_2: paṭiggahetuṃ na paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sakkharāti pāsāṇo vuccati; pāsāṇapheṇakopi
atk-vin02a3:268_3: vaṭṭati. Vidhūpananti vījanī vuccati. Tālavaṇṭaṃ pana tālapaṇṇehi vā kataṃ hotu veḷudantavilīvehi
atk-vin02a3:268_4: vā morapiñchehi vā cammavikatīhi vā sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Makasabījanī dantamayavisāṇamayadaṇḍakāpi
atk-vin02a3:269_0: 270. Gilānassa chattanti ettha yassa kāyaḍāho vā pittakopo vā hoti, cakkhu vā dubbalaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:269_1: añño vā koci ābādho vinā chattena uppajjati, tassa gāme vā araññe vā chattaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:269_2: Vasse pana cīvaraguttatthaṃ vāḷamigacorabhayesu ca attaguttatthampi vaṭṭati. Ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:270_0: Asissāti asi assa. Vijjotalatīti vijjotati. Daṇḍasammutinti ettha pamāṇayutto catuhatthoyeva
atk-vin02a3:270_1: daṇḍo sammannitvā dātabbo. Tato ūnātiritto vināpi sammutiyā sabbesaṃ vaṭṭati. Sikkā
atk-vin02a3:270_2: pana agilānassa na vaṭṭati, gilānassāpi sammannitvāva dātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:271: 273. Romanthakassāti ettha ṭhapetvā romanthakaṃ sesānaṃ āgataṃ uggāraṃ mukhe sandhāretvā gilantānaṃ āpatti. Sace pana asandhāritameva paragalaṃ gacchati, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:272: Yaṃ diyyamānanti yaṃ dāyakehi diyyamānaṃ paṭiggahitabhājanato bahi patitaṃ, taṃ bhikkhunā sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmīti attho. Idaṃ bhojanavagge vaṇṇitameva.
atk-vin02a3:273_0: 274. Kuppaṃ karissāmīti saddaṃ karissāmi. Nakhādīhi nakhacchedane āpatti natthi,
atk-vin02a3:273_1: anurakkhaṇatthaṃ pana nakhacchedanaṃ anuññātaṃ. Vīsatimaṭṭhanti vīsatipi nakhe likhitamaṭṭhe
atk-vin02a3:273_2: kārāpenti. Malamattanti nakhato malamattaṃ apakaḍḍhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:274_0: 275. Khurasipāṭikanti khurakosakaṃ. Massuṃ kappāpentīti kattariyā massuṃ chedāpenti.
atk-vin02a3:274_1: Massuṃ vaḍḍhāpentīti massuṃ dīghaṃ kārenti. Golomikanti hanukamhi dīghaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ
atk-vin02a3:274_2: eḷakamassu vuccati. Caturassakanti catukoṇaṃ. Parimukhanti ure lomasaṃharaṇaṃ. Aḍḍhadukanti
atk-vin02a3:274_3: udare lomarājiṭṭhapanaṃ. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti massukappāpanādīsu sabbattha āpatti
atk-vin02a3:274_4: dukkaṭassa. Ābādhappaccayā sambādhe lomanti gaṇḍavaṇarudhiādiābādhappaccayā. Kattarikāyāti
atk-vin02a3:274_6: Anurakkhaṇatthaṃ pana saṇḍāso anuññāto. Na bhikkhave palitaṃ gāhāpetabbanti ettha
atk-vin02a3:274_7: yaṃ bhamukāya vā nalāṭe vā dāṭhikāya vā uggantvā bībhacchaṃ ṭhitaṃ, tādisaṃ lomaṃ
atk-vin02a3:274_8: palitaṃ vā apalitaṃ vā gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:276_0: 278. Na bhikkhave akāyabandhanenāti ettha abandhitvā nikkhamantena yattha sarati,
atk-vin02a3:276_1: tattha bandhitabbaṃ. Āsanasālāya bandhissāmīti gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Saritvā yāva na bandhati,
atk-vin02a3:276_2: na tāva piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ. Kalābukaṃ nāma bahurajjukaṃ. Deḍḍubhakaṃ nāma udakasappasīsasadisaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:276_3: Murajaṃ nāma murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ. Maddavīṇaṃ nāma pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:276_4: Īdisañhi ekampi na vaṭṭati, pageva bahūni. Paṭṭikaṃ sūkarantakanti ettha pakativītā
atk-vin02a3:276_5: vā macchakaṇṭakavāyimā vā paṭṭikā vaṭṭati, sesā kuñjaracchikādibhedā na vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin02a3:276_6: Sūkarantakaṃ nāma kuñjikākosakasaṇṭhānaṃ hoti. Ekarajjukaṃ pana muddikakāyabandhanañca
atk-vin02a3:276_7: sūkarantakaṃ anulometi. Anujānāmi bhikkhave murajaṃ maddavīṇanti idaṃ dasāsuyeva
atk-vin02a3:276_8: anuññātaṃ. Pāmaṅgadasā cettha catunnaṃ upari na vaṭṭati. Sobhaṇaṃ nāma veṭhetvā mukhavaṭṭisibbanaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:276_9: Guṇakaṃ nāma mudiṅgasaṇṭhānena sibbanaṃ; evaṃ sibbitā hi antā thirā honti. Pavanantoti pāsanto vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:277_0: 280. Hatthisoṇḍakaṃ nāma nābhimūlato hatthisoṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ olambakaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ
atk-vin02a3:277_1: coḷikaitthīnaṃ nivāsanaṃ viya. Macchavāḷakaṃ nāma ekato dasantaṃ ekato pāsantaṃ olambetvā
atk-vin02a3:277_2: nivatthaṃ. Catukaṇṇakaṃ nāma upari dve, heṭṭhato dveti evaṃ cattāro kaṇṇe dassetvā
atk-vin02a3:277_3: nivatthaṃ. Tālavaṇṭakaṃ nāma tālavaṇṭākārena sāṭakaṃ olambetvā nivāsanaṃ. Satavalikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:277_4: nāma dīghasāṭakaṃ anekakkhattuṃ obhañjitvā ovaṭṭikaṃ karontena nivatthaṃ, vāmadakkhiṇapassesu
atk-vin02a3:277_5: vā nirantaraṃ valiyo dassetvā nivatthaṃ. Sace pana jāṇuto paṭṭhāya ekā vā dve vā
atk-vin02a3:278_0: Saṃvelliyaṃ nivāsentīti mallakammakārādayo viya kacchaṃ bandhitvā nivāsenti; evaṃ
atk-vin02a3:278_1: nivāsetuṃ gilānassapi maggappaṭipannassapi na vaṭṭati. Yampi maggaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ
atk-vin02a3:278_2: vā dve vā koṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari laggenti, anto vā ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ tathā
atk-vin02a3:278_3: nivāsetvā bahi aparaṃ nivāsenti, sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati. Gilāno pana anto kāsāvassa ovaṭṭikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:278_4: dassetvā aparaṃ upari nivāsetuṃ labhati. Agilānena dve nivāsentena saguṇaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a3:278_5: nivāsetabbāni. Iti yañca idha paṭikkhittaṃ, yañca sekhiyavaṇṇanāyaṃ; taṃ sabbaṃ vajjetvā
atk-vin02a3:278_6: nibbikāraṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ. Yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:278_7: karonto dukkaṭā na muccati. Na bhikkhave gihipārutaṃ pārupitabbanti evaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ
atk-vin02a3:278_8: gihipārutaṃ apārupitvā, ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā pārupanaṃ parimaṇḍalapārupanaṃ nāma, taṃ pārupitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:279_0: Tattha yaṃkiñci setapaṭapārutaṃ paribbājakapārutaṃ ekasāṭakapārutaṃ soṇḍapārutaṃ
atk-vin02a3:279_2: evamādi parimaṇḍalalakkhaṇato aññathā pārutaṃ, sabbametaṃ gihipārutaṃ nāma. Tasmā
atk-vin02a3:279_3: yathā setapaṭā aḍḍhapālakanigaṇṭhā pārupanti, yathā ca ekacce paribbājakā uraṃ vivaritvā
atk-vin02a3:279_4: dvīsu aṃsakūṭesu pāvuraṇaṃ ṭhapenti, yathā ca ekasāṭakā manussā nivatthasāṭakassa
atk-vin02a3:279_5: ekenantena piṭṭhiṃ pārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe ubhosu aṃsakūṭesu ṭhapenti, yathā ca surāsoṇḍādayo
atk-vin02a3:279_6: sāṭakena gīvaṃ parikkhipantā ubho ante udare vā olambenti; piṭṭhiyaṃ vā khipanti,
atk-vin02a3:279_7: yathā ca antepurikāyo akkhitārakamattaṃ dassetvā oguṇṭhikaṃ pārupanti, yathā ca mahājeṭṭhā
atk-vin02a3:279_8: dīghasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā tasseva ekenantena sakalasarīraṃ pārupanti, yathā ca kassakā
atk-vin02a3:279_9: khettakuṭiṃ pavisantā sāṭakaṃ paliveṭhetvā upakacchake pakkhipitvā tasseva ekenantena
atk-vin02a3:279_10: sarīraṃ pārupanti, yathā ca brāhmaṇā ubhinnaṃ upakacchakānaṃ antarena sāṭakaṃ pavesetvā
atk-vin02a3:279_11: aṃsakūṭesu pakkhipanti, yathā ca pāḷikārako bhikkhu ekaṃsapārupanena pārutaṃ vāmabāhuṃ
atk-vin02a3:279_12: vivaritvā cīvaraṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ āropeti; evaṃ apārupitvā sabbepi ete aññe ca evarūpe
atk-vin02a3:279_13: pārupanadose vajjetvā nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ. Tathā apārupitvā ārāme
atk-vin02a3:279_14: vā antaraghare vā anādarena yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:280: 281. Muṇḍavaṭṭīti yathā rañño kuhiñci gacchato parikkhārabhaṇḍavahanamanussāti adhippāyo. Antarākājanti majjhe laggetvā dvīhi vahitabbabhāraṃ.
atk-vin02a3:281: 282. Acakkhussanti cakkhūnaṃ hitaṃ na hoti; parihāniṃ janeti. Nacchādetīti na ruccati. Aṭṭhaṅgulaparamanti manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ. Atimaṭāhakanti atikhuddakaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:282_0: 283. Dāyaṃ ālimpentīti tiṇavanādīsu aggiṃ denti. Paṭagginti paṭiaggiṃ. Parittanti
atk-vin02a3:282_1: appaharitakaraṇena vā parikhākhaṇanena vā parittāṇaṃ. Ettha pana anupasampanne sati
atk-vin02a3:282_2: sayaṃ aggiṃ dātuṃ na labhati, asati aggimpi dātuṃ labhati, bhūmiṃ tacchetvā tiṇānipi
atk-vin02a3:282_3: harituṃ, parikhampi khaṇituṃ, allasākhaṃ bhañjitvāpi aggiṃ nibbāpetuṃ labhati, senāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:282_4: pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā tathā nibbāpetuṃ labhatiyeva. Udakena pana kappiyeneva labhati, na itarena.
atk-vin02a3:283_0: 284. Sati karaṇīyeti sukkhakaṭṭhādiggahaṇakicce sati. Porisiyanti purisappamāṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:283_1: Āpadāsūti vāḷamigādayo vā disvā maggamūḷho vā disā oloketukāmo hutvā davaḍāhaṃ vā
atk-vin02a3:283_2: udakoghaṃ vā āgacchantaṃ disvā evarūpāsu āpadāsu atiuccampi rukkhaṃ ārohituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:284_0: 285. Kalyāṇavākkaraṇāti madhurasaddā. Chandaso āropemāti vedaṃ viya sakkatabhāsāya
atk-vin02a3:284_1: vācanāmaggaṃ āropema. Sakāya niruttiyāti ettha sakā nirutti nāma sammāsambuddhena
atk-vin02a3:285: 286. Lokāyataṃ nāma sabbaṃ ucchiṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ anucchiṭṭhaṃ, seto kāko, kāḷo bako; iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:287: 289. Ābādhappaccayāti yassa ābādhassa lasuṇaṃ bhesajjaṃ; tappaccayāti attho.
atk-vin02a3:288: 290. Passāvapādukanti ettha pādukā iṭṭhakāhipi silāhipi dārūhipi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Vaccapādukāyapi eseva nayo. Pariveṇanti vaccakuṭiparikkhepabbhantaraṃ.
atk-vin02a3:289_0: 293. Yathādhammo kāretabboti dukkaṭavatthumhi dukkaṭena pācittiyavatthumhi pācittiyena
atk-vin02a3:289_1: kāretabbo. Paharaṇatthaṃ kataṃ paharaṇīti vuccati, yassa kassaci āvudhasaṅkhātassetaṃ
atk-vin02a3:289_2: adhivacanaṃ, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ sabbaṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ anujānāmīti attho. Katakañca kumbhakārikañcāti
atk-vin02a3:289_3: ettha katakaṃ vuttameva. Kumbhakārikañcāti dhaniyasseva sabbamattikāmayakuṭi vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:294_0: 294. Senāsanakkhandhake – apaññattaṃ hotīti ananuññātaṃ hoti. Vihāro nāma aḍḍhayogādimuttako
atk-vin02a3:294_1: avasesāvāso. Aḍḍhayogoti supaṇṇavaṅkagehaṃ. Pāsādoti dīghapāsādo. Hammiyanti upariākāsatale
atk-vin02a3:294_2: patiṭṭhitakūṭāgāro pāsādoyeva. Guhāti iṭṭhakāguhā silāguhā dāruguhā paṃsuguhā. Āgatānāgatassa
atk-vin02a3:294_3: cātuddisassa saṅghassāti āgatassa ca anāgatassa ca catūsu disāsu appaṭihatacārassa
atk-vin02a3:295_0: 295. Anumodanagāthāsu – sītaṃ uṇhanti utuvisabhāgavasena vuttaṃ. Sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyoti
atk-vin02a3:295_1: ettha sisiroti samphusitakavāto vuccati. Vuṭṭhiyoti ujukameghavuṭṭhiyo eva. Etāni
atk-vin02a3:296_0: Paṭihaññatīti vihārena paṭihaññati. Leṇatthanti nilīyanatthaṃ. Sukhatthanti sītādiparissayābhāvena
atk-vin02a3:296_1: sukhavihāratthaṃ. Jhāyituñca vipassitunti idampi padadvayaṃ “sukhatthañcā”ti imināva
atk-vin02a3:296_2: padena yojetabbaṃ. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – sukhatthañca vihāradānaṃ, katamaṃ sukhatthaṃ?
atk-vin02a3:296_3: Jhāyituṃ vipassituñca yaṃ sukhaṃ, tadatthaṃ. Atha vā parapadenapi yojetabbaṃ – jhāyituñca
atk-vin02a3:296_4: vipassituñca vihāradānaṃ; idha jhāyissanti vipassissantīti dadato vihāradānaṃ saṅghassa
atk-vin02a3:296_5: aggaṃ buddhena vaṇṇitaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “so ca sabbadado hoti, yo dadāti upassaya”nti.
atk-vin02a3:297_0: Yasmā ca aggaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ, “tasmā hi paṇḍito poso”ti gāthā. Vāsayettha bahussuteti
atk-vin02a3:297_1: ettha vihāre pariyattibahussute ca paṭivedhabahussute ca vāseyya. Tesaṃ annañcāti
atk-vin02a3:297_2: yaṃ tesaṃ anucchavikaṃ annañca pānañca vatthāni ca mañcapīṭhādisenāsanāni ca, taṃ
atk-vin02a3:297_3: sabbaṃ tesu ujubhūtesu akuṭilacittesu. Dadeyyāti nidaheyya. Tañca kho vippasannena
atk-vin02a3:297_4: cetasā na cittappasādaṃ virādhetvā, evaṃ vippasannacittassa hi te tassa dhammaṃ desenti…pe…
atk-vin02a3:298_0: 296. Āviñchanacchiddaṃ āviñchanarajjunti ettha rajju nāma sacepi dīpinaṅguṭṭhena
atk-vin02a3:298_1: katā hoti, vaṭṭatiyeva; na kāci na vaṭṭati. Tīṇi tāḷānīti tisso kuñcikāyo. Yantakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:298_2: sūcikanti ettha yaṃ yaṃ jānāti taṃ taṃ yantakaṃ, tassa vivaraṇasūcikañca kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:298_3: Vedikāvātapānaṃ nāma cetiye vedikāsadisaṃ. Jālavātapānaṃ nāma jālakabaddhaṃ. Salākavātapānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:298_4: nāma thambhakavātapānaṃ. Cakkalikanti ettha coḷakapādapuñchanaṃ bandhituṃ anujānāmīti
atk-vin02a3:298_5: attho. Vātapānabhisīti vātapānappamāṇena bhisiṃ katvā bandhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:298_6: Miḍḍhinti miḍḍhakaṃ. Bidalamañcakanti vettamañcaṃ; veḷuvilīvehi vā vītaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:299_0: 297. Āsandikoti caturassapīṭhaṃ vuccati. Uccakampi āsandikanti vacanato ekatobhāgena
atk-vin02a3:299_1: dīghapīṭhameva hi aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ vaṭṭati, caturassaāsandiko pana pamāṇātikkantopi
atk-vin02a3:299_2: vaṭṭatīti veditabbo. Sattaṅgo nāma tīsu disāsu apassayaṃ katvā katamañco, ayampi
atk-vin02a3:299_3: pamāṇātikkanto vaṭṭati. Bhaddapīṭhanti vettamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ vuccati. Pīṭhikāti pilotikābaddhapīṭhameva.
atk-vin02a3:299_4: Eḷakapādapīṭhaṃ nāma dārupaṭṭikāya upari pāde ṭhapetvā bhojanaphalakaṃ viya katapīṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:299_5: vuccati. Āmalakavaṭṭikapīṭhaṃ nāma āmalakākārena yojitaṃ bahupādakapīṭhaṃ. Imāni
atk-vin02a3:299_6: tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatapīṭhāni. Dārumayaṃ pana sabbaṃ pīṭhaṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamettha vinicchayo.
atk-vin02a3:300_0: Aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ mañcapaṭipādakanti ettha manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulameva aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:300_1: Cimilikā nāma parikammakatāya bhūmiyā chavisaṃrakkhaṇatthāya attharaṇaṃ vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:300_2: Rukkhatūlanti simbalirukkhādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci rukkhānaṃ tūlaṃ. Latātūlanti khīravalliādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:300_3: yāsaṃ kāsañci vallīnaṃ tūlaṃ. Poṭakitūlanti poṭakitiṇādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:300_4: antamaso ucchunaḷādīnampi tūlaṃ. Etehi tīhi sabbabhūtagāmā saṅgahitā honti. Rukkhavallitiṇajātiyo
atk-vin02a3:300_5: hi muñcitvā añño bhūtagāmo nāma natthi, tasmā yassa kassaci bhūtagāmassa tūlaṃ bimbohane
atk-vin02a3:300_6: vaṭṭati, bhisiṃ pana pāpuṇitvā sabbampetaṃ akappiyatūlanti vuccati. Na kevalañca
atk-vin02a3:300_7: bimbohane etaṃ tūlameva, haṃsamorādīnaṃ sabbasakuṇānaṃ sīhādīnaṃ sabbacatuppadānañca
atk-vin02a3:300_8: lomampi vaṭṭati. Piyaṅgupupphabakuḷapupphādi pana yaṃkiñci pupphaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tamālapattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:300_9: suddhameva na vaṭṭati, missakaṃ pana vaṭṭati. Bhisīnaṃ anuññātaṃ pañcavidhaṃ uṇṇāditūlampi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:301_0: Addhakāyikānīti upaḍḍhakāyappamāṇāni, yesu kaṭito paṭṭhāya yāva sīsaṃ upadahanti.
atk-vin02a3:301_1: Sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yassa vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ minīyamānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:301_2: vidatthi ceva caturaṅgulañca hoti, majjhaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti. Dīghato pana
atk-vin02a3:301_3: diyaḍḍharatanaṃ vā dviratanaṃ vāti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ sīsappamāṇassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo.
atk-vin02a3:301_4: Ito uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati, heṭṭhā pana vaṭṭati. Agilānassa sīsupadhānañca pādupadhānañcāti
atk-vin02a3:301_5: dvayameva vaṭṭati. Gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ katvā nipajjitumpi
atk-vin02a3:301_6: vaṭṭati. “Yāni pana bhisīnaṃ anuññātāni pañca kappiyatūlāni, tehi bimbohanaṃ mahantampi
atk-vin02a3:301_7: vaṭṭatī”ti phussadevatthero āha. Vinayadharaupatissatthero pana “bimbohanaṃ karissāmī’ti
atk-vin02a3:301_8: kappiyatūlaṃ vā akappiyatūlaṃ vā pakkhipitvā karontassa pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-vin02a3:302_0: Pañca bhisiyoti pañcahi uṇṇādīhi pūritabhisiyo. Tūlagaṇanāya hi etāsaṃ gaṇanā vuttā.
atk-vin02a3:302_1: Tattha uṇṇaggahaṇena na kevalaṃ eḷakalomameva gahitaṃ, ṭhapetvā manussalomaṃ yaṃkiñci
atk-vin02a3:302_2: kappiyākappiyamaṃsajātīnaṃ pakkhicatuppadānaṃ lomaṃ, sabbaṃ idha uṇṇaggahaṇeneva
atk-vin02a3:302_3: gahitaṃ. Tasmā channaṃ cīvarānaṃ channaṃ anulomacīvarānañca aññatarena bhisicchaviṃ
atk-vin02a3:302_4: katvā taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipitvā bhisiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakalomāni pana apakkhipitvā
atk-vin02a3:302_5: kambalameva catugguṇaṃ vā pañcaguṇaṃ vā pakkhipitvā katāpi uṇṇabhisisaṅkhyameva gacchati.
atk-vin02a3:303_0: Coḷabhisiādīsu yaṃkiñci navacoḷaṃ vā purāṇacoḷaṃ vā saṃharitvā vā anto pakkhipitvā
atk-vin02a3:303_1: vā katā coḷabhisi, yaṃkiñci vākaṃ pakkhipitvā katā vākabhisi, yaṃkiñci tiṇaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-vin02a3:303_2: katā tiṇabhisi, aññatra suddhatamālapattaṃ yaṃkiñci paṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā katā paṇṇabhisīti
atk-vin02a3:303_3: veditabbā. Tamālapattaṃ pana aññena missameva vaṭṭati, suddhaṃ na vaṭṭati. Bhisiyā
atk-vin02a3:303_4: pamāṇaniyamo natthi, mañcabhisi pīṭhabhisi bhūmattharaṇabhisi caṅkamanabhisi pādapuñchanabhisīti
atk-vin02a3:303_5: etāsaṃ anurūpato sallakkhetvā attano rucivasena pamāṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Yaṃ panetaṃ uṇṇādipañcavidhatūlampi
atk-vin02a3:303_6: bhisiyaṃ vaṭṭati, taṃ “masūrakepi vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Etena masūrakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a3:304_0: Mañcabhisiṃ pīṭhe santharantīti mañcabhisiṃ pīṭhe attharanti; attharaṇatthāya harantīti
atk-vin02a3:304_1: yujjati. Ullokaṃ akaritvāti heṭṭhā cimilikaṃ adatvā. Phositunti rajanena vā haliddiyā
atk-vin02a3:304_2: vā upari phusitāni dātuṃ. Bhattikammanti bhisicchaviyā upari bhattikammaṃ. Hatthabhattinti pañcaṅgulibhattiṃ.
atk-vin02a3:305_0: 298. Ikkāsanti rukkhaniyyāsaṃ vā silesaṃ vā. Piṭṭhamaddanti piṭṭhakhaliṃ. Kuṇḍakamattikanti
atk-vin02a3:305_2: Accussannaṃ hotīti bindu bindu hutvā tiṭṭhati. Paccuddharitunti puñchituṃ. Gaṇḍumattikanti
atk-vin02a3:306_0: 299. Na bhikkhave paṭibhānacittanti ettha na kevalaṃ itthipurisarūpameva, tiracchānarūpampi
atk-vin02a3:306_1: antamaso gaṇḍuppādarūpampi bhikkhuno sayaṃ kātuṃ vā “karohī”ti vattuṃ vā na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:306_2: “upāsaka dvārapālaṃ karohī”ti vattumpi na labbhati. Jātakapakaraṇaasadisadānādīni
atk-vin02a3:306_3: pana pasādanīyāni nibbidāpaṭisaṃyuttāni vā vatthūni parehi kārāpetuṃ labbhati. Mālākammādīni
atk-vin02a3:307_0: 300. Aḷakamandāti ekaṅgaṇā manussābhikiṇṇā. Tayo gabbheti ettha sivikāgabbhoti caturassagabbho.
atk-vin02a3:307_1: Nāḷikāgabbhoti vitthārato diguṇatiguṇāyāmo dīghagabbho. Hammiyagabbhoti ākāsatale
atk-vin02a3:308_0: Kalaṅkapādakanti rukkhaṃ vijjhitvā tattha khāṇuke ākoṭetvā kataṃ, taṃ āharimaṃ bhittipādaṃ
atk-vin02a3:308_1: jiṇṇakuṭṭapādassa upatthambhanatthaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ anujānāmīti attho. Parittāṇakiṭikanti
atk-vin02a3:308_2: vassaparittāṇatthaṃ kiṭikaṃ. Uddasudhanti vacchakagomayena ceva chārikāya ca saddhiṃ madditamattikaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:309_0: Āḷindo nāma pamukhaṃ vuccati. Paghanaṃ nāma yaṃ nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca pādehi
atk-vin02a3:309_1: hananti, tassa vihāradvāre ubhato kuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā katapadesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:309_2: “paghāna”ntipi vuccati. Pakuṭṭanti majjhe gabbhassa samantā pariyāgāro vuccati. “Pakuṭa”ntipi
atk-vin02a3:309_3: pāṭho. Osārakanti anāḷindake vihāre vaṃsaṃ datvā tato daṇḍake osāretvā katachadanapamukhaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:310: 301. Pānīyabhājananti pivantānaṃ pānīyadānabhājanaṃ. Uḷuṅko ca thālakañca pānīyasaṅkhassa anulomāni.
atk-vin02a3:311: 303. Apesīti dīghadārumhi khāṇuke pavesetvā kaṇṭakasākhāhi vinandhitvā kataṃ dvārathakanakaṃ. Palighoti gāmadvāresu viya cakkayuttaṃ dvārathakanakaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:312: 305. Assatarīhi yuttā rathā assatarīrathā. Āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalāti āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalāni.
atk-vin02a3:313: Parinibbutoti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto. Sītibhūtoti kilesātapābhāvena sītibhūto. Nirūpadhīti kilesupadhiabhāvena nirūpadhīti vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:314: Sabbā āsattiyo chetvāti rūpādīsu vā visayesu sabbabhavesu vā patthanāyo chinditvā. Hadaye daranti citte kilesadarathaṃ vinetvā. Veyyāyikanti vayakaraṇaṃ vuccati.
atk-vin02a3:315_0: 307. Ādeyyavācoti tassa vacanaṃ bahū janā ādiyitabbaṃ sotabbaṃ maññantīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:315_1: Ārāme akaṃsūti ye sadhanā, te attano dhanena akaṃsu. Ye mandadhanā ceva adhanā ca,
atk-vin02a3:315_2: tesaṃ dhanaṃ adāsi. Iti so satasahassakahāpaṇe satasahassagghanakañca bhaṇḍaṃ datvā
atk-vin02a3:315_3: pañcacattālīsayojanike addhāne yojane yojane vihārapatiṭṭhānaṃ katvā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-vin02a3:316_0: Koṭisantharaṃ santharāpesīti kahāpaṇakoṭiyā kahāpaṇakoṭiṃ paṭipādetvā santhari. Ye
atk-vin02a3:316_1: tattha rukkhā vā pokkharaṇiyo vā tesaṃ parikkhepappamāṇaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-vin02a3:316_2: santharitvā adāsi. Evamassa aṭṭhārasakoṭikaṃ nidhānaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-vin02a3:317: Kumārassa etadahosīti gahapatino evaṃ bahudhanaṃ cajantassāpi mukhassa vippasannākāraṃ disvā etaṃ ahosi. Koṭṭhakaṃ māpesīti sattabhūmikaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakapāsādaṃ māpesi.
atk-vin02a3:318_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati jetavane vihāre kārāpesi…pe… maṇḍape kārāpesīti aparāhipi
atk-vin02a3:318_1: aṭṭhārasahi koṭīhi ete vihārādayo kārāpesi aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇāya bhūmiyā. Vipassissa
atk-vin02a3:318_2: hi bhagavato punabbasumitto gahapati yojanappamāṇaṃ bhūmiṃ suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāsantharena
atk-vin02a3:318_3: kiṇitvā vihāraṃ kārāpesi. Sikhissa pana sirivaḍḍho gahapati tigāvutappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇayaṭṭhisantharena,
atk-vin02a3:318_4: vessabhussa sotthijo gahapati aḍḍhayojanappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇaphālasantharena, kakusandhassa
atk-vin02a3:318_5: pana accuto gahapati gāvutappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇahatthipadasantharena, koṇāgamanassa uggo
atk-vin02a3:318_6: gahapati aḍḍhagāvutappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāsantharena, kassapassa sumaṅgalo gahapati
atk-vin02a3:318_7: vīsatiusabhappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇakacchapasantharena, amhākaṃ bhagavato sudatto gahapati
atk-vin02a3:318_8: aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ bhūmiṃ kahāpaṇasantharena kiṇitvā vihāraṃ kārāpesīti; evaṃ anupubbena
atk-vin02a3:318_9: parihāyanti sampattiyoti alameva sabbasampattīsu virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuccitunti.
atk-vin02a3:319_0: 308. Khaṇḍanti bhinnokāso. Phullanti phalitokāso. Paṭisaṅkharissatīti pākatikaṃ karissati.
atk-vin02a3:319_1: Laddhanavakammena pana bhikkhunā vāsipharasunikhādanādīni gahetvā sayaṃ na kātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:320_0: 310. Piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvāti thero kira gilāne paṭijagganto jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe saṅgaṇhanto
atk-vin02a3:320_1: sabbapacchato āgacchati. Idamassa cārittaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvā”ti.
atk-vin02a3:320_2: Aggāsananti therāsanaṃ. Aggodakanti dakkhiṇodakaṃ. Aggapiṇḍanti saṅghattherapiṇḍaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:320_3: Antarā satthīnaṃ karitvāti catunnaṃ pādānaṃ antare karitvā.
atk-vin02a3:321: 315. Patiṭṭhāpesīti aṭṭhārasakoṭipariccāgaṃ katvā patiṭṭhāpesi. Evaṃ sabbāpi catupaṇṇāsakoṭiyo pariccaji.
atk-vin02a3:324_0: 316. Vippakatabhojanoti antaraghare vā vihāre vā araññe vā yattha katthaci bhuñjamāno
atk-vin02a3:324_1: bhikkhu aniṭṭhite bhojane na vuṭṭhāpetabbo. Antaraghare pacchā āgatena bhikkhaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin02a3:324_2: gantabbaṃ. Sace manussā vā bhikkhū vā “pavisathā”ti vadanti, “mayi pavisante bhikkhū
atk-vin02a3:324_3: uṭṭhahissantī”ti vattabbaṃ. “Etha, bhante, āsanaṃ atthī”ti vuttena pana pavisitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:324_4: Sace koci kiñci na vadati, āsanasālaṃ gantvā atisamīpaṃ agantvā sabhāgaṭṭhāne ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:324_5: Okāse kate “pavisathā”ti vuttena pana pavisitabbaṃ. Sace pana yaṃ āsanaṃ tassa pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin02a3:324_6: tattha abhuñjanto bhikkhu nisinno hoti, taṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Yāgukhajjakādīsu
atk-vin02a3:324_7: pana yaṃkiñci pivitvā vā khāditvā vā yāva añño āgacchati, tāva nisinnaṃ rittahatthampi
atk-vin02a3:324_8: vuṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Vippakatabhojanoyeva hi so hoti.
atk-vin02a3:325_0: Sace vuṭṭhāpetīti sace āpattiṃ atikkamitvāpi vuṭṭhāpetiyeva. Pavārito ca hotīti yaṃ
atk-vin02a3:325_1: so vuṭṭhāpeti, ayañca bhikkhu pavārito ca hoti, tena vattabbo – “gaccha udakaṃ āharāhī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:325_2: Vuḍḍhatarañhi bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetuṃ idameva ekaṃ ṭhānanti. Sace so udakampi na āharati,
atk-vin02a3:325_3: tato yañca navakatarena kattabbaṃ, taṃ dassento “sādhukaṃ sitthānī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a3:326_0: Gilānassa patirūpaṃ seyyanti ettha yo kāsabhagandarātisārādīhi gilāno hoti, kheḷamallakavaccakapālādīni
atk-vin02a3:326_1: ṭhapetabbāni honti. Kuṭṭhi vā hoti, senāsanaṃ dūseti; evarūpassa heṭṭhāpāsādapaṇṇasālādīsu
atk-vin02a3:326_2: aññataraṃ ekamantaṃ senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Yasmiṃ vasante senāsanaṃ na dussati, tassa
atk-vin02a3:326_3: varaseyyāpi dātabbāva. Yopi sinehapānavirecananatthukammādīsu yaṃkiñci bhesajjaṃ
atk-vin02a3:326_4: karoti, sabbo so gilānoyeva, tassāpi sallakkhetvā patirūpaṃ senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Lesakappenāti
atk-vin02a3:326_5: appakena sīsābādhādimattena. Bhikkhū gaṇetvāti “ettakā nāma bhikkhū”ti vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ paricchedaṃ ñatvā.
atk-vin02a3:329_0: 318. Seyyāti mañcaṭṭhānāni vuccanti. Seyyaggenāti seyyāparicchedena, vassūpanāyikadivase
atk-vin02a3:329_1: kālaṃ ghosetvā ekamañcaṭṭhānaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno gāhetuṃ anujānāmīti attho. Seyyaggena
atk-vin02a3:329_2: gāhentāti seyyāparicchedena gāhiyamānā. Seyyā ussārayiṃsūti mañcaṭṭhānāni atirekāni
atk-vin02a3:329_3: ahesuṃ. Vihāraggādīsupi eseva nayo. Anubhāganti puna aparampi bhāgaṃ dātuṃ. Atimandesu
atk-vin02a3:329_4: hi bhikkhūsu ekekassa bhikkhuno dve tīṇi pariveṇāni dātabbāni. Na akāmā dātabboti
atk-vin02a3:329_5: anicchāya na dātabbo. Tattha vassūpanāyikadivase gahite anubhāge pacchā āgatānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:329_6: na attano aruciyā so anubhāgo dātabbo. Sace pana yena gahito, so ca attano ruciyā
atk-vin02a3:329_7: taṃ anubhāgaṃ vā paṭhamabhāgaṃ vā deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:330_0: Nissīme ṭhitassāti upacārasīmato bahi ṭhitassa. Anto upacārasīmāya pana dūre ṭhitassāpi
atk-vin02a3:330_1: labbhatiyeva. Senāsanaṃ gahetvāti vassūpanāyikadivase gahetvā. Sabbakālaṃ paṭibāhantīti
atk-vin02a3:330_2: catumāsaccayena utukālepi paṭibāhanti. Tīsu senāsanaggāhesu purimako ca pacchimako
atk-vin02a3:331_0: Antarāmuttake ayaṃ vinicchayo – ekasmiṃ vihāre mahālābhasenāsanaṃ hoti. Senāsanasāmikā
atk-vin02a3:331_1: vassūpagataṃ bhikkhuṃ sabbapaccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā pavāretvā gamanakāle
atk-vin02a3:331_2: bahuṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ denti. Mahātherā dūratopi āgantvā vassūpanāyikadivase taṃ
atk-vin02a3:331_3: gahetvā phāsuṃ vasitvā vutthavassā lābhaṃ gaṇhitvā pakkamanti. Āvāsikā “mayaṃ etthuppannaṃ
atk-vin02a3:331_4: lābhaṃ na labhāma, niccaṃ āgantukamahātherāva labhanti, teyeva naṃ āgantvā paṭijaggissantī”ti
atk-vin02a3:331_5: palujjantampi na olokenti. Bhagavā tassa paṭijagganatthaṃ “aparajjugatāya pavāraṇāya
atk-vin02a3:332_0: Taṃ gāhentena saṅghatthero vattabbo – “bhante antarāmuttakasenāsanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-vin02a3:332_1: Sace gaṇhāti, dātabbaṃ; no ce eteneva upāyena anutheraṃ ādiṃ katvā yo gaṇhāti, tassa
atk-vin02a3:332_2: antamaso sāmaṇerassāpi dātabbaṃ. Tena taṃ senāsanaṃ aṭṭhamāse paṭijaggitabbaṃ. Chadanabhittibhūmīsu
atk-vin02a3:332_3: yaṃ kiñci khaṇḍaṃ vā phullaṃ vā hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ paṭisaṅkharitabbaṃ. Uddesaparipucchādīhi
atk-vin02a3:332_4: divasaṃ khepetvā rattiṃ tattha vasitumpi vaṭṭati. Rattiṃ pariveṇe vasitvā tattha
atk-vin02a3:332_5: divasaṃ khepetumpi vaṭṭati. Rattindivaṃ tattheva vasitumpi vaṭṭati. Utukāle āgatānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:332_6: vuḍḍhānaṃ na paṭibāhitabbaṃ. Vassūpanāyikadivase pana sampatte sace saṅghatthero
atk-vin02a3:332_7: “mayhaṃ idaṃ senāsanaṃ dethā”ti vadati, na labhati. “Bhante, idaṃ antarāmuttakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:332_8: gahetvā aṭṭhamāse ekena bhikkhunā paṭijaggita”nti vatvā na dātabbaṃ. Aṭṭhamāse paṭijaggakabhikkhusseva gahitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:333_0: Yasmiṃ pana senāsane ekasaṃvacchare dvikkhattuṃ paccaye denti chamāsaccayena chamāsaccayena,
atk-vin02a3:333_1: taṃ antarāmuttakaṃ na gāhetabbaṃ. Yasmiṃ vā tikkhattuṃ denti catumāsaccayena catumāsaccayena,
atk-vin02a3:333_2: yasmiṃ vā catukkhattuṃ denti temāsaccayena temāsaccayena, taṃ antarāmuttakaṃ na gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:333_3: Paccayeneva hi taṃ paṭijagganaṃ labhissati. Yasmiṃ pana ekasaṃvacchare sakideva bahupaccaye
atk-vin02a3:333_4: denti, etaṃ antarāmuttakaṃ gāhetabbanti. Ayaṃ tāva antovasse vassūpanāyikadivasena
atk-vin02a3:334_0: Ayaṃ pana senāsanaggāho nāma duvidho hoti – utukāle ca vassāvāse ca. Tattha utukāle
atk-vin02a3:334_1: tāva keci āgantukā bhikkhū purebhattaṃ āgacchanti, keci pacchābhattaṃ paṭhamayāmaṃ
atk-vin02a3:334_2: vā majjhimayāmaṃ vā pacchimayāmaṃ vā ye yadā āgacchanti, tesaṃ tadāva bhikkhū uṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin02a3:334_3: senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Akālo nāma natthi. Senāsanapaññāpakena pana paṇḍitena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:334_4: ekaṃ vā dve vā mañcaṭṭhānāni ṭhapetabbāni. Sace vikāle eko vā dve vā therā āgacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:334_5: te vattabbā – “bhante, ādito paṭṭhāya vuṭṭhāpiyamāne sabbepi bhikkhū ubbhaṇḍikā bhavissanti,
atk-vin02a3:335_0: Bahūsu pana āgatesu vuṭṭhāpetvā paṭipāṭiyā dātabbaṃ. Sace ekekaṃ pariveṇaṃ pahoti,
atk-vin02a3:335_1: ekekaṃ pariveṇaṃ dātabbaṃ. Tattha aggisāladīghasālamaṇḍalamālādayo sabbepi tasseva
atk-vin02a3:335_2: pāpuṇanti. Evaṃ appahonte pāsādaggena dātabbaṃ. Pāsādesu appahontesu ovarakaggena
atk-vin02a3:335_3: dātabbaṃ. Ovarakesu appahontesu seyyaggena dātabbaṃ. Seyyaggesu appahontesu mañcaṭṭhānena
atk-vin02a3:335_4: dātabbaṃ. Mañcaṭṭhāne appahonte ekapīṭhakaṭṭhānavasena dātabbaṃ. Bhikkhuno pana ṭhitokāsamattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:335_5: na gāhetabbaṃ. Etañhi senāsanaṃ nāma na hoti. Pīṭhakaṭṭhāne pana appahonte ekaṃ mañcaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:335_6: vā pīṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ vā vārena vārena gahetvā “bhante, vissamathā”ti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:335_7: dātabbaṃ, na hi sakkā sītasamaye sabbarattiṃ ajjhokāse vasituṃ. Mahātherena paṭhamayāmaṃ
atk-vin02a3:335_8: vissamitvā nikkhamitvā dutiyattherassa vattabbaṃ – “āvuso, idha pavisāhī”ti. Sace
atk-vin02a3:335_9: mahāthero niddāgaruko hoti, kālaṃ na jānāti, ukkāsitvā dvāraṃ ākoṭetvā “bhante, kālo
atk-vin02a3:335_10: jāto, sītaṃ anudahatī”ti vattabbaṃ. Tena nikkhamitvā okāso dātabbo, adātuṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a3:335_11: Dutiyattherenapi majjhimayāmaṃ vissamitvā purimanayeneva itarassa dātabbaṃ. Niddāgaruko
atk-vin02a3:335_12: vuttanayeneva vuṭṭhāpetabbo. Evaṃ ekarattiṃ ekamañcaṭṭhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dātabbaṃ. Jambudīpe
atk-vin02a3:335_13: pana ekacce bhikkhū “senāsanaṃ nāma mañcaṭṭhānaṃ vā pīṭhaṭṭhānaṃ vā kiñcideva kassaci
atk-vin02a3:335_14: sappāyaṃ hoti, kassaci asappāya”nti āgantukā hontu vā mā vā, devasikaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:336_0: Vassāvāse pana atthi āgantukavattaṃ, atthi āvāsikavattaṃ, āgantukena tāva sakaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:336_1: muñcitvā aññattha gantvā vasitukāmena vassūpanāyikadivasameva tattha na gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:336_2: Vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā hi tatra sambādhaṃ bhaveyya, bhikkhācāro vā na sampajjeyya, tena
atk-vin02a3:336_3: na phāsuṃ vihareyya. Tasmā “idāni māsamattena vassūpanāyikā bhavissatī”ti taṃ vihāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:336_4: pavisitabbaṃ. Tattha māsamattaṃ vasanto sace uddesatthiko uddesasampattiṃ sallakkhetvā,
atk-vin02a3:336_5: sace kammaṭṭhāniko kammaṭṭhānasappāyataṃ sallakkhetvā, sace paccayatthiko paccayalābhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:337_0: Sakaṭṭhānato ca tattha gacchantena na gocaragāmo ghaṭṭetabbo, na tattha manussā vattabbā
atk-vin02a3:337_1: – “tumhe nissāya salākabhattādīni vā yāgukhajjakādīni vā vassāvāsikaṃ vā natthi,
atk-vin02a3:337_2: ayaṃ cetiyassa parikkhāro, ayaṃ uposathāgārassa, idaṃ tāḷañceva sūci ca sampaṭicchatha
atk-vin02a3:337_3: tumhākaṃ vihāra”nti. Senāsanaṃ pana jaggitvā dārubhaṇḍamattikābhaṇḍāni paṭisāmetvā
atk-vin02a3:337_4: gamiyavattaṃ pūretvā gantabbaṃ. Evaṃ gacchantenāpi daharehi pattacīvarabhaṇḍikāyo
atk-vin02a3:337_5: ukkhipāpetvā telanāḷikattaradaṇḍādīni gāhāpetvā chattaṃ paggayha attānaṃ dassentena
atk-vin02a3:337_6: gāmadvāreneva na gantabbaṃ, paṭicchannena aṭavimaggena gantabbaṃ. Aṭavimagge asati
atk-vin02a3:337_7: gumbādīni maddantena na gantabbaṃ, gamiyavattaṃ pana pūretvā vitakkaṃ chinditvā suddhacittena
atk-vin02a3:337_8: gamanavatteneva gantabbaṃ. Sace pana gāmadvārena maggo hoti, gacchantañca naṃ saparivāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:337_9: disvā manussā “amhākaṃ thero viyā”ti upadhāvitvā “kuhiṃ, bhante, sabbaparikkhāre
atk-vin02a3:337_10: gahetvā gacchathā”ti vadanti, tesu ce eko evaṃ vadati – “vassūpanāyikakālo nāmāyaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:337_11: yattha antovasse nibaddhabhikkhācāro bhaṇḍapaṭicchādanañca labbhati, tattha bhikkhū
atk-vin02a3:337_12: gacchantī”ti. Tassa ce sutvā te manussā “bhante, imasmimpi gāme jano bhuñjati ceva
atk-vin02a3:337_13: nivāseti ca, mā aññattha gacchathā”ti vatvā mittāmacce pakkosāpetvā sabbe sammantayitvā
atk-vin02a3:337_14: vihāre nibaddhavattañca salākabhattādīni ca vassāvāsikañca paṭṭhapetvā “idheva bhante
atk-vin02a3:337_15: vasathā”ti yācanti, sabbaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭati. Sabbañhetaṃ kappiyañceva anavajjañca.
atk-vin02a3:337_16: Kurundiyaṃ pana “‘kuhiṃ gacchathā’ti vutte ‘asukaṭṭhāna’nti vatvā, ‘kasmā tattha
atk-vin02a3:337_17: gacchathā’ti vutte ‘kāraṇaṃ ācikkhitabba”’nti vuttaṃ. Ubhayampi panettha suddhacittattāva
atk-vin02a3:338_0: Idaṃ pana āvāsikavattaṃ – paṭikacceva hi āvāsikehi vihāro jaggitabbo. Khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇaparibhaṇḍāni
atk-vin02a3:338_2: imāni sabbāni paṭijaggitabbāni, cetiye sudhākammaṃ muddavedikāya telamakkhanaṃ mañcapīṭhapaṭijaggananti
atk-vin02a3:338_3: idampi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ – “vassaṃ vasitukāmā āgantvā uddesaparipucchākammaṭṭhānānuyogādīni
atk-vin02a3:338_4: karontā sukhaṃ vasissantī”ti. Kataparikammehi āsāḷhījuṇhapañcamito paṭṭhāya vassāvāsikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:338_5: pucchitabbaṃ. Kattha pucchitabbaṃ? Yato pakatiyā labbhati. Yehi pana na dinnapubbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:338_6: te pucchituṃ na vaṭṭati. Kasmā pucchitabbaṃ? Kadāci hi manussā denti, kadāci dubbhikkhādīhi
atk-vin02a3:338_7: upaddutā na denti. Tattha ye na dassanti, te apucchitvā vassāvāsike gāhite gāhitabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:338_8: lābhantarāyo hoti, tasmā pucchitvāva gāhetabbaṃ, pucchantena “tumhākaṃ vassāvāsikaggāhakakālo
atk-vin02a3:338_9: upakaṭṭho”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace vadanti “bhante, imaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ chātakādīhi upaddutamha,
atk-vin02a3:338_10: na sakkoma dātu”nti vā “yaṃ mayaṃ pubbe dema, tato ūnataraṃ dassāmā”ti vā “idāni
atk-vin02a3:338_11: kappāso sulabho, yaṃ pubbe dema, tato bahutaraṃ dassāmā”ti vā vadanti, taṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-vin02a3:338_12: tadanurūpena nayena tesaṃ tesaṃ senāsane bhikkhūnaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:339_0: Sace manussā vadanti – “yassa amhākaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ pāpuṇāti, so temāsaṃ pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetu,
atk-vin02a3:339_1: vihāramaggaṃ jaggatu, cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇāni jaggatu, bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcatū”ti,
atk-vin02a3:339_2: yassa taṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa ācikkhitabbaṃ. Yo pana gāmo paṭikkamma yojanadviyojanantare
atk-vin02a3:339_3: hoti, tatra ce kulāni upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā vihāre vassāvāsikaṃ dentiyeva, tāni kulāni
atk-vin02a3:339_4: apucchitvāpi tesaṃ senāsane vattaṃ katvā vasantassa vassāvāsikaṃ gāhetabbaṃ. Sace
atk-vin02a3:339_5: pana tesaṃ senāsane paṃsukūliko vasati, āgatañca taṃ disvā “tumhākaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:339_6: demā”ti vadanti, tena saṅghassa ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace tāni kulāni saṅghassa dātuṃ na
atk-vin02a3:339_7: icchanti, “tumhākaṃyeva demā”ti vadanti, sabhāgo bhikkhu “vattaṃ katvā gaṇhāhī”ti
atk-vin02a3:339_8: vattabbo. Paṃsukūlikassa panetaṃ na vaṭṭati, iti saddhādeyye dāyakamanussā pucchitabbā.
atk-vin02a3:340_0: Tatruppāde pana kappiyakārakā pucchitabbā. Kathaṃ pucchitabbā? “Kiṃ, āvuso, saṅghassa
atk-vin02a3:340_1: bhaṇḍapaṭicchādanaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Sace vadanti – “bhavissati, bhante, ekekassa navahatthaṃ
atk-vin02a3:340_2: sāṭakaṃ dassāma, vassāvāsikaṃ gāhethā”ti, gāhetabbaṃ. Sacepi vadanti – “sāṭakaṃ natthi;
atk-vin02a3:340_3: vatthu pana atthi, gāhetha, bhante”ti, vatthumhi santepi gāhetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Kappiyakārakānañhi
atk-vin02a3:340_4: hatthe “kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti dinnavatthuto yaṃ yaṃ kappaṃ, taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-vin02a3:341_0: Yaṃ panettha piṇḍapātatthāya gilānapaccayatthāya vā uddissa dinnaṃ, taṃ cīvare upanāmentehi
atk-vin02a3:341_1: saṅghasuṭṭhutāya apaloketvā upanāmetabbaṃ. Senāsanatthāya uddissa dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a3:341_2: hoti, cīvaravaseneva catupaccayavasena vā dinnaṃ cīvare upanāmentānaṃ apalokanakammakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a3:341_3: natthi, apalokanakammaṃ karontehi ca puggalavaseneva kātabbaṃ, saṅghavasena na kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:341_4: Jātarūparajatavasenāpi āmakadhaññavasena vā apalokanakammaṃ na vaṭṭati. Kappiyabhaṇḍavasena
atk-vin02a3:341_5: cīvarataṇḍulādivaseneva ca vaṭṭati. Taṃ pana evaṃ kattabbaṃ – “idāni subhikkhaṃ sulabhapiṇḍaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:341_6: bhikkhū cīvarena kilamanti, ettakaṃ nāma taṇḍulabhāgaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ ruccatī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:341_7: “Gilānapaccayo sulabho gilāno vā natthi, ettakaṃ nāma taṇḍulabhāgaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ ruccatī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:342_0: Evaṃ cīvarapaccayaṃ sallakkhetvā senāsanassa kāle ghosite sannipatite saṅghe senāsanaggāhako
atk-vin02a3:342_1: sammannitabbo. Sammannantena ca dve sammannitabbāti vuttaṃ. Evañhi navako vuḍḍhatarassa,
atk-vin02a3:342_2: vuḍḍho ca navakassa gāhessati. Mahante pana mahāvihārasadise vihāre tayo cattāro
atk-vin02a3:342_3: janā sammannitabbā. Kurundiyaṃ pana “aṭṭhapi soḷasapi jane sammannituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-vin02a3:342_4: vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ sammuti kammavācāyapi apalokanenapi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:343_0: Tehi sammatehi bhikkhūhi senāsanaṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ, cetiyagharaṃ bodhigharaṃ āsanagharaṃ
atk-vin02a3:343_1: sammuñjaniaṭṭo dāruaṭṭo vaccakuṭi iṭṭhakasālā vaḍḍhakisālā dvārakoṭṭhako pānīyamāḷo
atk-vin02a3:343_2: maggo pokkharaṇīti etāni hi asenāsanāni, vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā maṇḍapo
atk-vin02a3:343_3: rukkhamūlaṃ veḷugumboti imāni senāsanāni, tāni gāhetabbāni. Gāhentena ca “paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a3:343_4: bhikkhū gaṇetuṃ, bhikkhū gaṇetvā seyyā gaṇetu”nti ettha vuttanayena gāhetabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:343_5: Sace saṅghiko ca saddhādeyyo cāti dve cīvarapaccayā honti, tesu yaṃ bhikkhū paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a3:343_6: gaṇhituṃ icchanti, taṃ gāhetvā tassa ṭhitikato paṭṭhāya itaro gāhetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:344_0: Sace pana bhikkhūnaṃ appatāya pariveṇaggena senāsane gāhiyamāne ekaṃ pariveṇaṃ mahālābhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:344_1: hoti, dasa vā dvādasa vā cīvarāni labhanti, taṃ vijaṭetvā aññesu alābhakesu āvāsesu
atk-vin02a3:344_2: pakkhipitvā aññesampi bhikkhūnaṃ gāhetabbanti mahāsumatthero āha. Mahāpadumatthero
atk-vin02a3:344_3: panāha – “na evaṃ kātabbaṃ, manussā hi attano āvāsajagganatthāya paccayaṃ denti,
atk-vin02a3:344_4: tasmā aññehi bhikkhūhi tattha pavisitabba”nti. Sace panettha mahāthero paṭikkosati
atk-vin02a3:344_5: – “māvuso, evaṃ gāhetha, bhagavato anusiṭṭhiṃ karotha, vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – ‘anujānāmi,
atk-vin02a3:344_6: bhikkhave, pariveṇaggena gāhetu”’nti tassa paṭikkosanāya aṭṭhatvā “bhante bhikkhū
atk-vin02a3:344_7: bahū, paccayo mando, saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ saññāpetvā gāhetabbameva.
atk-vin02a3:345_0: Gāhentena ca sammatena bhikkhunā mahātherassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ vattabbaṃ – “bhante,
atk-vin02a3:345_1: tumhākaṃ senāsanaṃ pāpuṇāti, gaṇhatha paccayaṃ dhārethā”ti. “Asukakulassa paccayo
atk-vin02a3:345_2: asukasenāsanañca mayhaṃ pāpuṇāti, āvuso”ti, “pāpuṇāti, bhante, gaṇhatha na”nti, “gaṇhāmi,
atk-vin02a3:345_3: āvuso”ti, gahitaṃ hoti. Sace pana “gahitaṃ vo, bhante”ti vutte “gahitaṃ me”ti vā
atk-vin02a3:345_4: “gaṇhissatha, bhante”ti vutte “gaṇhissāmī”ti vā vadati, “agahitaṃ hotī”ti mahāsumatthero
atk-vin02a3:345_5: āha. Mahāpadumatthero panāha – “atītānāgatavacanaṃ vā hotu, vattamānavacanaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:345_6: satuppādamattaālayakaraṇamattameva cettha pamāṇaṃ, tasmā gahitameva hotī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:346_0: Yopi paṃsukūliko bhikkhu senāsanaṃ gahetvā paccayaṃ vissajjeti, ayampi na aññasmiṃ
atk-vin02a3:346_1: āvāse pakkhipitabbo. Tasmiṃyeva pariveṇe aggisālāya vā dīghasālāya vā rukkhamūle
atk-vin02a3:346_2: vā aññassa gāhetuṃ vaṭṭati. Paṃsukūliko “vasāmī”ti senāsanaṃ jaggissati, itaro “paccayaṃ
atk-vin02a3:346_3: gaṇhāmī”ti, evaṃ dvīhi kāraṇehi senāsanaṃ sujaggitataraṃ bhavissati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:346_4: pana vuttaṃ – “paṃsukūlike vāsatthāya senāsanaṃ gaṇhante senāsanaggāhāpakena vattabbaṃ
atk-vin02a3:346_5: – ‘bhante, idha paccayo atthi, so kiṃ kātabbo’ti. Tena ‘heṭṭhā aññaṃ gāhāpehī’ti
atk-vin02a3:346_6: vattabbo. Sace pana kiñci avatvāva vasati, vutthavassassa ca pādamūle ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:346_7: denti, vaṭṭati. Atha vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vadanti, tasmiṃ senāsane vassaṃvutthabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:346_8: pāpuṇātī”ti. Yesaṃ pana senāsanaṃ natthi; kevalaṃ paccayameva denti, tesaṃ paccayaṃ
atk-vin02a3:347_0: Manussā thūpaṃ katvā vassāvāsikaṃ gāhāpenti, thūpo nāma asenāsanaṃ, tassa samīpe
atk-vin02a3:347_1: rukkhe vā maṇḍape vā upanibandhitvā gāhāpetabbaṃ. Tena bhikkhunā cetiyaṃ paṭijaggitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:347_3: eseva nayo. Bhojanasālā pana senāsanameva, tasmā taṃ ekassa vā bahūnaṃ vā paricchinditvā
atk-vin02a3:347_4: gāhetuṃ vaṭṭatīti sabbamidaṃ vitthārena mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:348_0: Senāsanaggāhāpakena pana pāṭipadaaruṇato paṭṭhāya yāva puna aruṇaṃ na bhijjati tāva
atk-vin02a3:348_1: gāhetabbaṃ, idañhi senāsanaggāhassa khettaṃ. Sace pātova gāhite senāsane añño vitakkacāriko
atk-vin02a3:348_2: bhikkhu āgantvā senāsanaṃ yācati, “gahitaṃ, bhante, senāsanaṃ, vassūpagato saṅgho,
atk-vin02a3:348_3: ramaṇīyo vihāro, rukkhamūlādīsu yattha icchatha tattha vasathā”ti vattabbo. Vassūpagatehi
atk-vin02a3:348_4: antovasse nibaddhavattaṃ ṭhapetvā vassūpagatā bhikkhū “sammuñjaniyo bandhathā”ti
atk-vin02a3:348_5: vattabbā. Sulabhā ce daṇḍakā ceva salākāyo ca honti, ekekena cha pañca muṭṭhisammuñjaniyo,
atk-vin02a3:348_6: dve tisso yaṭṭhisammuñjaniyo vā bandhitabbā. Dullabhā ce honti, dve tisso muṭṭhisammuñjaniyo
atk-vin02a3:348_7: ekā yaṭṭhisammuñjanī bandhitabbā. Sāmaṇerehi pañca pañca ukkā koṭṭetabbā. Vasanaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a3:349_0: Vattaṃ karontehi pana “na uddisitabbaṃ, na uddisāpetabbaṃ, na sajjhāyo kātabbo, na
atk-vin02a3:349_1: pabbājetabbaṃ, na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo, na dhammasavanaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:349_2: sabbeva hi ete papañcā. Nippapañcā hutvā samaṇadhammameva karissāmā”ti vā “sabbe
atk-vin02a3:349_3: terasa dhutaṅgāni samādiyantu, seyyaṃ akappetvā ṭhānacaṅkamehi vītināmentu, mūgabbataṃ
atk-vin02a3:349_4: gaṇhantu, sattāhakaraṇīyena gatāpi bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ labhantū”ti vā evarūpaṃ adhammikavattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:349_5: na kātabbaṃ. Evaṃ pana kātabbaṃ – pariyattidhammo nāma tividhampi saddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti;
atk-vin02a3:349_6: tasmā sakkaccaṃ uddisatha, uddisāpetha, sajjhāyaṃ karotha, padhānaghare vasantānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:349_7: saṅghaṭṭanaṃ akatvā antovihāre nisīditvā uddisatha, uddisāpetha, sajjhāyaṃ karotha,
atk-vin02a3:349_8: dhammasavanaṃ samiddhaṃ karotha, pabbājentā sodhetvā pabbājetha, sodhetvā upasampādetha,
atk-vin02a3:349_9: sodhetvā nissayaṃ detha, ekopi hi kulaputto pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca labhitvā sakalasāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:349_10: patiṭṭhāpeti, attano thāmena yattakāni sakkotha tattakāni dhutaṅgāni samādiyatha.
atk-vin02a3:349_11: Antovassaṃ nāmetaṃ sakaladivasaṃ rattiyā ca paṭhamapacchimayāmesu appamattehi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:349_12: vīriyaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ. Porāṇakamahātherāpi sabbapalibodhe chinditvā antovasse ekacārikavattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:349_14: kātuṃ vaṭṭati, āgantukānaṃ vattaṃ kātuṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena gatānaṃ apaloketvā dātuṃ
atk-vin02a3:350_0: Apica bhikkhū ovaditabbā – “viggāhikapisuṇapharusavacanāni mā vadatha, divase divase
atk-vin02a3:350_1: sīlāni āvajjentā caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentā manasikārabahulā viharathā”ti. Dantakaṭṭhakhādanavattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:350_2: ācikkhitabbaṃ, cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā vandantena gandhamālaṃ vā pūjentena pattaṃ vā
atk-vin02a3:350_3: thavikāya pakkhipantena na kathetabbaṃ, bhikkhācāravattaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ – “antogāme
atk-vin02a3:350_4: manussehi saddhiṃ paccayasaññuttakathā vā visabhāgakathā vā na kathetabbā, rakkhitindriyehi
atk-vin02a3:350_5: bhavitabbaṃ, khandhakavattañca sekhiyavattañca pūretabba”nti evarūpā bahukāpi niyyānikakathā ācikkhitabbāti.
atk-vin02a3:351_0: Pacchimavassūpanāyikadivase pana sace kālaṃ ghosetvā sannipatite saṅghe koci dasahatthaṃ
atk-vin02a3:351_1: vatthaṃ āharitvā vassāvāsikaṃ deti, āgantuko sace bhikkhu saṅghatthero hoti, tassa
atk-vin02a3:351_2: dātabbaṃ. Navako ce hoti, sammatena bhikkhunā saṅghatthero vattabbo – “sace bhante
atk-vin02a3:351_3: icchatha, paṭhamabhāgaṃ muñcitvā idaṃ vatthaṃ gaṇhathā”ti, amuñcantassa na dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:351_4: Sace pana pubbe gāhitaṃ muñcitvā gaṇhāti, dātabbaṃ. Etenevupāyena dutiyattherato
atk-vin02a3:351_5: paṭṭhāya parivattetvā pattaṭṭhāne āgantukassa dātabbaṃ. Sace paṭhamavassūpagatā dve
atk-vin02a3:351_6: tīṇi cattāri pañca vā vatthāni alatthuṃ, laddhaṃ laddhaṃ etenevupāyena vissajjāpetvā
atk-vin02a3:351_7: yāva āgantukassa samakaṃ hoti, tāva dātabbaṃ. Tena pana samake laddhe avasiṭṭho anubhāgo
atk-vin02a3:351_8: therāsane dātabbo. Paccuppanne lābhe sati ṭhitikāya gāhetuṃ katikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:352_0: Sace dubbhikkhaṃ hoti, dvīsupi vassūpanāyikāsu vassūpagatā bhikkhū bhikkhāya kilamantā
atk-vin02a3:352_1: “āvuso, idha vasantā sabbeva kilamāma, sādhu vata dvebhāgā homa, yesaṃ ñātipavāritaṭṭhānāni
atk-vin02a3:352_2: atthi, te tattha vasitvā pavāraṇāya āgantvā attano pattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ gaṇhantū”ti
atk-vin02a3:352_3: vadanti, tesu ye tattha vasitvā pavāraṇāya āgacchanti, tesaṃ apaloketvā vassāvāsikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:352_4: dātabbaṃ. Sādiyantāpi hi te neva vassāvāsikassa sāmino, khīyantāpi ca āvāsikā neva
atk-vin02a3:352_5: adātuṃ labhanti. Kurundiyaṃ pana vuttaṃ – “katikavattaṃ kātabbaṃ – ‘sabbesaṃ no idha
atk-vin02a3:352_6: yāgubhattaṃ nappahoti, sabhāgaṭṭhāne vasitvā āgacchatha, tumhākaṃ pattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:352_7: labhissathā’ti. Tañce eko paṭibāhati, supaṭibāhitaṃ; no ce paṭibāhati, katikā sukatā.
atk-vin02a3:352_8: Pacchā tesaṃ tattha vasitvā āgatānaṃ apaloketvā dātabbaṃ, apalokanakāle paṭibāhituṃ
atk-vin02a3:352_9: na labbhatī”ti. Punapi vuttaṃ – “sace vassūpagatesu ekaccānaṃ vassāvāsike apāpuṇante
atk-vin02a3:352_10: bhikkhū katikaṃ karonti – ‘chinnavassānaṃ vassāvāsikañca idāni uppajjanakavassāvāsikañca
atk-vin02a3:352_11: imesaṃ dātuṃ ruccatī’ti evaṃ katikāya katāya gāhitasadisameva hoti, uppannuppannaṃ
atk-vin02a3:353_0: Temāsaṃ pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā vihāramaggacetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇāni jaggitvā bodhirukkhe
atk-vin02a3:353_1: udakaṃ siñcitvā pakkantopi vibbhantopi vassāvāsikaṃ labhatiyeva. Bhatiniviṭṭhañhi
atk-vin02a3:353_2: tena kataṃ. Saṅghikaṃ pana apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitaṃ antovasse vibbhantopi labhateva.
atk-vin02a3:353_3: Paccayavasena gāhitaṃ pana na labhatīti vadanti.
atk-vin02a3:354_0: Sace vutthavasso disaṃgamiko bhikkhu āvāsikassa hatthato kiñcideva kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a3:354_1: gahetvā “asukakule mayhaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ pattaṃ, taṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā gataṭṭhāne vibbhamati,
atk-vin02a3:354_2: vassāvāsikaṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti. Sace pana manusse sammukhā sampaṭicchāpetvā gacchati,
atk-vin02a3:354_3: labhati. “Idaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ amhākaṃ senāsane vutthabhikkhuno demā”ti vutte, yassa
atk-vin02a3:354_4: gāhitaṃ tasseva hoti. Sace pana senāsanasāmikassa piyakamyatāya puttadhītādayo bahūni
atk-vin02a3:354_5: vatthāni āharitvā “amhākaṃ senāsane demā”ti denti, tattha vassūpagatassa ekameva
atk-vin02a3:354_6: vatthaṃ dātabbaṃ, sesāni saṅghikāni honti, vassāvāsikaṭṭhitikāya gāhetabbāni. Ṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:354_7: asati therāsanato paṭṭhāya gāhetabbāni. Senāsane vassūpagataṃ bhikkhuṃ nissāya uppannena
atk-vin02a3:354_8: cittappasādena bahūni vatthāni āharitvā “senāsanassa demā”ti dinnesupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a3:354_9: Sace pana pādamūle ṭhapetvā “etassa bhikkhuno demā”ti vadanti, tasseva honti.
atk-vin02a3:355_0: Ekassa gehe dve vassāvāsikāni – paṭhamabhāgo sāmaṇerassa gāhito hoti, dutiyo therāsane.
atk-vin02a3:355_1: So ekaṃ dasahatthaṃ, ekaṃ aṭṭhahatthaṃ sāṭakaṃ peseti “vassāvāsikaṃ pattabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:355_2: dethā”ti vicinitvā varabhāgaṃ sāmaṇerassa datvā anubhāgo therāsane dātabbo. Sace
atk-vin02a3:355_3: pana ubhopi gharaṃ netvā bhojetvā sayameva pādamūle ṭhapeti, yaṃ yassa dinnaṃ, tadeva tassa hoti.
atk-vin02a3:356_0: Ito paraṃ mahāpaccariyaṃ āgatanayo hoti – “ekassa ghare daharasāmaṇerassa vassāvāsikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:356_1: pāpuṇāti, so ce pucchati – ‘amhākaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ kassa patta’nti, ‘sāmaṇerassā’ti
atk-vin02a3:356_2: avatvā ‘dānakāle jānissasī’ti vatvā dānadivase ekaṃ mahātheraṃ pesetvā nīharāpetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:356_3: Sace yassa vassāvāsikaṃ pattaṃ, so vibbhamati vā kālaṃ vā karoti, manussā ce pucchanti
atk-vin02a3:356_4: – ‘kassa amhākaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ patta’nti, tesaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace te
atk-vin02a3:356_5: vadanti – ‘tumhākaṃ demā’ti, tassa bhikkhuno pāpuṇāti. Atha saṅghassa vā gaṇassa
atk-vin02a3:356_6: vā denti, saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā pāpuṇāti. Sace vassūpagatā suddhapaṃsukūlikāyeva
atk-vin02a3:356_7: honti, ānetvā dinnaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ senāsanaparikkhāraṃ vā katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ, bimbohanādīni
atk-vin02a3:359_0: 319. Upanandavatthusmiṃ – tattha tayā moghapurisa gahitaṃ idha muttaṃ, idha tayā
atk-vin02a3:359_1: gahitaṃ tatra muttanti ettha ayamattho – yaṃ tayā tattha senāsanaṃ gahitaṃ, taṃ te
atk-vin02a3:359_2: gaṇhanteneva idha muttaṃ hoti. “Idha dānāhaṃ, āvuso, muñcāmī”ti vadantena pana taṃ
atk-vin02a3:359_3: tatrāpi muttaṃ. Evaṃ tvaṃ ubhayattha paribāhiroti.
atk-vin02a3:360_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – gahaṇena gahaṇaṃ paṭippassambhati, gahaṇena ālayo paṭippassambhati,
atk-vin02a3:360_1: ālayena gahaṇaṃ paṭippassambhati, ālayena ālayo paṭippassambhati. Kathaṃ? Idhekacco
atk-vin02a3:360_2: vassūpanāyikadivase ekasmiṃ vihāre senāsanaṃ gahetvā sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā tatrāpi
atk-vin02a3:360_3: gaṇhāti, tassa iminā gahaṇena purimaṃ gahaṇaṃ paṭippassambhati. Aparo “idha vasissāmī”ti
atk-vin02a3:360_4: ālayamattaṃ katvā sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā tattha senāsanaṃ gaṇhāti, tassa iminā gahaṇena
atk-vin02a3:360_5: purimo ālayo paṭippassambhati. Eko “idha vasissāmī”ti senāsanaṃ vā gahetvā ālayaṃ
atk-vin02a3:360_6: vā katvā sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā “idheva dāni vasissāmī”ti ālayaṃ karoti, iccassa ālayena
atk-vin02a3:360_7: vā gahaṇaṃ ālayena vā ālayo paṭippassambhati, sabbattha pacchime gahaṇe vā ālaye
atk-vin02a3:360_8: vā tiṭṭhati. Yo pana “ekasmiṃ vihāre senāsanaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ vihāre vasissāmī”ti
atk-vin02a3:360_9: gacchati, tassa upacārasīmātikkame senāsanaggāho paṭippassambhati. Yadi pana “tattha
atk-vin02a3:360_10: phāsu bhavissati, vasissāmi; no ce, āgamissāmī”ti gantvā aphāsubhāvaṃ ñatvā paccāgacchati, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:361_0: 320. Tivassantarenāti ettha tivassantaro nāma yo dvīhi vassehi mahantataro vā daharataro
atk-vin02a3:361_1: vā hoti. Yo pana ekena vassena mahantataro vā daharataro vā hoti, yo vā samānavasso,
atk-vin02a3:361_2: tattha vattabbameva natthi. Ime sabbe ekasmiṃ mañce vā pīṭhe vā dve dve hutvā nisīdituṃ
atk-vin02a3:361_3: labhanti. Yaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pahoti, taṃ saṃhārimaṃ vā hotu asaṃhārimaṃ vā, tathārūpe api
atk-vin02a3:362_0: Hatthinakhakanti hatthikumbhe patiṭṭhitaṃ; evaṃ katassa kiretaṃ nāmaṃ. Sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoganti
atk-vin02a3:362_2: yaṃkiñci cittakammakataṃ, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. “Pāsādassa dāsidāsaṃ khettavatthuṃ gomahiṃsaṃ
atk-vin02a3:362_3: demā”ti vadanti, pāṭekkaṃ gahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, pāsāde paṭiggahite paṭiggahitameva
atk-vin02a3:362_4: hoti. Gonakādīni saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā mañcapīṭhakesu attharitvā paribhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a3:362_5: na vaṭṭanti. Dhammāsane pana gihivikaṭanihārena labbhanti, tatrāpi nipajjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:365_0: 321. Pañcimānīti rāsivasena pañca, sarūpavasena panetāni bahūni honti. Tattha ārāmo
atk-vin02a3:365_1: nāma pupphārāmo vā phalārāmo vā. Ārāmavatthu nāma tesaṃyeva ārāmānaṃ atthāya paricchinditvā
atk-vin02a3:365_2: ṭhapitokāso; tesu vā ārāmesu vinaṭṭhesu tesaṃ porāṇakabhūmibhāgo. Vihāro nāma yaṃkiñci
atk-vin02a3:365_3: pāsādādisenāsanaṃ. Vihāravatthu nāma tassa patiṭṭhānokāso. Mañco nāma – masārako,
atk-vin02a3:365_4: bundikābaddho, kuḷīrapādako āhaccapādakoti imesaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ catunnaṃ mañcānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:365_5: aññataro. Pīṭhaṃ nāma masārakādīnaṃyeva catunnaṃ pīṭhānaṃ aññataraṃ. Bhisi nāma uṇṇabhisiādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:365_6: pañcannaṃ aññatarā. Bimbohanaṃ nāma vuttappakārānaṃ bimbohanānaṃ aññataraṃ. Lohakumbhī
atk-vin02a3:365_7: nāma kāḷalohena vā tambalohena vā yena kenaci lohena katā kumbhī. Lohabhāṇakādīsupi
atk-vin02a3:365_8: eseva nayo. Ettha pana bhāṇakanti arañjaro vuccati. Vārakoti ghaṭo. Kaṭāhaṃ kaṭāhameva.
atk-vin02a3:365_9: Vāsiādīsu valliādīsu ca duviññeyyaṃ nāma natthi. Evaṃ –
atk-vin02a3:370: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayakathā – idañhi sabbampi garubhaṇḍaṃ idha avissajjiyaṃ, kīṭāgirivatthusmiṃ “avebhaṅgiya”nti vuttaṃ. Parivāre pana –
atk-vin02a3:374: Āgataṃ. Tasmā mūlacchejjavasena avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgiyañca parivattanavasena pana vissajjentassa paribhuñjantassa ca anāpattīti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
atk-vin02a3:375_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – idaṃ tāva pañcavidhampi cīvarapiṇḍapātabhesajjatthāya upanetuṃ
atk-vin02a3:375_1: na vaṭṭati. Thāvarena ca thāvaraṃ garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍaṃ parivattetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:375_2: Thāvare pana khettaṃ vatthu taḷākaṃ mātikāti evarūpaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa vicāretuṃ
atk-vin02a3:375_3: vā sampaṭicchituṃ vā adhivāsetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati, kappiyakārakeheva vicāritato kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a3:375_4: vaṭṭati. Ārāmena pana ārāmaṃ ārāmavatthuṃ vihāraṃ vihāravatthunti imāni cattāri parivattetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:376_0: Tatrāyaṃ parivattananayo – saṅghassa nāḷikerārāmo dūre hoti, kappiyakārakā vā bahutaraṃ
atk-vin02a3:376_1: khādanti. Yampi na khādanti, tato sakaṭavetanaṃ datvā appameva haranti. Aññesaṃ pana
atk-vin02a3:376_2: tassa ārāmassa avidūragāmavāsīnaṃ manussānaṃ vihārassa samīpe ārāmo hoti, te saṅghaṃ
atk-vin02a3:376_3: upasaṅkamitvā sakena ārāmena taṃ ārāmaṃ yācanti, saṅghena “ruccati saṅghassā”ti apaloketvā
atk-vin02a3:376_4: sampaṭicchitabbo. Sacepi bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhasahassaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ pañca satāni,
atk-vin02a3:376_5: “tumhākaṃ ārāmo khuddako”ti na vattabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi hi ayaṃ khuddako, atha kho itarato
atk-vin02a3:376_6: bahutaraṃ āyaṃ deti. Sacepi samakameva deti; evampi icchiticchitakkhaṇe paribhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a3:376_7: sakkāti gahetabbameva. Sace pana manussānaṃ bahutarā rukkhā honti, “nanu tumhākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:376_8: bahutarā rukkhā”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace “atirekaṃ amhākaṃ puññaṃ hotu, saṅghassa demā”ti
atk-vin02a3:376_9: vadanti, jānāpetvā sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino, manussānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:376_10: rukkhā na tāva phalaṃ gaṇhanti, kiñcāpi na gaṇhanti, na cirena gaṇhissantīti sampaṭicchitabbameva.
atk-vin02a3:376_11: Manussānaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino, bhikkhūnaṃ na tāva phalaṃ gaṇhanti, “nanu tumhākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:376_12: rukkhā phaladhārino”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace “gaṇhatha, bhante, amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-vin02a3:376_13: denti, jānāpetvā sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati; evaṃ ārāmena ārāmo parivattetabbo. Eteneva
atk-vin02a3:376_14: nayena ārāmavatthupi vihāropi vihāravatthupi ārāmena parivattetabbaṃ. Ārāmavatthunā
atk-vin02a3:376_15: ca mahantena vā khuddakena vā ārāmaārāmavatthu vihāravihāravatthūni.
atk-vin02a3:377_0: Kathaṃ vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo? Saṅghassa antogāme gehaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:377_1: vihāramajjhe pāsādo, ubhopi agghena samakā, sace manussā tena pāsādena taṃ gehaṃ
atk-vin02a3:377_2: yācanti, sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūnaṃ ce mahagghataraṃ gehaṃ hoti, “mahagghataraṃ
atk-vin02a3:377_3: amhākaṃ geha”nti vutte “kiñcāpi mahagghataraṃ, pabbajitānaṃ asāruppaṃ, na sakkā tattha
atk-vin02a3:377_4: pabbajitehi vasituṃ, idaṃ pana sāruppaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti; evampi sampaṭicchituṃ
atk-vin02a3:377_5: vaṭṭati. Sace pana manussānaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti, “nanu tumhākaṃ gehaṃ mahaggha”nti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:377_6: “Hotu, bhante, amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissati, gaṇhathā”ti vutte pana sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:377_7: Evaṃ vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo. Eteneva nayena vihāravatthupi ārāmopi ārāmavatthupi
atk-vin02a3:377_8: vihārena parivattetabbaṃ. Vihāravatthunā ca mahagghena vā appagghena vā vihāravihāravatthuārāmaārāmavatthūni.
atk-vin02a3:378_0: Garubhaṇḍena garubhaṇḍaparivattane pana mañcapīṭhaṃ mahantaṃ vā hotu khuddakaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a3:378_1: antamaso caturaṅgulapādakaṃ vā gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa
atk-vin02a3:378_2: dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Sacepi rājarājamahāmattādayo ekappahāreneva
atk-vin02a3:378_3: mañcasataṃ vā mañcasahassaṃ vā denti, sabbe kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbā, sampaṭicchitvā
atk-vin02a3:378_5: dātabbā. Atirekamañce bhaṇḍāgārādīsu paññapetvā pattacīvaraṃ nikkhipitumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:378_6: Bahisīmāya “saṅghassa demā”ti dinnamañco saṅghattherassa vasanaṭṭhāne dātabbo. Tattha
atk-vin02a3:378_7: ce bahū mañcā honti, mañcena kammaṃ natthi; yassa vasanaṭṭhāne kammaṃ atthi, tattha
atk-vin02a3:378_8: “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti dātabbo. Mahagghena satagghanakena vā sahassagghanakena
atk-vin02a3:378_9: vā satasahassagghanakena vā mañcena aññaṃ mañcasataṃ labhati, parivattetvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:378_11: parivattetuṃ vaṭṭanti. Esa nayo pīṭhabhisibimbohanesupi. Etesu hi kappiyākapyiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:378_12: vuttanayameva. Tattha akappiyaṃ na paribhuñjitabbaṃ, kappiyaṃ saṅghikaparibhogena
atk-vin02a3:378_13: paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Akappiyaṃ vā mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vā parivattetvā vuttavatthūni gahetabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:379_0: Lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṃ lohakaṭāhanti imāni tīṇi mahantāni vā hontu khuddakāni vā
atk-vin02a3:379_1: antamaso pasatamattaudakagaṇhanakānipi garubhaṇḍāniyeva. Lohavārako pana kāḷalohatambalohavaṭṭalohakaṃsalohānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:379_2: yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādagaṇhanako bhājetabbo. Pādo ca nāma magadhanāḷiyā
atk-vin02a3:379_3: pañcanāḷimattaṃ gaṇhāti, tato adhikagaṇhanako garubhaṇḍaṃ. Imāni tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni lohabhājanāni.
atk-vin02a3:380_1: khuddakāni vā mahantāni vā sabbāni garubhaṇḍāni. Patto, ayathālakaṃ, tambalohathālakanti
atk-vin02a3:380_2: imāni pana bhājanīyāni. Kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā
atk-vin02a3:380_3: vā vaṭṭati, puggalikaparibhogena na vaṭṭati. Kaṃsalohādibhājanaṃ saṅghassa dinnampi
atk-vin02a3:380_4: hi pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭati. “Gihivikaṭanihāreneva paribhuñjitabba”nti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:381_0: Ṭhapetvā pana bhājanavikatiṃ aññasmimpi kappiyalohabhaṇḍe – añjanī, añjanisalākā,
atk-vin02a3:381_1: kaṇṇamalaharaṇī, sūci, paṇṇasūci, khuddako, pipphalako, khuddakaṃ, ārakaṇṭakaṃ, kuñcikā,
atk-vin02a3:381_2: tāḷaṃ, kattarayaṭṭhi vedhako, natthudānaṃ, bhindivālo, lohakūṭo, lohakuṭṭi, lohaguḷo,
atk-vin02a3:381_4: pana aññāni vā bhitticchadanakavāṭādīsu upanetabbāni, antamaso lohakhilakaṃ upādāya
atk-vin02a3:381_5: sabbāni lohabhaṇḍāni garubhaṇḍāniyeva honti, attanā laddhānipi pariharitvā puggalikaparibhogena
atk-vin02a3:381_6: na paribhuñjitabbāni, saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti. Tipubhaṇḍepi
atk-vin02a3:382_0: Ghaṭako pana telabhājanaṃ vā pādagaṇhanakato atirekameva garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suvaṇṇarajatahārakūṭajātiphalikabhājanāni
atk-vin02a3:382_1: gihivikaṭānipi na vaṭṭanti, pageva saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena vā.
atk-vin02a3:382_2: Senāsanaparibhoge pana āmāsampi anāmāsampi sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:383_0: Vāsiādīsu yāya vāsiyā ṭhapetvā daṇḍakaṭṭhacchedanaṃ vā ucchutacchanaṃ vā aññaṃ mahākammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:383_1: kātuṃ na sakkā, ayaṃ bhājanīyā. Tato mahattarī yena kenaci ākārena katā vāsi garubhaṇḍameva.
atk-vin02a3:383_2: Pharasu pana antamaso vejjānaṃ sirāvedhanapharasupi garubhaṇḍameva. Kuṭhāriyaṃ pharasusadiso
atk-vin02a3:383_3: eva vinicchayo. Yā pana āvudhasaṅkhepena katā, ayaṃ anāmāsā. Kudālo antamaso caturaṅgulamattopi
atk-vin02a3:383_4: garubhaṇḍameva. Nikhādanaṃ caturassamukhaṃ vā hotu doṇimukhaṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā ujukaṃ
atk-vin02a3:383_5: vā, antamaso sammuñjanidaṇḍakavedhanampi daṇḍabaddhaṃ ce, garubhaṇḍameva. Sammuñjanidaṇḍakhaṇanakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:383_6: pana adaṇḍakaṃ phalamattameva, yaṃ sakkā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharituṃ, taṃ
atk-vin02a3:383_7: bhājanīyaṃ. Sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. Yehi manussehi vihāre vāsiādīni
atk-vin02a3:383_8: dinnāni honti, te ca ghare daḍḍhe vā corehi vā vilutte “detha no, bhante, upakaraṇe,
atk-vin02a3:383_9: puna pākatike karissāmā”ti vadanti, dātabbā. Sace āharanti, na vāretabbā; anāharantāpi na codetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:384_1: sabbāni lohamayaupakaraṇāni saṅghe dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍāni. Tipukoṭṭakasuvaṇṇakāracammakāraupakaraṇesupi
atk-vin02a3:384_2: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tipukoṭṭakaupakaraṇesupi tipucchedanasatthakaṃ, suvaṇṇakāraupakaraṇesu
atk-vin02a3:384_4: imāni bhājanīyabhaṇḍāni. Nahāpitatunnakāraupakaraṇesupi ṭhapetvā mahākattariṃ mahāsaṇḍāsaṃ
atk-vin02a3:385_0: Valliādīsu vettavalliādikā yā kāci aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tatthajātakā
atk-vin02a3:385_1: vā rakkhitagopitā garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, sā saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate sace atirekā
atk-vin02a3:385_2: hoti, puggalikakammepi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati; arakkhitā pana garubhaṇḍameva na hoti. Suttamakacivākanāḷikerahīracammamayā
atk-vin02a3:385_3: rajjukā vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikerahīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā ekavaṭṭā vā dvivaṭṭā
atk-vin02a3:385_4: vā saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suttaṃ pana avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ makacivākanāḷikerahīrā
atk-vin02a3:385_5: ca bhājanīyā. Yehi panetāni rajjukayottādīni dinnāni honti, te attano karaṇīyena
atk-vin02a3:386_0: Yo koci antamaso aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattopi veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako
atk-vin02a3:386_1: vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ, sopi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atireko puggalikakamme
atk-vin02a3:386_2: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Pādagaṇhanakatelanāḷi pana kattarayaṭṭhi, upāhanadaṇḍako, chattadaṇḍo,
atk-vin02a3:386_3: chattasalākāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ. Daḍḍhagehamanussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na
atk-vin02a3:386_4: vāretabbā. Rakkhitagopitaṃ veḷuṃ gaṇhantena samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā thāvaraṃ antamaso
atk-vin02a3:386_5: taṃagghanakampi phātikammaṃ katvā gahetabbo. Phātikammaṃ akatvā gaṇhantena tattheva
atk-vin02a3:386_6: vaḷañjetabbo, gamanakāle saṅghikāvāse ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ. Asatiyā gahetvā gatena
atk-vin02a3:386_7: pahiṇitvā dātabbo. Desantaraṃ gatena sampattavihāre saṅghikāvāse ṭhapetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:387_0: Tiṇanti muñjaṃ pabbajañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ yaṃkiñci tiṇaṃ. Yattha pana tiṇaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a3:387_1: tattha paṇṇehi chādenti; tasmā paṇṇampi tiṇeneva saṅgahitaṃ. Iti muñjādīsu yaṃkiñci
atk-vin02a3:387_2: muṭṭhippamāṇampi tiṇaṃ tālapaṇṇādīsu ca ekaṃ paṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:387_3: vā bahārāme saṅghassa tiṇavatthuto jātatiṇaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:387_4: tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Daḍḍhagehamanussā
atk-vin02a3:387_5: gahetvā gacchantā na vāretabbā. Aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopi rittapotthako garubhaṇḍameva.
atk-vin02a3:388_0: Mattikā pakatimattikā vā hotu pañcavaṇṇā vā sudhā vā sajjurasakaṅguṭṭhasilesādīsu
atk-vin02a3:388_1: vā yaṃkiñci, dullabhaṭṭhāne ānetvā vā dinnaṃ tatthajātakaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ tālaphalapakkamattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:388_2: garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca niṭṭhite atirekaṃ puggalikakamme
atk-vin02a3:389_0: Dārubhaṇḍe yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattopi dārubhaṇḍako dārudullabhaṭṭhāne saṅghassa
atk-vin02a3:389_1: dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito, ayaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hotīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:389_2: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sabbampi dāruveḷucammapāsāṇādivikatiṃ dārubhaṇḍena saṅgaṇhitvā
atk-vin02a3:389_3: “tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa āsandiko uppanno hotī”ti ito paṭṭhāya dārubhaṇḍavinicchayo vutto.
atk-vin02a3:390_0: Tatrāyaṃ atthuddhāro, āsandiko, sattaṅgo, bhaddapīṭhaṃ, pīṭhikā, eḷakapādakapīṭhaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:390_1: āmalakavaṭṭakapīṭhaṃ, phalakaṃ, kocchaṃ, palālapīṭhakanti imesu tāva yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:390_2: vā hotu mahantaṃ vā, saṅghassa dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Palālapīṭhena cettha kadalipattādipīṭhānipi
atk-vin02a3:390_3: saṅgahitāni. Byagghacammaonaddhampi vāḷarūpaparikkhittaṃ, ratanaparisibbitaṃ, kocchakaṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
atk-vin02a3:391_2: dārumayo vā dantamayo vā veḷumayo vā sapādakopi apādakopi samuggo, mañjūsā, pādagaṇhanakato
atk-vin02a3:391_3: atirekappamāṇo karaṇḍo, udakadoṇi, udakakaṭāhaṃ, uḷuṅko, kaṭacchu, pānīyasarāvaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:391_4: pānīyasaṅkhoti etesupi yaṃkiñci saṅghe dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. Saṅkhathālakaṃ pana bhājanīyaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:392_0: Pādakathalikamaṇḍalaṃ dārumayaṃ vā hotu coḷapaṇṇādimayaṃ vā sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. Ādhārako
atk-vin02a3:392_1: pattapidhānaṃ, tālavaṇṭaṃ, bījanī, caṅkoṭakaṃ, pacchi, yaṭṭhisammuñjanī muṭṭhisammuñjanīti
atk-vin02a3:392_2: etesupi yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā dāruveḷupaṇṇacammādīsu yena kenaci kataṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
atk-vin02a3:393_0: Thambhatulāsopānaphalakādīsu dārumayaṃ vā pāsāṇamayaṃ vā yaṃkiñci gehasambhārarūpaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:393_1: yo koci kaṭasārako, yaṃkiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ, yaṃkiñci akappiyacammaṃ, sabbaṃ saṅghe
atk-vin02a3:393_2: dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ, bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakacammaṃ pana paccattharaṇagatikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:393_3: hoti, tampi garubhaṇḍameva. Kappiyacammāni bhājanīyāni. Kurundiyaṃ pana “sabbaṃ mañcappamāṇaṃ
atk-vin02a3:394_0: Udukkhalaṃ, musalaṃ, suppaṃ, nisadaṃ, nisadapoto, pāsāṇadoṇi, pāsāṇakaṭāhaṃ, turivemabhastādi
atk-vin02a3:394_1: sabbaṃ pesakārādibhaṇḍaṃ, sabbaṃ kasibhaṇḍaṃ, sabbaṃ cakkayuttakayānaṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
atk-vin02a3:394_2: Mañcapādo, mañcaaṭanī, pīṭhapādo, pīṭhaaṭanī, vāsipharasuādīnaṃ daṇḍāti etesu yaṃkiñci
atk-vin02a3:394_3: vippakatatacchanakammaṃ aniṭṭhitameva bhājanīyaṃ, tacchitamaṭṭhaṃ pana garubhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a3:394_4: hoti. Anuññātavāsiyā pana daṇḍo chattamuṭṭhipaṇṇaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanā araṇisahitaṃ
atk-vin02a3:394_5: dhammakaraṇo pādagaṇhanakato anatirittaṃ āmalakatumbaṃ āmalakaghaṭo lābukatumbaṃ
atk-vin02a3:394_6: lābughaṭo visāṇakatumbanti sabbametaṃ bhājanīyaṃ, tato mahantataraṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.
