atk-vin02a3:395_0: Hatthidanto vā yaṃkiñci visāṇaṃ vā atacchitaṃ yathājātameva bhājanīyaṃ, tehi katamañcapādādīsu
atk-vin02a3:395_1: purimasadisoyeva vinicchayo. Tacchitaniṭṭhitopi hiṅgukaraṇḍako añjanakaraṇḍako gaṇṭhikā
atk-vin02a3:395_2: vidho añjanī añjanisalākā udakapuñchanīti idaṃ sabbaṃ bhājanīyameva.
atk-vin02a3:396_0: Mattikābhaṇḍe sabbaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ghaṭapiṭharādikulālabhājanaṃ pattakaṭāhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:396_1: aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ dhūmadānakaṃ dīparukkhako dīpakapallikā cayaniṭṭhakā chadaniṭṭhakā
atk-vin02a3:396_2: thūpikāti saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ, pādagaṇhanakato anatirittappamāṇo
atk-vin02a3:396_3: pana ghaṭako pattaṃ thālakaṃ kañcanako kuṇḍikāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ. Yathā
atk-vin02a3:396_4: ca mattikābhaṇḍe; evaṃ lohabhaṇḍepi kuṇḍikā bhājanīyakoṭṭhāsameva bhajatīti ayamettha anupubbikathā.
atk-vin02a3:399_2: na paññāyati, tāva ayaṃ vihāro etassevāti evaṃ dhūmakāle apaloketvā katapariyositaṃ
atk-vin02a3:399_3: vihāraṃ denti. Vippakatanti ettha vippakato nāma yāva gopānasiyo na ārohanti. Gopānasīsu
atk-vin02a3:399_4: pana āruḷhāsu bahukato nāma hoti, tasmā tato paṭṭhāya na dātabbo, kiñcideva samādapetvā
atk-vin02a3:399_5: kāressati. Khuddake vihāre kammaṃ oloketvā chappañcavassikanti kammaṃ oloketvā catuhatthavihāre
atk-vin02a3:399_6: catuvassikaṃ, pañcahatthe pañcavassikaṃ, chahatthe chavassikaṃ dātabbaṃ. Aḍḍhayogo
atk-vin02a3:399_7: pana yasmā sattaṭṭhahattho hoti, tasmā ettha “sattaṭṭhavassika”nti vuttaṃ. Sace pana
atk-vin02a3:399_8: so navahattho hoti navavassikampi dātabbaṃ. Mahallake pana dasahatthe ekādasahatthe
atk-vin02a3:399_9: vihāre vā pāsāde vā dasavassikaṃ vā ekādasavassikaṃ vā dātabbaṃ. Dvādasahatthe pana
atk-vin02a3:399_10: tato adhike vā lohapāsādasadisepi dvādasavassikameva dātabbaṃ, na tato uttari.
atk-vin02a3:400_0: Navakammiko bhikkhu antovasse taṃ āvāsaṃ labhati, utukāle paṭibāhituṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a3:400_1: Sace so āvāso jīrati, āvāsasāmikassa vā tassa vaṃse uppannassa vā kassaci kathetabbaṃ
atk-vin02a3:400_2: – “āvāso te nassati, jaggatha etaṃ āvāsa”nti. Sace so na sakkoti, bhikkhūhi ñātī
atk-vin02a3:400_3: vā upaṭṭhāke vā samādapetvā jaggitabbo. Sace tepi na sakkonti, saṅghikena paccayena
atk-vin02a3:400_4: jaggitabbo. Tasmimpi asati ekaṃ āvāsaṃ vissajjetvā avasesā jaggitabbā. Bahū vissajjetvā
atk-vin02a3:401_0: Dubbhikkhe bhikkhūsu pakkantesu sabbe āvāsā nassanti, tasmā ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā
atk-vin02a3:401_1: āvāse vissajjetvā tato yāgubhattacīvarādīni paribhuñjantehi sesāvāsā jaggitabbāyeva.
atk-vin02a3:401_2: Kurundiyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “saṅghike paccaye asati eko bhikkhu ‘tuyhaṃ ekaṃ mañcaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:401_3: gahetvā jaggāhī’ti vattabbo. Sace bahutaraṃ icchati, tibhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ vā
atk-vin02a3:401_4: datvāpi jaggāpetabbaṃ. Atha ‘thambhamattamevettha avasiṭṭhaṃ, bahukammaṃ kātabba’nti
atk-vin02a3:401_5: na icchati, ‘tuyhaṃ puggalikameva katvā jagga; evampi hi saṅghassa bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:401_6: navakānañca vasanaṭṭhānaṃ labhissatī’ti jaggāpetabbo. Evaṃ jaggito pana tasmiṃ jīvante
atk-vin02a3:401_7: puggaliko hoti, mate saṅghikoyeva. Sace saddhivihārikānaṃ dātukāmo hoti, kammaṃ oloketvā
atk-vin02a3:401_8: tibhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ vā puggalikaṃ katvā jaggāpetabbo. Evañhi saddhivihārikānaṃ dātuṃ
atk-vin02a3:401_9: labhati. Evaṃ jagganake pana asati ‘ekaṃ āvāsaṃ vissajjetvā’tiādinā nayena jaggāpetabbo”ti.
atk-vin02a3:402_0: Idampi ca aññaṃ tattheva vuttaṃ – dve bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ bhūmiṃ gahetvā sodhetvā saṅghikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:402_1: senāsanaṃ karonti. Yena sā bhūmi paṭhamaṃ gahitā, so sāmī. Ubhopi puggalikaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a3:402_2: soyeva sāmī. So saṅghikaṃ karoti, itaro puggalikaṃ karoti, aññaṃ ce bahuṃ senāsanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:402_3: atthi, puggalikaṃ karontopi na vāretabbo. Aññasmiṃ pana tādise paṭirūpe ṭhāne asati
atk-vin02a3:402_4: taṃ paṭibāhitvā saṅghikaṃ karonteneva kātabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana tassa tattha vayakammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:402_5: kataṃ, taṃ dātabbaṃ. Sace pana katāvāse vā āvāsakaraṇaṭṭhāne vā chāyūpagaphalūpagarukkhā
atk-vin02a3:402_6: honti, apaloketvā hāretabbā. Puggalikā ce honti, sāmikā āpucchitabbā; no ce denti,
atk-vin02a3:403_0: Yo pana saṅghikavallimattampi aggahetvā āharimena upakaraṇena saṅghikāya bhūmiyā
atk-vin02a3:403_1: puggalikavihāraṃ kāreti, upaḍḍhaṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti; upaḍḍhaṃ puggalikaṃ. Pāsādo ce
atk-vin02a3:403_2: hoti, heṭṭhāpāsādo saṅghiko; upari puggaliko. Sace so heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ icchati, tassa
atk-vin02a3:403_3: hoti. Atha heṭṭhā ca upari ca icchati, ubhayattha upaḍḍhaṃ labhati. Dve senāsanāni
atk-vin02a3:403_4: kāreti – ekaṃ saṅghikaṃ, ekaṃ puggalikaṃ. Sace vihāre uṭṭhitena dabbasambhārena kāreti,
atk-vin02a3:403_5: tatiyabhāgaṃ labhati. Sace akataṭṭhāne cayaṃ vā pamukhaṃ vā karoti, bahikuṭṭe upaḍḍhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:403_6: saṅghassa, upaḍḍhaṃ tassa. Atha mahantaṃ visamaṃ pūretvā apade padaṃ dassetvā kataṃ
atk-vin02a3:404: Ekaṃ varaseyyanti ettha navakammadānaṭṭhāne vā vassaggena pattaṭṭhāne vā yaṃ icchati, taṃ ekaṃ varaseyyaṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:405: Pariyosite pakkamati tassevetanti puna āgantvā vasantassa antovassaṃ tasseva taṃ; anāgacchantassa pana saddhivihārikādayo gahetuṃ na labhanti.
atk-vin02a3:408_0: 324. Nātiharantīti aññatra haritvā na paribhuñjanti. Guttatthāyāti yaṃ tattha mañcapīṭhādi,
atk-vin02a3:408_1: tassa guttatthāya, taṃ aññatra harituṃ anujānāmīti attho. Tasmā taṃ aññatra haritvā
atk-vin02a3:408_2: saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ sunaṭṭhaṃ, jiṇṇaṃ sujiṇṇaṃ. Sace arogaṃ
atk-vin02a3:408_3: tasmiṃ vihāre paṭisaṅkhate puna pākatikaṃ kātabbaṃ. Puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjato
atk-vin02a3:408_4: naṭṭhaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā gīvā hoti, tasmiṃ paṭisaṅkhate dātabbameva. Sace tato gopānasiādīni
atk-vin02a3:408_5: gahetvā aññasmiṃ saṅghikāvāse yojenti, suyojitāni. Puggalikāvāse yojentehi pana mūlaṃ
atk-vin02a3:408_6: vā dātabbaṃ, paṭipākatikaṃ vā kātabbaṃ chaḍḍitavihārato mañcapīṭhādīni theyyacittena
atk-vin02a3:408_7: gaṇhanto uddhāreyeva bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Puna āvāsikakāle dassāmīti gahetvā saṅghikaparibhogena
atk-vin02a3:408_8: paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ sunaṭṭhaṃ, jiṇṇaṃ sujiṇṇaṃ. Arogañce pākatikaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:408_9: Puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ gīvā hoti. Tato dvāravātapānādīni saṅghikāvāse
atk-vin02a3:409: Phātikammatthāyāti vaḍḍhikammatthāya. Phātikammañcettha samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā agghanakaṃ mañcapīṭhādisenāsanameva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:410_0: Cakkalikanti kambalādīhi veṭhetvā katacakkalikaṃ. Allehi pādehīti yehi akkantaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a3:410_1: udakaṃ paññāyati, evarūpehi pādehi paribhaṇḍakatabhūmi vā senāsanaṃ vā na akkamitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:410_2: Sace pana udakasinehamattameva paññāyati, na udakaṃ, vaṭṭati. Pādapuñchaniṃ pana
atk-vin02a3:410_3: allapādehipi akkamituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Saupāhanena dhotapādehi akkamitabbaṭṭhāneyeva na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:411_0: Coḷakena paliveṭhetunti sudhābhūmiyaṃ vā paribhaṇḍabhūmiyaṃ vā sace taṭṭikā vā kaṭasārako
atk-vin02a3:411_1: vā natthi, coḷakena pādā veṭhetabbā, tasmiṃ asati paṇṇampi attharituṃ vaṭṭati. Kiñci
atk-vin02a3:411_2: anattharitvā ṭhapentassa pana dukkaṭaṃ. Yadi pana tattha nevāsikā anatthatāyapi bhūmiyā
atk-vin02a3:411_3: ṭhapenti, adhotapādehipi vaḷañjenti, tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:412_0: Na bhikkhave parikammakatā bhittīti setabhitti vā cittakammakatā vā. Na kevalañca
atk-vin02a3:412_1: bhittimeva, dvārampi vātapānampi apassenaphalakampi pāsāṇatthambhampi rukkhatthambhampi
atk-vin02a3:412_2: cīvarena vā kenaci vā appaṭicchādetvā apassayituṃ na labbhatiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:413_0: Dhotapādakāti dhotapādakā hutvā dhotehi pādehi akkamitabbaṭṭhāne nipajjituṃ kukkuccāyanti.
atk-vin02a3:413_1: “Dhotapādake”tipi pāṭho. Dhotehi pādehi akkamitabbaṭṭhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paccattharitvāti
atk-vin02a3:413_2: paribhaṇḍakataṃ bhūmiṃ vā bhūmattharaṇasenāsanaṃ vā saṅghikamañcapīṭhaṃ vā attano
atk-vin02a3:413_3: santakena paccattharaṇena paccattharitvāva nipajjitabbaṃ. Sace niddāyatopi paccattharaṇe
atk-vin02a3:413_4: saṅkuṭite koci sarīrāvayavo mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā phusati, āpattiyeva. Lomesu pana
atk-vin02a3:413_5: lomagaṇanāya āpattiyeva. Paribhogasīsena apassayantassāpi eseva nayo. Hatthatalapādatalehi
atk-vin02a3:413_6: pana phusituṃ vā akkamituṃ vā vaṭṭati. Mañcapīṭhaṃ nīharantassa kāye paṭihaññati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a3:416_0: 325. Na sakkonti saṅghabhattaṃ kātunti sakalassa saṅghassa bhattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-vin02a3:416_1: Uddesabhattantiādīsu “ekaṃ vā dve vā…pe… dasa vā bhikkhū saṅghato uddisitvā dethā”ti
atk-vin02a3:416_2: evaṃ uddesena laddhabhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ kātuṃ icchanti. Apare tatheva bhikkhū paricchinditvā
atk-vin02a3:416_3: nimantetvā tesaṃ bhattaṃ kātuṃ icchanti. Apare salākāyo chinditvā, apare pakkhikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:416_4: uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikanti evaṃ niyāmetvā, ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā…pe… dasannaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:416_5: bhattaṃ kātuṃ icchanti. Iti etāni bhattāni uddesabhattaṃ nimantananti imaṃ vohāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:416_6: pattāni. Yasmā pana te sacepi dubbhikkhe na sakkonti, subhikkhe jāte pana puna saṅghabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:416_7: kātuṃ sakkhissanti, tasmā bhagavā tampi anto katvā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṅghabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:417_0: Tattha saṅghabhatte ṭhitikā nāma natthi, tasmā “amhākaṃ ajja dasa dvādasa divasā
atk-vin02a3:417_1: bhuñjantānaṃ idāni aññato bhikkhū ānethā”ti na evaṃ tattha vattabbaṃ. “Purimadivasesu
atk-vin02a3:417_2: amhehi na laddhaṃ, idāni taṃ amhākaṃ gāhethā”ti evampi vattuṃ na labbhati. Tañhi
atk-vin02a3:420_0: Uddesabhattādīsu pana ayaṃ nayo – raññā vā rājamahāmattena vā saṅghato uddisitvā
atk-vin02a3:420_1: “ettake bhikkhū ānethā”ti pahite kālaṃ ghosetvā ṭhitikā pucchitabbā. Sace atthi,
atk-vin02a3:420_2: tato paṭṭhāya gāhetabbaṃ; no ce, therāsanato paṭṭhāya gāhetabbaṃ. Uddesakena piṇḍapātikānampi
atk-vin02a3:420_3: na atikkāmetabbaṃ. Te pana dhutaṅgaṃ rakkhantā sayameva atikkamissanti; evaṃ gāhiyamāne
atk-vin02a3:420_4: alasajātikā mahātherā pacchā āgacchanti, “bhante, vīsativassānaṃ gāhiyati, tumhākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:420_5: ṭhitikā atikkantā”ti na vattabbā, ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ gāhetvā pacchā ṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:420_6: gāhetabbaṃ. “Asukavihāre bahuṃ uddesabhattaṃ uppanna”nti sutvā yojanantarikavihāratopi
atk-vin02a3:420_7: bhikkhū āgacchanti, sampattasampattānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya gāhetabbaṃ. Asampattānampi
atk-vin02a3:420_8: upacārasīmaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ antevāsikādīsu gaṇhantesu gāhetabbameva. Bahiupacārasīmāya
atk-vin02a3:420_9: ṭhitānaṃ gāhethāti vadanti, na gāhetabbaṃ. Sace pana upacārasīmaṃ okkantehi ekābaddhā
atk-vin02a3:420_10: hutvā attano vihāradvāre vā antovihāreyeva vā honti, parisāvasena vaḍḍhitā nāma sīmā
atk-vin02a3:420_11: hoti, tasmā gāhetabbaṃ. Saṅghanavakassa dinnepi pacchā āgatānaṃ gāhetabbameva. Dutiyabhāge
atk-vin02a3:420_12: pana therāsanaṃ āruḷhe puna āgatānaṃ paṭhamabhāgo na pāpuṇāti, dutiyabhāgato vassaggena gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:421_0: Ekasmiṃ vihāre ekaṃ bhattuddesaṭṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā gāvutappamāṇāyapi upacārasīmāya
atk-vin02a3:421_1: yattha katthaci ārocitaṃ uddesabhattaṃ, tasmiṃyeva bhattuddesaṭṭhāne gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:421_2: Eko ekassa bhikkhuno pahiṇāti “svepi saṅghato uddisitvā dasa bhikkhū pahiṇathā”ti,
atk-vin02a3:421_3: tena so attho bhattuddesakassa ārocetabbo. Sace taṃ divasaṃ pamussati, dutiyadivase
atk-vin02a3:421_4: pātova ārocetabbo. Atha pamussitvāva piṇḍāya pavisanto sarati, yāva upacārasīmaṃ
atk-vin02a3:421_5: nātikkamati, tāva yā bhojanasālāya pakatiṭṭhitikā, tassāyeva vasena gāhetabbaṃ. Sacepi
atk-vin02a3:421_6: upacārasīmaṃ atikkantā bhikkhū ca upacārasīmaṭṭhakehi ekābaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ
atk-vin02a3:421_7: dvādasahatthantaraṃ avijahitvā gacchanti, pakatiṭṭhitikāya vasena gāhetabbaṃ. Bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:421_8: pana tādise ekābaddhe asati bahiupacārasīmāya yasmiṃ ṭhāne sarati, tattha navaṃ ṭhitikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:421_9: katvā gāhetabbaṃ. Antogāme āsanasālāya sarantena āsanasālāya ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:421_10: Yattha katthaci saritvā gāhetabbameva, agāhetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Na hi etaṃ dutiyadivase labbhatīti.
atk-vin02a3:422_0: Sace sakavihārato aññaṃ vihāraṃ gacchante bhikkhū disvā koci uddesabhattaṃ uddisāpeti,
atk-vin02a3:422_1: yāva antoupacāre vā upacārasīmaṭṭhakehi saddhiṃ vuttanayena ekābaddhā vā honti, tāva
atk-vin02a3:422_2: sakavihāre ṭhitikāvaseneva gāhetabbaṃ. Bahiupacāre ṭhitānaṃ dinnaṃ pana “saṅghato
atk-vin02a3:422_3: bhante ettake nāma bhikkhū uddisathā”ti vutte sampattānaṃ gāhetabbaṃ. Tattha dvādasahatthantaraṃ
atk-vin02a3:422_4: avijahitvā ekābaddhanayena dūre ṭhitāpi sampattāyevāti veditabbaṃ. Sace yaṃ vihāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:422_5: gacchanti, tattha paviṭṭhānaṃ ārocenti, tassa vihārassa ṭhitikāvasena gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:422_6: Sacepi gāmadvāre vā vīthiyaṃ vā catukke vā antaraghare vā bhikkhū disvā koci saṅghuddesaṃ
atk-vin02a3:422_7: āroceti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne antoupacāragatānaṃ gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:423_0: Gharūpacāro cettha “ekaṃ gharaṃ ekūpacāraṃ, ekaṃ gharaṃ nānūpacāraṃ, nānāgharaṃ ekūpacāraṃ,
atk-vin02a3:423_1: nānāgharaṃ nānūpacāra”nti imesaṃ vasena veditabbo. Tattha yaṃ ekakulassa gharaṃ ekavaḷañjaṃ
atk-vin02a3:423_2: hoti, taṃ suppapātaparicchedassa anto ekūpacāraṃ nāma. Tatthuppanno uddesalābho tasmiṃ
atk-vin02a3:423_3: upacāre bhikkhācāravattenapi ṭhitānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti, etaṃ “ekaṃ gharaṃ ekūpacāraṃ” nāma.
atk-vin02a3:424_0: Yaṃ pana ekaṃ gharaṃ dvinnaṃ bhariyānaṃ sukhavihāratthāya majjhe bhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin02a3:424_1: nānādvāravaḷañjaṃ kataṃ, tatthuppanno uddesalābho bhittiantarikassa na pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin02a3:424_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnasseva pāpuṇāti, etaṃ “ekaṃ gharaṃ nānūpacāraṃ” nāma.
atk-vin02a3:425_0: Yasmiṃ pana ghare bahū bhikkhū nimantetvā antogehato paṭṭhāya ekābaddhe katvā paṭivissakagharānipi
atk-vin02a3:425_1: pūretvā nisīdāpenti, tatthuppanno uddesalābho sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti. Yampi nānākulassa
atk-vin02a3:425_2: nivesanaṃ majjhe bhittiṃ akatvā ekadvāreneva vaḷañjanti, tatrāpi eseva nayo. Etaṃ
atk-vin02a3:426_0: Yo pana nānānivesanesu nisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddesalābho uppajjati, kiñcāpi bhitticchiddena
atk-vin02a3:426_1: bhikkhū dissanti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ nivesane nisinnānaṃyeva pāpuṇāti, etaṃ “nānāgharaṃ nānūpacāraṃ” nāma.
atk-vin02a3:427_0: Yo pana gāmadvāravīthicatukkesu aññatarasmiṃ ṭhāne uddesabhattaṃ labhitvā aññasmiṃ
atk-vin02a3:427_1: bhikkhusmiṃ asati attanova pāpuṇāpetvā dutiyadivasepi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne aññaṃ labhati,
atk-vin02a3:427_2: tena yaṃ aññaṃ navakaṃ vā vuḍḍhaṃ vā bhikkhuṃ passati, tassa gāhetabbaṃ. Sace koci
atk-vin02a3:428_0: Sace āsanasālāya nisīditvā kālaṃ paṭimānentesu bhikkhūsu koci āgantvā “saṅghuddesapattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:428_1: detha, uddesapattaṃ detha, saṅghato uddisitvā pattaṃ detha, saṅghikaṃ pattaṃ dethā”ti
atk-vin02a3:428_2: vā vadati, uddesapattaṃ ṭhitikāya gāhetvā dātabbaṃ. “Saṅghuddesabhikkhuṃ detha, saṅghato
atk-vin02a3:428_3: uddisitvā bhikkhuṃ detha, saṅghikaṃ bhikkhuṃ dethā”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a3:429_0: Uddesako panettha pesalo lajjī medhāvī icchitabbo, tena tikkhattuṃ ṭhitikaṃ pucchitvā
atk-vin02a3:429_1: sace koci ṭhitikaṃ jānanto natthi, therāsanato gāhetabbaṃ. Sace pana “ahaṃ jānāmi,
atk-vin02a3:429_2: dasavassena laddha”nti koci bhaṇati, “atthāvuso, dasavassā bhikkhū”ti pucchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:429_3: Sace tassa sutvā “dasavassamha dasavassamhā”ti bahū āgacchanti, “tuyhaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin02a3:429_4: tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti avatvā “sabbe appasaddā hothā”ti vatvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:429_5: Ṭhapetvā “kati icchathā”ti upāsako pucchitabbo. “Ettake nāma, bhante, bhikkhū”ti
atk-vin02a3:429_6: vutte “tuyhaṃ pāpuṇāti, tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti avatvā sabbanavakassa vassaggañca utu
atk-vin02a3:429_7: ca divasabhāgo ca chāyā ca pucchitabbā. Sace chāyāyapi pucchiyamānāya añño vuḍḍhataro
atk-vin02a3:429_8: āgacchati, tassa dātabbaṃ. Atha chāyaṃ pucchitvā “tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vutte vuḍḍhataro
atk-vin02a3:429_9: āgacchati, na labhati. Kathāpapañcena hi nisinnassāpi niddāyantassāpi gāhitaṃ suggāhitaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:429_10: atikkantaṃ suatikkantaṃ, bhājanīyabhaṇḍañhi nāmetaṃ sampattasseva pāpuṇāti, tattha
atk-vin02a3:429_11: sampattabhāvo upacārena paricchinditabbo. Āsanasālāya ca antoparikkhepo upacāro,
atk-vin02a3:430_0: Koci āsanasālato aṭṭha uddesapatte āharāpetvā satta patte paṇītabhojanānaṃ ekaṃ udakassa
atk-vin02a3:430_1: pūretvā āsanasālāyaṃ pahiṇāti, gahetvā āgatā kiñci avatvā bhikkhūnaṃ hatthesu patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin02a3:430_2: pakkamanti. Yena yaṃ laddhaṃ, tasseva taṃ hoti. Yena pana udakaṃ laddhaṃ, tassa atikkantampi
atk-vin02a3:430_3: ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ uddesabhattaṃ gāhetabbaṃ. Tañca lūkhaṃ vā labhatu paṇītaṃ
atk-vin02a3:430_4: vā ticīvaraparivāraṃ vā, tassevetaṃ. Īdiso hissa puññaviseso. Udakaṃ pana yasmā āmisaṃ
atk-vin02a3:430_5: na hoti, tasmā aññaṃ uddesabhattaṃ labbhati.
atk-vin02a3:431_0: Sace pana te gahetvā āgatā “idaṃ kira bhante sabbaṃ bhājetvā bhuñjathā”ti vatvā gacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:431_1: sabbehi bhājetvā bhuñjitvā udakaṃ pātabbaṃ. Saṅghato uddisitvā “aṭṭha mahāthere detha,
atk-vin02a3:431_2: majjhime detha, navake detha, paripuṇṇavassasāmaṇere detha, majjhimabhāṇakādayo detha,
atk-vin02a3:431_3: mayhaṃ ñātibhikkhū dethā”ti vadantassa pana “upāsaka, tvaṃ evaṃ vadasi, ṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:431_4: pana tesaṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā ṭhitikāvaseneva dātabbā. Daharasāmaṇerehi pana uddesabhattesu
atk-vin02a3:431_5: laddhesu sace dāyakānaṃ ghare maṅgalaṃ hoti, “tumhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāye pesethā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:432_0: Yasmiṃ pana uddesabhatte paṭhamabhāgo sāmaṇerānaṃ pāpuṇāti, anubhāgo mahātherānaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:432_1: na tattha sāmaṇerā “mayaṃ paṭhamabhāgaṃ labhimhā”ti purato gantuṃ labhanti, yathāpaṭipāṭiyā
atk-vin02a3:432_2: eva gantabbaṃ. “Saṅghato uddisitvā ‘tumhe ethā’ti vutte ‘mayhaṃ aññadāpi jānissasi,
atk-vin02a3:432_3: ṭhitikā pana evaṃ gacchatī”’ti ṭhitikāvaseneva gāhetabbaṃ. Atha “saṅghuddesapattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:432_4: dethā”ti vatvā agāhiteyeva patte yassa kassaci pattaṃ gahetvā pūretvā āharati, āhaṭampi
atk-vin02a3:433_0: Eko “saṅghuddesapattaṃ āharā”ti pesito “bhante, ekaṃ pattaṃ detha, nimantanabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:433_1: āharissāmī”ti vadati, so ce uddesabhattagharato ayaṃ āgatoti ñatvā bhikkhūhi “nanu
atk-vin02a3:433_2: tvaṃ asukagharato āgato”ti vutto “āma, bhante, na nimantanabhattaṃ, uddesabhatta”nti
atk-vin02a3:433_3: bhaṇati, ṭhitikāya gahetabbaṃ. Yo pana “ekaṃ pattaṃ āharā”ti vutto “‘ki’nti vatvā
atk-vin02a3:433_4: āharāmī”ti vatvā “yathā te ruccatī”ti vutto āgacchati, ayaṃ vissaṭṭhadūto nāma. Uddesapattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:433_5: vā paṭipāṭipattaṃ vā puggalikapattaṃ vā yaṃ icchati, taṃ tassa dātabbaṃ. Eko bālo
atk-vin02a3:433_6: abyatto “uddesapattaṃ āharā”ti pesito vattuṃ na jānāti, tuṇhībhūto tiṭṭhati, so “kassa
atk-vin02a3:433_7: santikaṃ āgatosī”ti vā “kassa pattaṃ harissasī”ti vā na vattabbo. Evañhi vutto pucchāsabhāgena
atk-vin02a3:433_8: “tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgatomhī”ti “tumhākaṃ pattaṃ harissāmī”ti vā vadeyya, tato taṃ
atk-vin02a3:433_9: bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū jigucchantā na olokeyyuṃ. “Kuhiṃ gacchasi, kiṃ karonto āhiṇḍasī”ti
atk-vin02a3:433_10: pana vattabbo. Tassa “uddesapattatthāya āgatomhī”ti vadantassa gāhetvā patto dātabbo.
atk-vin02a3:434_0: Ekā kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāma hoti. Rañño vā hi rājamahāmattassa vā gehe atipaṇītāni aṭṭha
atk-vin02a3:434_1: uddesabhattāni niccaṃ diyyanti, tāni ekacārikabhattāni katvā bhikkhū visuṃ ṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:434_2: paribhuñjanti. Ekacce bhikkhū “sve dāni amhākaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti attano ṭhitikaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-vin02a3:434_3: gatā, tesu anāgatesuyeva aññe āgantukā bhikkhū āgantvā āsanasālāya nisīdanti; taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-vin02a3:434_4: rājapurisā āgantvā “paṇītabhattapatte dethā”ti vadanti. Āgantukā ṭhitikaṃ ajānantā
atk-vin02a3:434_5: gāhenti. Taṅkhaṇaññeva ca ṭhitikaṃ jānanakabhikkhū āgantvā “kiṃ gāhethā”ti vadanti.
atk-vin02a3:434_7: gāhethā”ti nivāretvā ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ. Gāhite āgatehipi pattadānakāle āgatehipi
atk-vin02a3:434_8: dinnakāle āgatehipi rājagehato patte pūretvā āhaṭakāle āgatehipi rājā “ajja bhikkhūyeva
atk-vin02a3:434_9: āgacchantū”ti pesetvā bhikkhūnaṃyeva hatthe piṇḍapātaṃ deti; evaṃ dinnapiṇḍapātaṃ
atk-vin02a3:434_10: gahetvā āgatakāle āgatehipi ṭhitikaṃ jānanakabhikkhūhi “mā bhuñjitthā”ti vāretvā
atk-vin02a3:435_0: Atha ne rājā bhojetvā pattepi nesaṃ pūretvā deti, yaṃ āhaṭaṃ taṃ ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:435_1: Sace pana “mā tucchahatthā gacchantū”ti thokameva pattesu pakkhittaṃ hoti, taṃ na
atk-vin02a3:435_2: gāhetabbaṃ. Atha bhuñjitvā tucchapattāva āgacchanti, yaṃ tehi bhuttaṃ, taṃ nesaṃ
atk-vin02a3:435_3: gīvā hotīti mahāsumatthero āha. Mahāpadumatthero panāha – “gīvākiccaṃ ettha natthi,
atk-vin02a3:435_4: ṭhitikaṃ pana ajānantehi yāva jānanakā āgacchanti, tāva nisīditabbaṃ siyā; evaṃ santepi
atk-vin02a3:436_0: Eko ticīvaraparivāro satagghanako piṇḍapāto avassikassa bhikkhuno patto, vihāre ca
atk-vin02a3:436_1: “evarūpo piṇḍapāto avassikassa patto”ti likhitvā ṭhapesuṃ. Atha saṭṭhivassaccayena
atk-vin02a3:436_2: añño tathārūpo piṇḍapāto uppanno, ayaṃ kiṃ avassikaṭṭhitikāya gāhetabbo, udāhu saṭṭhivassikaṭṭhitikāyāti.
atk-vin02a3:436_3: Saṭṭhivassikaṭṭhitikāyāti vuttaṃ, ayañhi bhikkhu ṭhitikaṃ gahetvāyeva vaḍḍhitoti.
atk-vin02a3:437_0: Eko uddesabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā sāmaṇero jāto, puna taṃ bhattaṃ sāmaṇeraṭṭhitikāya pattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:437_1: gaṇhituṃ labhati. Ayaṃ kira antarābhaṭṭhako nāma. Yo pana paripuṇṇavasso sāmaṇero
atk-vin02a3:437_2: “sve uddesabhattaṃ labhissatī”ti ajjeva upasampajjati, atikkantā tassa ṭhitikā. Ekassa
atk-vin02a3:437_3: bhikkhuno uddesabhattaṃ pattaṃ, patto cassa na tuccho hoti, so aññassa samīpe nisinnassa
atk-vin02a3:437_4: pattaṃ dāpeti, tañce theyyāya haranti, gīvā hoti. Sace pana so bhikkhu “mayhaṃ pattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:437_5: dammī”ti sayameva deti, assa gīvā na hoti. Athāpi tena bhattena anatthiko hutvā “alaṃ
atk-vin02a3:437_6: mayhaṃ, tavetaṃ bhattaṃ dammi, pattaṃ pesetvā āharāpehī”ti aññaṃ vadati, yaṃ tato
atk-vin02a3:437_7: āharīyati sabbaṃ pattasāmikassa hoti. Pattañce theyyāya haranti, suhaṭo; bhattassa
atk-vin02a3:438_0: Vihāre dasa bhikkhū honti, tesu nava piṇḍapātikā, eko sādiyanako. “Dasa uddesapatte
atk-vin02a3:438_1: dethā”ti vutte piṇḍapātikā gahetuṃ na icchanti. Itaro bhikkhu “sabbāni mayhaṃ pāpuṇantī”ti
atk-vin02a3:438_2: gaṇhāti, ṭhitikā na hoti. Ekekaṃ ce pāpetvā gaṇhāti, ṭhitikā tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ gāhetvā
atk-vin02a3:438_3: dasahipi pattehi āharāpetvā “bhante, mayhaṃ saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti nava patte piṇḍapātikānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:439_0: Sace so upāsako “bhante, gharaṃ āgantabba”nti vadati, so ca bhikkhu te bhikkhū “etha,
atk-vin02a3:439_1: bhante, mayhaṃ sahāyā hothā”ti tassa gharaṃ gacchati. Yaṃ tattha labhati, sabbaṃ
atk-vin02a3:439_2: tasseva hoti. Itare tena dinnaṃ labhanti. Atha nesaṃ ghareyeva nisīdāpetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:439_3: datvā yāgukhajjakādīni denti, “bhante, yaṃ manussā denti, taṃ gaṇhathā”ti tassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin02a3:439_4: vacaneneva itaresaṃ vaṭṭati. Bhuttāvīnaṃ patte pūretvā gaṇhitvā gamanatthāya denti,
atk-vin02a3:439_5: sabbaṃ tasseva bhikkhuno hoti, tena dinnaṃ itaresaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:440_0: Yadi pana te vihāreyeva tena bhikkhunā “bhante, mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha, manussānañca
atk-vin02a3:440_1: vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttā gacchanti, yaṃ tattha bhuñjanti ceva nīharanti ca,
atk-vin02a3:440_2: sabbaṃ taṃ tasseva santakaṃ. Athāpi “mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti avuttā “manussānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:440_3: vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gacchanti, tatra ce ekassa madhurena sarena anumodanaṃ karontassa
atk-vin02a3:440_4: sutvā therānañca upasame pasīditvā bahuṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ denti, ayaṃ theresu pasādena
atk-vin02a3:441_0: Eko saṅghato uddisāpetvā ṭhitikāya gāhitaṃ pattaṃ haritvā paṇītassa khādanīyabhojanīyassa
atk-vin02a3:441_1: pūretvā āharitvā “imaṃ, bhante, sabbo saṅgho paribhuñjatū”ti deti, sabbehi bhājetvā
atk-vin02a3:441_2: paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Pattasāmikassa pana atikkantampi ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ uddesabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:441_3: dātabbaṃ. Atha “paṭhamaṃyeva sabbaṃ saṅghikaṃ pattaṃ dethā”ti vadati, ekassa lajjibhikkhuno
atk-vin02a3:441_4: santako patto dātabbo. Āharitvā ca “sabbo saṅgho paribhuñjatū”ti vutte bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:442_0: Eko pātiyā bhattaṃ āharitvā “saṅghuddesaṃ dammī”ti vadati, ekekaṃ ālopaṃ adatvā ṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:442_1: ekassa yāpanamattaṃ katvā dātabbaṃ. Atha so bhattaṃ āharitvā kiñci vattuṃ ajānanto
atk-vin02a3:442_2: tuṇhībhūto acchati, “kassa te ānītaṃ, kassa dātukāmosī”ti na vattabbaṃ. Pucchāsabhāgena
atk-vin02a3:442_3: hi “tumhākaṃ ānītaṃ, tumhākaṃ dātukāmomhī”ti vadeyya, tato taṃ bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū
atk-vin02a3:442_4: jigucchantā gīvaṃ parivattetvā oloketabbampi na maññeyyuṃ. Sace pana “kuhiṃ yāsi,
atk-vin02a3:442_5: kiṃ karonto āhiṇḍasī”ti vutte “uddesabhattaṃ gahetvā āgatomhī”ti vadati, ekena lajjibhikkhunā
atk-vin02a3:442_6: ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ. Sace ābhataṃ bahu hoti, sabbesaṃ pahoti, ṭhitikākiccaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a3:443_0: “Saṅghuddesapattaṃ dethā”ti vutte “kiṃ āharissasī”ti avatvā pakatiṭṭhitikāya eva
atk-vin02a3:443_1: gāhetabbaṃ. Yo pana pāyāso vā rasapiṇḍapāto vā niccaṃ labbhati; evarūpānaṃ paṇītabhojanānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:443_2: āveṇikā ṭhitikā kātabbā, tathā saparivārāya yāguyā mahagghānaṃ phalānaṃ paṇītānañca
atk-vin02a3:443_3: khajjakānaṃ. Pakatibhattayāguphalakhajjakānaṃ pana ekāva ṭhitikā kātabbā. “Sappiṃ
atk-vin02a3:443_4: āharissāmī”ti vutte sabbasappīnaṃ ekāva ṭhitikā vaṭṭati, tathā sabbatelānaṃ. “Madhuṃ
atk-vin02a3:443_5: āharissāmī”ti vutte pana madhuno ekāva ṭhitikā vaṭṭati, tathā phāṇitassa laṭṭhimadhukādīnañca
atk-vin02a3:443_6: bhesajjānaṃ. Sace pana gandhamālaṃ saṅghuddesaṃ denti, piṇḍapātikassa vaṭṭati, na
atk-vin02a3:443_7: vaṭṭatīti. Āmisasseva paṭikkhittattā vaṭṭati, saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnattā pana na gahetabbanti vadanti.
atk-vin02a3:446_0: Nimantanaṃ puggalikañce, sayameva issaro. Saṅghikaṃ pana uddesabhatte vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a3:446_1: gāhetabbaṃ. Sace panettha dūto byatto hoti, “bhante, rājagehe bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:446_2: gaṇhathā”ti avatvā “bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. Atha dūto
atk-vin02a3:446_3: abyatto “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, bhattuddesako byatto “bhatta”nti avatvā “bhante,
atk-vin02a3:446_4: tumhe yāthā”ti vadati; evampi piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. Tumhākaṃ paṭipāṭiyā “bhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:446_5: pāpuṇātī”ti vutte pana na vaṭṭati. Sace nimantetuṃ āgatamanusso āsanasālaṃ pavisitvā
atk-vin02a3:446_6: “aṭṭha bhikkhū dethā”ti vā “aṭṭha patte dethā”ti vā vadati; evampi piṇḍapātikānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:446_7: vaṭṭati, “tumhe ca tumhe ca gacchathā”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace pana “aṭṭha bhikkhū detha;
atk-vin02a3:446_8: bhattaṃ gaṇhatha, aṭṭha patte detha; bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, paṭipāṭiyā gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:446_9: Gāhentena pana vicchinditvā “bhatta”nti avadantena “tumhe ca tumhe ca gacchathā”ti
atk-vin02a3:446_10: vutte piṇḍapātikānaṃ vaṭṭati. “Bhante, tumhākaṃ pattaṃ detha, tumhe ethā”ti vutte
atk-vin02a3:446_11: pana “sādhu, upāsakā”ti gantabbaṃ. Saṅghato uddisitvā “tumhe ethā”ti vuttepi yathāṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:447_0: Nimantanabhattagharato pana pattatthāya āgatassa uddesabhatte vuttanayeneva ṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:447_1: patto dātabbo. Eko “saṅghato paṭipāṭiyā patta”nti avatvā kevalaṃ “ekaṃ pattaṃ dethā”ti
atk-vin02a3:447_2: vatvā agāhiteyeva patte yassa kassaci pattaṃ gahetvā pūretvā āharati, taṃ pattasāmikasseva
atk-vin02a3:447_3: hoti, uddesabhatte viya ṭhitikāya na gāhetabbaṃ. Idhāpi yo āgantvā tuṇhībhūto tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a3:447_4: so “kassa santikaṃ āgatosī”ti vā “kassa pattaṃ harissasī”ti vā na vattabbo.
atk-vin02a3:448_0: Pucchāsabhāgena hi “tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgato, tumhākaṃ pattaṃ harissāmī”ti vadeyya,
atk-vin02a3:448_1: tato so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi jigucchanīyo assa. “Kuhiṃ gacchasi, kiṃ karonto āhiṇḍasī”ti
atk-vin02a3:448_2: pana vutte “tassa pattatthāya āgatomhī”ti vadantassa paṭipāṭiyā bhattaṭṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:448_3: gāhetvā patto dātabbo. “Bhattāharaṇakapattaṃ dethā”ti vuttepi paṭipāṭiyā bhattaṭṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:448_4: eva dātabbo. Sace āharitvā “sabbo saṅgho bhuñjatū”ti vadati, bhājetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:448_5: Pattasāmikassa atikkantampi ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ paṭipāṭibhattaṃ gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:449_0: Eko pātiyā bhattaṃ āharitvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti vadati, ālopabhattaṭṭhitikato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a3:449_1: ālopasaṅkhepena bhājetabbaṃ. Sace pana tuṇhībhūto acchati, “kassa te ābhataṃ, kassa
atk-vin02a3:449_2: dātukāmosī”ti na vattabbo. Sace pana “kuhiṃ gacchasi, kiṃ karonto āhiṇḍasī”ti vutte
atk-vin02a3:449_3: “saṅghassa me bhattaṃ ābhataṃ, therānaṃ me bhattaṃ ābhata”nti vadati, gahetvā ālopabhattaṭṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:449_4: bhājetabbaṃ. Sace pana evaṃ ābhataṃ bahuṃ hoti, sakalassa saṅghassa bahu hoti, abhihaṭabhikkhā
atk-vin02a3:449_5: nāma piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati, ṭhitikāpucchanakiccaṃ natthi, therāsanato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a3:450_0: Upāsako saṅghattherassa vā ganthadhutaṅgavasena abhiññātassa vā bhattuddesakassa
atk-vin02a3:450_1: vā pahiṇāti “amhākaṃ bhattagahaṇatthāya aṭṭha bhikkhū gahetvā āgacchathā”ti, sacepi
atk-vin02a3:450_2: ñātiupaṭṭhākehi pesitaṃ hoti, ime tayo janā pucchituṃ na labhanti, āruḷhāyeva mātikaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:450_3: saṅghato aṭṭha bhikkhū uddisāpetvā attanavamehi gantabbaṃ. Kasmā? Bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-vin02a3:450_4: hi ete bhikkhū nissāya lābho uppajjatīti. Ganthadhutaṅgādīhi pana anabhiññāto āvāsikabhikkhu
atk-vin02a3:450_5: pucchituṃ labhati, tasmā tena “kiṃ saṅghato gaṇhāmi, udāhu ye jānāmi, tehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a3:450_6: āgacchāmī”ti mātikaṃ āropetvā yathā dāyakā vadanti, tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ. “Tumhākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:450_7: nissitake vā ye vā jānātha, te gahetvā ethā”ti vutte pana ye icchanti, tehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a3:450_8: gantuṃ labhati. Sace “aṭṭha bhikkhū pahiṇathā”ti pesenti, saṅghatova pesetabbā. Attanā
atk-vin02a3:450_9: sace aññasmiṃ gāme sakkā hoti bhikkhā labhituṃ, añño gāmo gantabbo. Na sakkā ce hoti
atk-vin02a3:451_0: Nimantitabhikkhū āsanasālāya nisinnā honti, tatra ce manussā “patte dethā”ti āgacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:451_1: animantitehi na dātabbā. “Ete nimantitabhikkhū”ti vattabbaṃ. “Tumhepi dethā”ti vutte
atk-vin02a3:451_2: pana dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ussavādīsu manussā sayameva pariveṇāni ca padhānagharāni ca gantvā
atk-vin02a3:451_3: tipiṭake ca dhammakathike ca bhikkhusatenapi saddhiṃ nimantenti. Tadā yepi jānanti,
atk-vin02a3:451_4: te gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Na hi mahābhikkhusaṅghena atthikā manussā pariveṇāni
atk-vin02a3:451_5: ca padhānagharāni gacchanti, sannipātaṭṭhānatova yathāsatti yathābalaṃ bhikkhū gaṇhitvā gacchantīti.
atk-vin02a3:452_0: Sace pana saṅghatthero vā ganthadhutaṅgavasena abhiññātako vā bhattuddesako vā aññatra
atk-vin02a3:452_1: vā vassaṃ vasitvā katthaci vā gantvā puna sakaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti, manussā ca āgantukassa
atk-vin02a3:452_2: sakkāraṃ karonti, ekavāraṃ ye jānanti, te gahetvā gantabbaṃ. Paṭibaddhakālato pana
atk-vin02a3:452_3: paṭṭhāya dutiyavāre āraddhe saṅghatoyeva gahetvā gantabbaṃ. Abhinavaāgantukāva hutvā
atk-vin02a3:452_4: ñātī vā upaṭṭhāke vā passissāmāti gacchanti, tatra tesaṃ ñātī ca upaṭṭhākā ca sakkāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:452_5: karonti. Ettha pana ye jānanti, te gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:453_0: Yo pana atilābhī hoti, sakaṭṭhānañca āgantukaṭṭhānañca ekasadisaṃ, sabbattha manussā
atk-vin02a3:453_1: saṅghabhattaṃ sajjetvāva nisīdanti, tena saṅghatova gahetvā gantabbanti ayaṃ nimantane
atk-vin02a3:453_2: viseso. Avaseso sabbapañho uddesabhatte vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Kurundiyaṃ pana
atk-vin02a3:453_3: “aṭṭha mahāthere dethā”ti vutte “aṭṭha mahātherāva dātabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo majjhimādīsu.
atk-vin02a3:453_4: Sace pana avisesetvā “aṭṭha bhikkhū dethā”ti vadati, saṅghato dātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:456_0: Salākabhatte pana “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, salākāya vā paṭṭikāya vā upanibandhitvā
atk-vin02a3:456_1: opuñjitvā uddisitu”nti vacanato rukkhasāramayāya salākāya vā veḷuvilīvatālapaṇṇādimayāya
atk-vin02a3:456_2: paṭṭikāya vā “asukassa nāma salākabhatta”nti evaṃ akkharāni upanibandhitvā pacchiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:456_3: vā cīvarabhoge vā katvā sabbā salākāyo opuñjitvā punappunaṃ heṭṭhuparivaseneva āloḷetvā
atk-vin02a3:456_4: pañcaṅgasamannāgatena bhattuddesakena sace ṭhitikā atthi, ṭhitikato paṭṭhāya; no
atk-vin02a3:456_5: ce atthi, therāsanato paṭṭhāya salākā dātabbā. Pacchā āgatānampi ekābaddhavasena
atk-vin02a3:457_0: Sace vihārassa samantato bahū gocaragāmā, bhikkhū pana na bahukā, gāmavasenapi salākāyo
atk-vin02a3:457_1: pāpuṇanti, “tumhākaṃ asukagāme salākabhattaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti gāmavaseneva gāhetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:457_2: Evaṃ gāhentena sacepi ekekasmiṃ gāme nānappakārāni saṭṭhisalākabhattāni, sabbāni
atk-vin02a3:457_3: gāhitāneva honti, tassa pattagāmasamīpe aññānipi dve tīṇi salākabhattāni honti, tānipi
atk-vin02a3:457_4: tasseva dātabbāni. Na hi sakkā tesaṃ kāraṇā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ pahiṇitunti.
atk-vin02a3:458_0: Sace ekaccesu gāmesu bahūni salākabhattāni sallakkhetvā sattannampi aṭṭhannampi bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:458_1: dātabbāni. Dadantena pana catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhattānaṃ salākāyo ekato bandhitvā dātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:458_2: Sace taṃ gāmaṃ atikkamitvā añño gāmo hoti, tasmiñca ekameva salākabhattaṃ, taṃ pana
atk-vin02a3:458_3: pātova denti, tampi etesu bhikkhūsu ekassa niggahena datvā “pātova taṃ gahetvā pacchā
atk-vin02a3:458_4: orimagāme itarāni bhattāni gaṇhāhī”ti vattabbo. Sace orimagāme salākabhattesu agāhitesveva
atk-vin02a3:458_5: gāhitasaññāya gacchati, parabhāgagāme salākabhattaṃ gāhetvā puna vihāraṃ āgantvā
atk-vin02a3:458_6: itarāni gāhetvā orimagāmo gantabbo. “Na hi bahisīmāya saṅghalābho gāhetuṃ labbhatī”ti
atk-vin02a3:459_0: Sace pana bhikkhū bahū honti, gāmavasena salākā na pāpuṇanti, vīthivasena vā vīthiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:459_1: ekagehavasena vā kulavasena vā gāhetabbā. Vīthiādīsu ca yattha bahūni bhattāni, tattha
atk-vin02a3:459_2: gāme vuttanayeneva bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāhetabbāni. Salākāsu asati uddisitvāpi gāhetabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:460_0: Salākadāyakena pana vattaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Tena hi kālasseva vuṭṭhāya pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
atk-vin02a3:460_1: bhojanasālaṃ gantvā asammaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin02a3:460_2: “idāni bhikkhūhi vattaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti kālaṃ sallakkhetvā ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā
atk-vin02a3:460_3: bhikkhūsu sannipatitesu paṭhamameva vāragāme salākabhattaṃ gāhetabbaṃ. “Tuyhaṃ asukasmiṃ
atk-vin02a3:460_4: nāma vāragāme salākā pāpuṇāti tatra gacchā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:461_0: Sace atirekagāvute gāmo hoti, taṃ divasaṃ gacchantā kilamanti, “sve tuyhaṃ vāragāme
atk-vin02a3:461_1: pāpuṇātī”ti ajjeva gāhetabbaṃ. Yo vāragāmaṃ pesiyamāno na gacchati, aññaṃ salākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:461_2: maggati, na dātabbā. Saddhānañhi manussānaṃ puññahāni saṅghassa ca lābhacchedo hoti,
atk-vin02a3:461_3: tasmā tassa dutiyepi tatiyepi divase aññā salākā na dātabbā, “attano pattaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:461_4: gantvā bhuñjāhī”ti vattabbo, tīṇi pana divasāni agacchantassa vāragāmato orimavāragāme
atk-vin02a3:461_5: salākā gāhetabbā. Tañce na gaṇhāti, tato paṭṭhāya tassa aññaṃ salākaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a3:461_6: daṇḍakammaṃ pana gāḷhaṃ kātabbaṃ, saṭṭhito vā paṇṇāsato vā na parihāpetabbaṃ. Vāragāme
atk-vin02a3:461_7: gāhetvā vihāravāro gāhetabbo, “tuyhaṃ vihāravāro pāpuṇātī”ti vattabbaṃ. Vihāravārikassa
atk-vin02a3:461_8: dve tisso yāgusalākāyo tisso catasso vā bhattasalākāyo ca dātabbā, nibaddhaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a3:461_9: pana na dātabbā. Yāgubhattadāyakā hi “amhākaṃ yāgubhattaṃ vihāragopakāva bhuñjantī”ti
atk-vin02a3:461_10: aññathattaṃ āpajjeyyuṃ, tasmā aññesu kulesu dātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:462_0: Sace vihāravārikānaṃ sabhāgā āharitvā denti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce, vāraṃ gāhetvā
atk-vin02a3:462_1: tesaṃ yāgubhattaṃ āharāpetabbaṃ. Tāva nesaṃ salākā phātikammameva bhavanti, vassaggena
atk-vin02a3:462_2: pattaṭṭhāne pana aññampi paṇītabhattasalākaṃ gaṇhituṃ labhantiyeva. Atirekauttaribhaṅgassa
atk-vin02a3:462_3: ekacārikabhattassa visuṃ ṭhitikaṃ katvā salākā dātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:463_0: Sace yena salākā laddhā, so taṃdivasaṃ taṃ bhattaṃ na labhati, punadivase gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:463_1: Bhattameva labhati, na uttaribhaṅgaṃ; evampi puna gāhetabbaṃ. Khīrabhattassa salākāyapi
atk-vin02a3:463_2: eseva nayo. Sace pana khīrameva labhati, na bhattaṃ; khīralābhato paṭṭhāya puna na
atk-vin02a3:463_3: gāhetabbaṃ. Dve tīṇi ekacārikabhattāni ekasseva pāpuṇanti, dubbhikkhasamaye saṅghanavakena
atk-vin02a3:463_4: laddhakāle vijaṭetvā visuṃ gāhetabbāni, pākatikasalākabhattaṃ aladdhassāpi punadivase gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:464_0: Sace khuddako vihāro hoti, sabbe bhikkhū ekasambhogā, ucchusalākaṃ gāhentena yassa
atk-vin02a3:464_1: kassaci sammukhībhūtassa pāpetvā mahātherādīnaṃ divā tacchetvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Rasasalākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:464_2: pāpetvā pacchābhattaṃ parissāvetvā vā phāṇitaṃ vā kāretvā piṇḍapātikādīnampi dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:464_3: Āgantukānaṃ āgatānāgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā gāhetabbā, mahāāvāse ṭhitikaṃ katvā gāhetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:465_0: Takkasalākampi sabhāgaṭṭhāne pāpetvā vā pacāpetvā vā dhūmāpetvā vā therānaṃ dātuṃ
atk-vin02a3:465_2: visuṃ ṭhitikāya gāhetabbā. Bhesajjādisalākāyo cettha kiñcāpi piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭanti,
atk-vin02a3:465_3: salākavasena gāhitattā pana na sāditabbā. Aggabhikkhāmattaṃ salākabhattaṃ denti,
atk-vin02a3:465_4: ṭhitikaṃ pucchitvā gāhetabbaṃ. Asatiyā ṭhitikāya therāsanato paṭṭhāya gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:465_5: Sace tādisāni bhattāni bahūni honti, ekekassa bhikkhuno dve tīṇi dātabbāni; no ce,
atk-vin02a3:465_6: ekekameva datvā paṭipāṭiyā gatāya puna therāsanato paṭṭhāya dātabbaṃ. Sace antarāva
atk-vin02a3:465_7: upacchijjati, ṭhitikā sallakkhetabbā. Yadi pana tādisaṃ bhattaṃ nibaddhameva hoti,
atk-vin02a3:465_8: yassa pāpuṇāti, so vattabbo “laddhā vā aladdhā vā svepi gaṇheyyāsī”ti. Ekaṃ anibaddhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:465_9: hoti, labhanadivase pana yāvadatthaṃ labhati, alabhanadivasā bahutarā honti, taṃ
atk-vin02a3:465_10: yassa pāpuṇāti, so alabhitvā “sve gaṇheyyāsī”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin02a3:466_0: Yo salākāsu gāhitāsu pacchā āgacchati, tassa atikkantāva salākā na upaṭṭhāpetvā dātabbā.
atk-vin02a3:466_1: Salākaṃ nāma ghaṇṭippaharaṇato paṭṭhāya āgantvā hatthaṃ pasārentova labhati. Aññassa
atk-vin02a3:466_2: āgantvā samīpe ṭhitassāpi atikkantā atikkantāva hoti. Sace panassa añño gaṇhanto
atk-vin02a3:466_3: atthi, sayaṃ anāgatopi labhati. Sabhāgaṭṭhāne asuko anāgatoti ñatvā “ayaṃ tassa salākā”ti
atk-vin02a3:466_4: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace “anāgatassa na dātabbā”ti katikaṃ karonti, adhammikā hoti.
atk-vin02a3:466_5: Antoupacāre ṭhitassa hi bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇāti. Sace pana “anāgatassa dethā”ti
atk-vin02a3:466_6: mahāsaddaṃ karonti, daṇḍakammaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, “āgantvā gaṇhantū”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:467_0: Chappañcasalākā naṭṭhā honti, bhattuddesako dāyakānaṃ nāmaṃ nassarati, so ce naṭṭhasalākā
atk-vin02a3:467_1: mahātherassa vā attano vā pāpetvā bhikkhū vadeyya, “mayā asukagāme salākabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:467_2: mayhaṃ pāpitaṃ, tumhe tattha laddhaṃ salākabhattaṃ bhuñjeyyāthā”ti, vaṭṭati. Vihāre
atk-vin02a3:467_3: apāpitaṃ pana āsanasālāya taṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā tattheva pāpetvā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:467_4: “Ajja paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ salākabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte tatra āsanasālāya gāhetuṃ na
atk-vin02a3:467_5: vaṭṭati, vihāraṃ ānetvā gāhetabbaṃ. “Sve paṭṭhāyā”ti vutte pana bhattuddesakassa
atk-vin02a3:467_6: ācikkhitabbaṃ “sve paṭṭhāya asukakulaṃ nāma salākabhattaṃ deti, salākaggāhaṇakāle
atk-vin02a3:467_7: sareyyāsī”ti. Dubbhikkhe salākabhattaṃ pacchinditvā subhikkhe jāte kiñci disvā “ajja
atk-vin02a3:467_8: paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ salākabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti puna paṭṭhapenti, antogāme agāhetvā vihāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:467_9: ānetvāva gāhetabbaṃ. Idañhi “salākabhattaṃ” nāma. Uddesabhattasadisaṃ na hoti, vihārameva
atk-vin02a3:467_10: sandhāya diyyati, tasmā bahiupacāre gāhetuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Sve paṭṭhāyā”ti vutte pana
atk-vin02a3:468_0: Gamiko bhikkhu yaṃ disābhāgaṃ gantukāmo, tattha aññena vāragāmasalākā laddhā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:468_1: taṃ gahetvā itaraṃ bhikkhuṃ “mayhaṃ pattasalākaṃ tvaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:468_2: Tena pana upacārasīmaṃ anatikkanteyeva tasmiṃ tassa salākā gāhetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:469_0: Chaḍḍitavihāre manussā bodhicetiyādīni jaggitvā bhuñjantūti salākabhattaṃ paṭṭhapenti,
atk-vin02a3:469_1: bhikkhū sakaṭṭhānesu vasitvā kālasseva gantvā tattha vattaṃ karitvā taṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanti,
atk-vin02a3:469_2: vaṭṭati. Sace tesu svātanāya attano pāpetvā gatesu āgantuko bhikkhu chaḍḍitavihāre
atk-vin02a3:469_3: vasitvā kālasseva vattaṃ katvā ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā salākabhattaṃ attano pāpetvā āsanasālaṃ
atk-vin02a3:469_4: gacchati, sova tassa bhattassa issaro. Yo pana bhikkhūsu vattaṃ karontesuyeva bhūmiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:469_5: dve tayo sammuñjanippahāre datvā ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā “dhuragāme salākabhattaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:469_6: pāpuṇātī”ti gacchati, tassa taṃ corikāya gahitattā na pāpuṇāti, vattaṃ katvā pāpetvā
atk-vin02a3:470_0: Eko gāmo atidūre hoti, bhikkhū niccaṃ gantuṃ na icchanti, manussā “mayaṃ puññena
atk-vin02a3:470_1: paribāhirā homā”ti vadanti, ye tassa gāmassa āsannavihāre sabhāgabhikkhū, te vattabbā
atk-vin02a3:470_2: “imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāgatadivase tumhe bhuñjathā”ti. Salākā pana devasikaṃ pāpetabbā,
atk-vin02a3:470_3: tā ca kho pana ghaṇṭippaharaṇamattena vā pacchicālanamattena vā pāpitā na honti,
atk-vin02a3:470_4: pacchiṃ pana gahetvā salākā pīṭhake ākiritabbā, pacchi pana mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ na gahetabbā.
atk-vin02a3:470_5: Sace hi tattha ahi vā vicchiko vā bhaveyya, dukkhaṃ uppādeyya; tasmā heṭṭhā gahetvā
atk-vin02a3:470_6: pacchiṃ parammukhaṃ katvā salākā ākiritabbā “sacepi sappo bhavissati, ettova palāyissatī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:470_7: Evaṃ salākā ākiritvā gāmādivasena pubbe vuttanayeneva gāhetabbā. Apica ekaṃ mahātherassa
atk-vin02a3:470_8: pāpetvā “avasesā mayhaṃ pāpuṇantī”ti attano pāpetvā vattaṃ katvā cetiyaṃ vanditvā
atk-vin02a3:470_9: vitakkamāḷake ṭhitehi bhikkhūhi “pāpitā, āvuso, salākā”ti vutte “āma, bhante, tumhe
atk-vin02a3:470_10: gatagatagāme salākabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattabbaṃ; evaṃ pāpitāpi hi supāpitāva honti.
atk-vin02a3:471_0: Bhikkhū sabbarattiṃ dhammasavanatthaṃ aññaṃ vihāraṃ gacchantā “mayaṃ tattha dānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:471_1: aggahetvāva amhākaṃ gocaragāmeva piṇḍāya caritvā āgamissāmā”ti salākā aggahetvāva
atk-vin02a3:471_2: gatā, vihāre therassa pattasalākabhattaṃ bhuñjituṃ āgacchanti, vaṭṭati. Atha mahātheropi
atk-vin02a3:471_3: “ahaṃ idha kiṃ karomī”ti tehiyeva saddhiṃ gacchati, tehi gatavihāre abhuñjitvāva
atk-vin02a3:471_4: gocaragāmaṃ anuppattehi “detha, bhante, patte salākayāguādīni āharissāmā”ti vutte
atk-vin02a3:471_5: pattā na dātabbā. “Kasmā, bhante, na dethā”ti “vihāraṭṭhakaṃ bhattaṃ vihāre vutthānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:471_6: pāpuṇāti, mayaṃ aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthā”ti. “Detha, bhante, na mayaṃ vihāre pālikāya
atk-vin02a3:471_7: dema, tumhākaṃ dema, gaṇhatha amhākaṃ bhikkha”nti vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:474_0: Pakkhikādīsu pana yaṃ abhilakkhitesu cātuddasī pañcadasī pañcamī aṭṭhamīti imesu
atk-vin02a3:474_1: pakkhesu kammappasutehi uposathaṃ kātuṃ satikaraṇatthāya diyyati, taṃ pakkhikaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a3:474_2: Taṃ salākabhattagatikameva hoti, gāhetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ. Sace salākabhattampi pakkhikabhattampi
atk-vin02a3:474_3: bahu sabbesaṃ vinivijjhitvā gacchati, dvepi bhattāni visuṃ visuṃ gāhetabbāni. Sace
atk-vin02a3:474_4: bhikkhusaṅgho mahā, pakkhikaṃ gāhetvā tassa ṭhitikāya salākabhattaṃ gāhetabbaṃ, salākabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:474_5: vā gāhāpetvā tassa ṭhitikāya pakkhikaṃ gāhetabbaṃ. Yesaṃ na pāpuṇāti, te piṇḍāya
atk-vin02a3:474_6: carissanti. Sace dvepi bhattāni bahūni, bhikkhū mandā; salākabhattaṃ nāma devasikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:474_7: labbhati, tasmā taṃ ṭhapetvā “pakkhikaṃ āvuso bhuñjathā”ti pakkhikameva gāhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:474_8: Pakkhikaṃ paṇītaṃ denti, visuṃ ṭhitikā kātabbā. “Sve pakkho”ti ajja pakkhikaṃ na
atk-vin02a3:474_9: gāhetabbaṃ. Sace pana dāyakā vadanti “sve amhākaṃ ghare lūkhabhattaṃ bhavissati,
atk-vin02a3:475_0: Uposathikaṃ nāma anvaḍḍhamāse uposathaṅgāni samādiyitvā yaṃ attanā bhuñjati, tadeva
atk-vin02a3:475_1: diyyati. Pāṭipadikaṃ nāma “uposathe bahū saddhā pasannā bhikkhūnaṃ sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a3:475_2: pāṭipade pana bhikkhū kilamanti, pāṭipade dinnaṃ dubbhikkhadānasadisaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-vin02a3:475_3: hoti, uposathakammena vā parisuddhasīlānaṃ dutiyadivase dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotī”ti
atk-vin02a3:475_4: sallakkhetvā pāṭipade diyyanakadānaṃ, tampi ubhayaṃ salākabhattagatikameva. Iti imāni
atk-vin02a3:475_5: sattapi bhattāni piṇḍapātikānaṃ na vaṭṭanti, dhutaṅgabhedaṃ karontiyeva.
atk-vin02a3:476_0: Aparānipi cīvarakkhandhake visākhāya varaṃ yācitvā dinnāni āgantukabhattaṃ gamiyabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:476_1: gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattanti cattāri bhattāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāneva, tattha
atk-vin02a3:476_2: āgantukānaṃ dinnaṃ bhattaṃ “āgantukabhattaṃ”. Esa nayo sesesu. Sace panettha āgantukabhattānipi
atk-vin02a3:476_3: āgantukāpi bahū honti, sabbesaṃ ekekaṃ gāhetabbaṃ, bhattesu appahontesu ṭhitikāya
atk-vin02a3:476_4: gāhetabbaṃ. Eko āgantuko paṭhamameva āgantvā sabbaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ attano gāhetvā
atk-vin02a3:476_5: nisīdati, sabbaṃ tasseva hoti, pacchā āgatehi āgantukehi tena dinnāni paribhuñjitabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:476_6: Tenapi ekaṃ attano gahetvā sesāni dātabbāni. Ayaṃ uḷāro.
atk-vin02a3:477_0: Sace pana yo paṭhamaṃ āgantvāpi attano aggahetvā tuṇhībhūto nisīdati, pacchā āgatehi
atk-vin02a3:477_1: saddhiṃ paṭipāṭiyā gaṇhitabbaṃ. Sace niccaṃ āgantukā āgacchanti, āgatadivaseyeva
atk-vin02a3:477_2: bhuñjitabbaṃ, antarantarā ce āgacchanti, dve tīṇi divasāni bhuñjitabbaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:478_0: Āvāsiko katthaci gantvā āgato, tenāpi āgantukabhattaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Sace pana
atk-vin02a3:478_1: taṃ vihāre nibandhāpitaṃ hoti, vihāre gāhetabbaṃ. Atha vihāro dūre hoti, āsanasālāya
atk-vin02a3:478_2: nibandhāpitaṃ āsanasālāya gāhetabbaṃ. Sace pana dāyakā “āgantukesu asati āvāsikāpi
atk-vin02a3:479_0: Gamiyabhattepi ayameva kathāmaggo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – āgantuko āgantukabhattameva
atk-vin02a3:479_1: labhati, gamiko āgantukabhattampi gamiyabhattampi. Āvāsikopi pakkamitukāmo gamiko
atk-vin02a3:479_2: hoti; gamiyabhattaṃ labhati. Yathā pana āgantukabhattaṃ; evamidaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā
atk-vin02a3:479_3: satta vā divasāni na labbhati. “Gamissāmī”ti bhutto taṃdivasaṃ kenacideva kāraṇena
atk-vin02a3:479_4: na gato, punadivasepi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, saussāhattā. “Gamissāmī”ti bhuttassa corā
atk-vin02a3:479_5: vā panthaṃ rundhanti udakaṃ vā, devo vā vassati, sattho vā na gacchati, saussāhena
atk-vin02a3:479_6: bhuñjitabbaṃ. Ete upaddave olokentena “dve tayo divase bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:479_7: vuttaṃ. “Gamissāmī”ti pana lesaṃ oḍḍetvā bhuñjituṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a3:480_0: Gilānabhattampi sace sabbesaṃ gilānānaṃ pahoti, sabbesaṃ dātabbaṃ; no ce, ṭhitikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:480_1: katvā gāhetabbaṃ. Eko gilāno arogarūpo sakkoti antogāmaṃ gantuṃ, eko na sakkoti,
atk-vin02a3:480_2: ayaṃ “mahāgilāno” nāma. Etassa gilānabhattaṃ dātabbaṃ. Dve mahāgilānā – eko lābhī
atk-vin02a3:480_3: abhiññāto bahuṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ labhati, eko anātho appalābhatāya antogāmaṃ
atk-vin02a3:480_4: pavisati – etassa gilānabhattaṃ dātabbaṃ. Gilānabhatte pana divasaparicchedo natthi.
atk-vin02a3:480_5: Yāva rogo na vūpasammati, sappāyabhojanaṃ abhuñjanto na yāpeti, tāva bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:480_6: Yadā pana missakayāguṃ vā missakabhattaṃ vā bhuttassāpi rogo na kuppati, tato paṭṭhāya na bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:481_0: Gilānupaṭṭhākabhattampi yaṃ sabbesaṃ pahoti, taṃ sabbesaṃ dātabbaṃ; no ce pahoti,
atk-vin02a3:481_1: ṭhitikaṃ katvā gāhetabbaṃ. Idampi dvīsu gilānesu mahāgilānupaṭṭhākassa gāhetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:481_2: dvīsu mahāgilānesu anāthagilānupaṭṭhākassa. Yaṃ kulaṃ gilānabhattampi deti gilānupaṭṭhākabhattampi,
atk-vin02a3:481_3: tattha yassa gilānassa bhattaṃ pāpuṇāti tadupaṭṭhākassāpi tattheva gāhetabbaṃ. Gilānupaṭṭhākabhattepi
atk-vin02a3:481_4: divasaparicchedo natthi, yāva gilāno labhati, tāvassa upaṭṭhākopi labhatīti. Imāni
atk-vin02a3:481_5: cattāri bhattāni sace evaṃ dinnāni honti “āgantukagamikagilānupaṭṭhākā mama bhikkhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:481_6: gaṇhantū”ti, piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. Sace pana āgantukādīnaṃ bhattaṃ nibandhāpemi,
atk-vin02a3:481_7: “mama bhattaṃ gaṇhantū”ti evaṃ dinnāni honti, piṇḍapātikānaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:482_0: Aparānipi “dhurabhattaṃ, kuṭibhattaṃ, vārabhatta”nti tīṇi bhattāni. Tattha dhurabhattanti
atk-vin02a3:482_1: niccabhattaṃ vuccati, taṃ duvidhaṃ – saṅghikaṃ puggalikañca. Tattha yaṃ “saṅghassa
atk-vin02a3:482_2: dhurabhattaṃ demā”ti nibandhāpitaṃ, taṃ salākabhattagatikaṃ. “Mama nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:482_3: gaṇhantū”ti vatvā dinnaṃ pana piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. Puggalikepi “tumhākaṃ dhurabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a3:482_4: dammī”ti vutte piṇḍapātiko ce, na vaṭṭati. “Mama nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte
atk-vin02a3:482_5: pana vaṭṭati, sāditabbaṃ. Sacepi pacchā katipāhe vītivatte “dhurabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
atk-vin02a3:483_0: Kuṭibhattaṃ nāma yaṃ saṅghassa āvāsaṃ kāretvā “amhākaṃ senāsanavāsino amhākaṃyeva
atk-vin02a3:483_1: bhattaṃ gaṇhantū”ti evaṃ nibandhāpitaṃ, taṃ salākabhattagatikameva hoti, gahetvā
atk-vin02a3:483_2: bhuñjitabbaṃ. “Amhākaṃ senāsanavāsino amhākaṃyeva bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti vutte pana
atk-vin02a3:483_3: piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana puggale pasīditvā tassa vā āvāsaṃ katvā “tumhākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:483_4: demā”ti dinnaṃ, taṃ tasseva hoti, tasmiṃ katthaci gate nissitakehi bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:484_0: Vārabhattaṃ nāma dubbhikkhasamaye “vārena bhikkhū jaggissāmā”ti dhuragehato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a3:484_1: dinnaṃ, tampi bhikkhāvacanena dinnaṃ piṇḍapātikānaṃ vaṭṭati. “Vārabhatta”nti vutte
atk-vin02a3:484_2: pana salākabhattagatikaṃ hoti. Sace taṇḍulādīni pesenti, “sāmaṇerā pacitvā dentū”ti,
atk-vin02a3:484_3: piṇḍapātikānaṃ vaṭṭati. Iti imāni ca tīṇi āgantukabhattādīni ca cattārīti satta,
atk-vin02a3:484_4: tāni saṅghabhattādīhi saha cuddasa bhattāni honti.
atk-vin02a3:485_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vihārabhattaṃ, aṭṭhakabhattaṃ, catukkabhattaṃ, guḷhakabhattanti
atk-vin02a3:485_1: aññānipi cattāri bhattāni vuttāni. Tattha vihārabhattaṃ nāma vihāre tatruppādabhattaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:485_2: taṃ saṅghabhattena gahitaṃ. Taṃ pana tissamahāvihāracittalapabbatādīsu paṭisambhidāpattehi
atk-vin02a3:485_3: khīṇāsavehi yathā piṇḍapātikānampi sakkā hoti paribhuñjituṃ, tathā paṭiggahitattā
atk-vin02a3:485_4: tādisesu ṭhānesu piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. “Aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dema, catunnaṃ demā”ti
atk-vin02a3:485_5: evaṃ dinnaṃ pana aṭṭhakabhattañceva catukkabhattañca; tampi bhikkhāvacanena dinnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:485_6: piṇḍapātikānaṃ vaṭṭati. Mahābhisaṅkhārikena atirasakapūvena pattaṃ pūretvā thaketvā
atk-vin02a3:485_7: dinnaṃ guḷhakabhattaṃ nāma. Imāni tīṇi salākabhattagatikāneva.
atk-vin02a3:486_0: Aparampi guḷakabhattaṃ nāma atthi, idhekacce manussā mahādhammasavanañca vihārapūjañca
atk-vin02a3:486_1: kāretvā sakalasaṅghassa dātuṃ na sakkomāti, “dve tīṇi bhikkhusatāni amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ
atk-vin02a3:486_2: gaṇhantū”ti bhikkhuparicchedajānanatthaṃ guḷake denti, idaṃ piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:486_3: Iti cīvarakkhandhake cīvarabhājanīyaṃ, imasmiṃ pana senāsanakkhandhake senāsanabhājanīyañceva
atk-vin02a3:487_0: Gilānapaccayabhājanīyaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ – sappiādīsu bhesajjesu rājarājamahāmattā
atk-vin02a3:487_1: sappissa tāva kumbhasatampi kumbhasahassampi vihāraṃ pesenti, ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā therāsanato
atk-vin02a3:487_2: paṭṭhāya gahitabhājanaṃ pūretvā dātabbaṃ, piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. Sace alasajātikā
atk-vin02a3:487_3: mahātherā pacchā āgacchanti, “bhante, vīsativassānaṃ diyyati, tumhākaṃ ṭhitikā atikkantā”ti
atk-vin02a3:487_4: na vattabbā, ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ datvā pacchā ṭhitikāya dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:488_0: “Asukavihāre bahu sappi uppanna”nti sutvā yojanantaravihāratopi bhikkhū āgacchanti,
atk-vin02a3:488_1: sampattasampattānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dātabbaṃ. Asampattānampi upacārasīmaṃ
atk-vin02a3:488_2: paviṭṭhānaṃ antevāsikādīsu gaṇhantesu dātabbameva. “Bahiupacārasīmāya ṭhitānaṃ dethā”ti
atk-vin02a3:488_3: vadanti, na dātabbaṃ. Sace pana upacārasīmaṃ okkantehi ekābaddhā hutvā attano vihāradvāre
atk-vin02a3:488_4: vā antovihāreyeva vā honti, parisāvasena vaḍḍhitā nāma sīmā hoti, tasmā dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:488_5: Saṅghanavakassa dinnepi pacchā āgatānaṃ dātabbameva. Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:488_6: āruḷhe pacchā āgatānaṃ paṭhamabhāgo na pāpuṇāti, dutiyabhāgato vassaggena dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:488_7: Upacārasīmaṃ pavisitvā yattha katthaci dinnaṃ hoti, sabbasannipātaṭṭhāneyeva bhājetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:489_0: Yasmiṃ vihāre dasa bhikkhū, daseva ca sappikumbhā diyyanti, ekekakumbhavaseneva bhājetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:489_1: Eko sappikumbho hoti, dasa bhikkhūhi bhājetvā gahetabbaṃ. Sace yathāṭhitaṃyeva “amhākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:489_2: pāpuṇātī”ti gaṇhanti, duggahitaṃ; gatagataṭṭhāne saṅghikameva hoti. Kumbhaṃ pana
atk-vin02a3:489_3: āvajjetvā thālake thokaṃ sappiṃ katvā “idaṃ mahātherassa pāpuṇāti, avasesaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:489_4: pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā tampi kumbheyeva ākiritvā yathicchitaṃ gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:489_5: Sace thinaṃ sappi hoti, lekhaṃ katvā “lekhato parabhāgo mahātherassa pāpuṇāti, avasesaṃ
atk-vin02a3:489_6: amhāka”nti gahitampi suggahitaṃ, vuttaparicchedato ūnādhikesupi bhikkhūsu ca sappikumbhesu
atk-vin02a3:490_0: Sace paneko bhikkhu, ekopi kumbho hoti, ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ pāpuṇātī”tipi
atk-vin02a3:490_1: gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Ayaṃ paṭhamabhāgo mayhaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ dutiyabhāgo”ti evaṃ thokaṃ
atk-vin02a3:490_2: thokampi pāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Esa nayo navanītādīsupi. Yasmiṃ pana vippasanne tilatelādimhi
atk-vin02a3:490_3: lekhā na santiṭṭhati, taṃ uddharitvā bhājetabbaṃ. Siṅgiveramaricādibhesajjampi avasesapattathālakādisamaṇaparikkhāropi
atk-vin02a3:490_4: sabbo vuttānurūpeneva nayena suṭṭhu sallakkhetvā bhājetabboti.
atk-vin02a3:494_1: upaḍḍhabhāgo dātabbo, asammatehi pana apaloketvā dātabbo. Sammatena appamattakavissajjanakena
atk-vin02a3:494_2: bhikkhunā cīvarakammaṃ karontassa “sūciṃ dehī”ti vadato ekā dīghā, ekā rassāti dve
atk-vin02a3:494_3: sūciyo dātabbā. “Avibhattaṃ saṅghikaṃ bhaṇḍa”nti pucchitabbakiccaṃ natthi. Pipphalakatthikassa
atk-vin02a3:494_4: eko pipphalako, addhānakantāraṃ paṭipajjitukāmassa upāhanayugaḷaṃ, kāyabandhanatthikassa
atk-vin02a3:494_5: kāyabandhanaṃ, “aṃsabaddhako me jiṇṇo”ti āgatassa aṃsabaddhako, parissāvanatthikassa
atk-vin02a3:494_6: parissāvanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Dhammakaraṇatthikassa dhammakaraṇo. Sace paṭako na hoti, dhammakaraṇo
atk-vin02a3:494_7: paṭakena saddhiṃ dātabbo. “Āgantukapaṭṭaṃ āropessāmī”ti yācantassa kusiyā ca aḍḍhakusiyā
atk-vin02a3:494_8: ca pahonakaṃ dātabbaṃ. “Maṇḍalaṃ nappahotī”ti āgatassa maṇḍalaṃ ekaṃ dātabbaṃ, aḍḍhamaṇḍalāni
atk-vin02a3:494_9: dve dātabbāni. Dve maṇḍalāni yācantassa na dātabbāni. Anuvātaparibhaṇḍatthikassa
atk-vin02a3:494_10: ekassa cīvarassa pahonakaṃ dātabbaṃ. Sappinavanītādiatthikassa gilānassa ekaṃ bhesajjaṃ
atk-vin02a3:494_11: nāḷimattaṃ katvā tato tatiyakoṭṭhāso dātabbo. Evaṃ tīṇi divasāni datvā nāḷiyā paripuṇṇāya
atk-vin02a3:494_12: catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya saṅghaṃ pucchitvā dātabbaṃ. Guḷapiṇḍepi ekadivasaṃ tatiyabhāgo
atk-vin02a3:494_13: dātabbo. Evaṃ tīhi divasehi niṭṭhite piṇḍe tato paraṃ saṅghaṃ pucchitvā dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:499_0: 330. Saṅghabhedakakkhandhake abhiññātā abhiññātāti pākaṭā pākaṭā. Sakyakumārā nāma
atk-vin02a3:499_1: kāḷudāyippabhutayo dasa dūtā saddhiṃ parivārehi aññe ca bahū janā. Amhākanti amhesu;
atk-vin02a3:499_2: amhākaṃ kulatoti vā vuttaṃ hoti. Gharāvāsatthaṃ anusāsissāmīti gharāvāse yaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:499_3: taṃ jānāpessāmi. Udakaṃ ninnetabbanti yathā udakaṃ sabbaṭṭhāne samaṃ hoti, evaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:499_4: Niddhāpetabbanti tiṇāni uddharitabbāni. Bhusikā uddharāpetabbāti sukhumapalālamissadhaññā
atk-vin02a3:499_5: palālikā palāpetabbā. Opunāpetabbanti sukhumapalālaṃ apanetabbaṃ. Tvaññeva gharāvāsatthena
atk-vin02a3:499_6: upajānāhīti tvaññeva gharāvāsatthaṃ jānāhi. Ahaṃ tayā yathāsukhaṃ pabbajāhīti ettha
atk-vin02a3:499_7: ahaṃ tayā saddhiṃ pabbajissāmīti sahāyasinehena sahasā vattukāmo hutvā puna rajjasirilobhena
atk-vin02a3:499_8: parikaḍḍhiyamānahadayo “ahaṃ tayā”ti ettakameva vatvā sesaṃ vattuṃ nāsakkhīti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a3:500: 331. Nippātitāti nikkhamitā. Mānassinoti mānassayino; mānanissitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:501_0: 332. Yassantarato na santi kopāti tatiyamaggena samūhatattā yassa citte kopā na santi.
atk-vin02a3:501_1: Yasmā pana bhavoti sampatti, vibhavoti vipatti; tathā bhavoti vuḍḍhi, vibhavoti hāni;
atk-vin02a3:501_2: bhavoti sassataṃ, vibhavoti ucchedo; bhavoti puññaṃ, vibhavoti pāpaṃ; vibhavoti ca
atk-vin02a3:501_3: abhavoti ca atthato ekameva, tasmā itibhavābhavatañca vītivattoti ettha yā esā sampattivipattivuḍḍhihānisassatucchedapuññapāpavasena
atk-vin02a3:501_4: iti anekappakārā bhavābhavatā vuccati; catūhipi maggehi yathāsambhavaṃ tena tena
atk-vin02a3:501_5: nayena taṃ itibhavābhavatañca vītivattoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Nānubhavantīti na
atk-vin02a3:501_6: sampāpuṇanti; tassa dassanaṃ devānampi dullabhanti adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a3:502: 333. Ahimekhalikāti ahiṃ kaṭiyaṃ bandhitvā. Ucchaṅgeti aṅke.
atk-vin02a3:503: 334. Sammannatīti sammāneti. Yaṃ tumo karissatīti yaṃ so karissati.
atk-vin02a3:506: 336. Kheḷāsakassāti ettha micchājīvena uppannapaccayā ariyehi vantabbā kheḷasadisā, tathārūpe paccaye ayaṃ ajjhoharatīti katvā kheḷāsakoti bhagavatā vutto.
atk-vin02a3:508: 342. Mayaṃ kho bhaṇe rājañātakā nāmāti rājā amhe jānātīti rājañātakassa bhāvena attānaṃ ukkaṃsanto āha. Pahaṭṭhakaṇṇavāloti bandhane niccale katvā.
atk-vin02a3:509: Dukkhañhi kuñjara nāgamāsadoti bho kuñjara buddhanāgaṃ āsādanaṃ vadhakacittena upagamanaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ. Nāgahatassāti buddhanāgaṃ ghātakassa.
atk-vin02a3:510_0: Paṭikuṭiyova osakkīti tathāgatābhimukhoyeva piṭṭhimehi pādehi avasakki. Alakkhikoti
atk-vin02a3:510_1: ettha na lakkhetīti alakkhiko; na jānātīti attho, ahaṃ pāpakammaṃ karomīti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a3:510_2: Na lakkhitabboti vā alakkhiko; na passitabboti attho.
atk-vin02a3:511_0: 343. Tikabhojananti ettha tīhi janehi bhuñjitabbabhojanaṃ. Taṃ paññāpessāmīti taṃ
atk-vin02a3:511_1: anujānissāmi. Gaṇabhojane pana yathādhammo kāretabboti. Pañcavatthuyācanakathā saṅghādisesavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:511_2: vuttā. Kappanti āyukappaṃ. Brahmaṃ puññanti seṭṭhaṃ puññaṃ. Kappaṃ saggamhīti āyukappameva.
atk-vin02a3:514: 344. Atha kho devadatto saṅghaṃ bhinditvāti so kira evaṃ salākaṃ gāhetvā tattheva āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ katvā gato, tenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:515_0: 345. Piṭṭhi me āgilāyatīti ciranisajjāya vedanābhibhūtā bādhati. Tamahaṃ āyamissāmīti
atk-vin02a3:515_1: taṃ ahaṃ pasāressāmi. Ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsanī nāma “evampi te mano, tathāpi te
atk-vin02a3:515_2: mano”ti evaṃ parassa cittaṃ jānitvā tadanurūpā dhammadesanā.
atk-vin02a3:516_0: 346. Mamānukubbanti mamānukiriyaṃ kurumāno. Kapaṇoti dukkhito. Mahāvarāhassāti mahānāgassa.
atk-vin02a3:516_1: Mahiṃ vikubbatoti pathaviṃ padālentassa. Bhisaṃ ghasamānassāti bhisaṃ khādantassa.
atk-vin02a3:516_2: Nadīsu jaggatoti ettha so kira hatthināgo sāyanhasamayaṃ taṃ nadināmakaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ
atk-vin02a3:516_3: ogāhetvā kilanto sabbarattiṃ vītināmesi, jālikaṃ karoti, tena vuttaṃ “nadīsu jaggato”ti.
atk-vin02a3:517: 347. Sutāti sotā. Asandiddho ca akkhātīti nissandeho hutvā akkhāti anusandhivasena yojetvā yojetvā.
atk-vin02a3:518: 350. Apāye nibbattissatīti āpāyiko. Evaṃ nerayiko. Kappaṃ ṭhassatīti kappaṭṭho. Idāni buddhasahassenāpi tikicchituṃ na sakkāti atekiccho.
atk-vin02a3:519_0: Mā jātu koci lokasminti mā kadācipi koci satto lokasmiṃ. Udapajjathāti upapajjatha.
atk-vin02a3:519_1: Jalaṃva yasasā aṭṭhāti yasasā jalanto viya ṭhito. Devadattoti me sutanti “īdiso devadatto”ti
atk-vin02a3:519_2: bhagavatā sutampi atthi, tadeva gahetvā idaṃ vuttaṃ. So pamādamanuciṇṇoti ettha pamādaṃ
atk-vin02a3:519_3: anucinātīti anuciṇṇo, pamādo appahīnoti attho. Āsajja nanti pāpakena cittena patvā,
atk-vin02a3:519_4: visosetvāti vā attho. Avīcinirayaṃ pattoti idaṃ pana āsīsāyaṃ atītavacanaṃ. Bhesmāti bhayānako.
atk-vin02a3:522_0: 351. Ekato upāli ekoti dhammavādipakkhe eko. Ekato dveti adhammavādipakkhe dve. Catuttho
atk-vin02a3:522_1: anussāvetīti saṅghaṃ bhindissāmīti adhammavādicatuttho hutvā anussāveti; anunayanto
atk-vin02a3:522_2: sāveti “na tumhākaṃyeva narakabhayaṃ atthi, amhākampi atthi, na amhākaṃ avīcimaggo
atk-vin02a3:522_3: pihito, na mayaṃ akusalā na bhāyāma. Yadi hi ayaṃ adhammo avinayo asatthusāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:522_4: vā bhaveyya, na mayaṃ gaṇheyyāmā”tiādinā nayena “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti evaṃ aṭṭhārasa
atk-vin02a3:522_5: bhedakaravatthūni bodhetīti attho. Salākaṃ gāhetīti evaṃ anussāvetvā pana “idaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-vin02a3:523: Ekato upāli dve hontītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ kho upāli saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo cāti evaṃ hoti; na pana ettāvatā saṅgho bhinno hoti.
atk-vin02a3:524_0: Bhikkhu kho upāli pakatatto samānasaṃvāsako samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhito saṅghaṃ bhindatīti
atk-vin02a3:524_1: ettha siyā evaṃ “devadatto kathaṃ pakatatto”ti. Kathaṃ tāva na pakatatto, rañño ghātāpitattā
atk-vin02a3:524_2: ruhiruppādassa ca katattāti? Tattha vadāma – āṇattiyā tāva viraddhattā rañño ghātāpanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:524_3: natthi. “Tena hi tvaṃ, kumāra, pitaraṃ hantvā rājā hohi, ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ hantvā
atk-vin02a3:524_4: buddho bhavissāmī”ti evañhi tassa āṇatti. Kumāro pana rājā hutvā pacchā pitaraṃ māresi;
atk-vin02a3:524_5: evaṃ tāva āṇattiyā viraddhattā rañño ghātāpanaṃ natthi. Ruhiruppāde pana katamatteyeva
atk-vin02a3:524_6: ruhiruppādapaccayā bhagavatā abhabbatā na vuttā, na ca sakkā bhagavato vacanaṃ vināyeva
atk-vin02a3:525: “Ruhiruppādako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti –
atk-vin02a3:526: Idaṃ pana bhagavatā saṅghabhedato pacchā vuttaṃ, tasmā pakatatteneva tena saṅgho bhinnoti.
atk-vin02a3:527_0: Adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpentītiādīsu aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu suttantapariyāyena
atk-vin02a3:527_1: tāva dasa kusalakammapathā dhammo, dasa akusalakammapathā adhammo. Tathā cattāro
atk-vin02a3:527_2: satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni,
atk-vin02a3:527_3: satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā dhammo nāma;
atk-vin02a3:527_4: tayo satipaṭṭhānā, tayo sammappadhānā, tayo iddhipādā, cha indriyāni, cha balāni,
atk-vin02a3:527_5: aṭṭha bojjhaṅgā, navaṅgiko maggoti ca cattāro upādānā, pañca nīvaraṇā, satta anusayā,
atk-vin02a3:528_0: Tattha yaṃkiñci ekaṃ adhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā “imaṃ adhammaṃ dhammoti karissāma;
atk-vin02a3:528_1: evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyakulaṃ nissāya niyyānikaṃ bhavissati, mayañca loke pākaṭā bhavissāmā”ti
atk-vin02a3:528_2: taṃ adhammaṃ “dhammo aya”nti kathayantā adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpenti nāma. Tatheva dhammakoṭṭhāsesu
atk-vin02a3:528_3: ca ekaṃ gahetvā ayaṃ adhammoti kathentā dhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti nāma. Vinayapariyāyena
atk-vin02a3:528_4: pana bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā yathāpaṭiññāya kātabbaṃ kammaṃ dhammo nāma,
atk-vin02a3:528_5: abhūtena vatthunā acodetvā asāretvā apaṭiññāya kātabbaṃ kammaṃ adhammo nāma.
atk-vin02a3:529_0: Suttantapariyāyena rāgavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo saṃvaro pahānaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti
atk-vin02a3:529_1: ayaṃ vinayo nāma, rāgādīnaṃ avinayo asaṃvaro appahānaṃ appaṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ avinayo
atk-vin02a3:529_2: nāma. Vinayapariyāyena vatthusampatti ñattisampatti anussāvanasampatti sīmāsampatti
atk-vin02a3:529_3: parisāsampattīti ayaṃ vinayo nāma, vatthuvipatti…pe… parisāvipattīti ayaṃ avinayo nāma.
atk-vin02a3:530_0: Suttantapariyāyena cattāro satipaṭṭhānā… aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti idaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ
atk-vin02a3:530_1: tathāgatena; tayo satipaṭṭhānā, tayo sammappadhānā, tayo iddhipādā, cha indriyāni,
atk-vin02a3:530_2: cha balāni, aṭṭha bojjhaṅgā, navaṅgiko maggoti idaṃ abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena.
atk-vin02a3:530_3: Vinayapariyāyena cattāro pārājikā, terasa saṅghādisesā, dve aniyatā, tiṃsa nissaggiyā
atk-vin02a3:530_4: pācittiyāti idaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena; tayo pārājikā, cuddasa saṅghādisesā,
atk-vin02a3:530_5: tayo aniyatā, ekattiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena.
atk-vin02a3:531_1: buddhacakkhunā lokavolokanaṃ, aṭṭhuppattivasena suttantadesanā, jātakakathāti idaṃ
atk-vin02a3:531_2: āciṇṇaṃ; na devasikaṃ phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ…pe… na jātakakathāti idaṃ anāciṇṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:531_3: Vinayapariyāyena nimantitassa vassāvāsaṃ vasitvā apaloketvā cāriyapakkamanaṃ, pavāretvā
atk-vin02a3:531_4: cāriyapakkamanaṃ, āgantukehi saddhiṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇanti idaṃ āciṇṇaṃ;
atk-vin02a3:532_0: Suttantapariyāyena cattāro satipaṭṭhānā…pe… aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti idaṃ paññattaṃ nāma;
atk-vin02a3:532_1: tayo satipaṭṭhānā…pe… navaṅgiko maggoti idaṃ apaññattaṃ nāma. Vinayapariyāyena cattāro
atk-vin02a3:532_2: pārājikā…pe… tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ paññattaṃ nāma; tayo pārājikā…pe…
atk-vin02a3:532_3: ekattiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ apaññattaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a3:533_1: na mocanādhippāyassā”ti tattha tattha vuttā anāpatti anāpatti nāma. “Jānantassa,
atk-vin02a3:533_2: theyyacittassā”tiādinā nayena vuttā āpatti āpatti nāma. Pañcāpattikkhandhā lahukāpatti
atk-vin02a3:533_3: nāma, dve āpattikkhandhā garukāpatti nāma. Cha āpattikkhandhā sāvasesāpatti nāma,
atk-vin02a3:533_4: eko pārājikāpattikkhandho anavasesāpatti nāma. Dve āpattikkhandhā duṭṭhullāpatti
atk-vin02a3:534_0: Purimanayeneva panettha vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ “adhammo aya”nti kathayantā “dhammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:534_1: adhammo”ti dīpenti nāma. Avinayaṃ “vinayo aya”nti…pe… aduṭṭhullāpattiṃ “duṭṭhullāpatti
atk-vin02a3:534_2: aya”nti kathayantā “aduṭṭhullāpattiṃ duṭṭhullāpattī”ti dīpenti nāma. Evaṃ “adhammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:534_3: dhammo”ti vā…pe… “aduṭṭhullāpattiṃ duṭṭhullāpattī”ti vā dīpetvā pakkhaṃ labhitvā
atk-vin02a3:534_4: catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ aññataraṃ saṅghakammaṃ ekasīmāyaṃ visuṃ karontehi saṅgho
atk-vin02a3:534_5: bhinno nāma hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “te imehi aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi apakassantī”tiādi.
atk-vin02a3:535_0: Tattha apakassantīti parisaṃ ākaḍḍhanti, vijaṭenti, ekamantaṃ ussārenti ca. Avapakāsantīti
atk-vin02a3:535_1: ati viya pakāsenti yathā visaṃsaṭṭhāva honti, evaṃ karonti. Āveninti visuṃ. Ettāvatā
atk-vin02a3:535_2: kho upāli saṅgho bhinno hotīti evaṃ aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu yaṃkiñci ekampi
atk-vin02a3:535_3: vatthuṃ dīpetvā tena tena kāraṇena “imaṃ gaṇhatha, imaṃ rocethā”ti saññāpetvā salākaṃ
atk-vin02a3:535_4: gāhāpetvā visuṃ saṅghakamme kate saṅgho bhinno hoti. Parivāre pana “pañcahi upāli
atk-vin02a3:535_5: ākārehi saṅgho bhijjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ, tassa iminā idha vuttena saṅghabhedalakkhaṇena
atk-vin02a3:535_6: atthato nānākaraṇaṃ natthi. Taṃ panassa nānākaraṇābhāvaṃ tattheva pakāsayissāma.
atk-vin02a3:540_0: 357. Vattakkhandhake idāni ārāmaṃ pavisissāmīti iminā upacārasīmasamīpaṃ dasseti;
atk-vin02a3:540_1: tasmā upacārasīmaṃ patvā upāhanāomuñcanādi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ. Gahetvāti upāhanadaṇḍakena
atk-vin02a3:540_2: gahetvā. Paṭikkamantīti sannipatanti. Vissajjetabbanti pattharitabbaṃ. Gocaro pucchitabboti
atk-vin02a3:540_3: “gocaragāmo āsanne udāhu dūre, kālasseva piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ udāhu divā”ti evaṃ bhikkhācāro
atk-vin02a3:540_4: pucchitabbo. Agocaro nāma micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ vā gāmo paricchinnabhikkho vā gāmo; yattha
atk-vin02a3:540_5: ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā bhikkhā diyyati, sopi pucchitabbo. Pānīyaṃ pucchitabbanti “kiṃ
atk-vin02a3:540_6: imissā pokkharaṇiyā pānīyaṃyeva pivanti, nahānādiparibhogampi karontī”ti evaṃ pānīyañceva
atk-vin02a3:540_7: paribhojanīyañca pucchitabbaṃ. Kesuci ṭhānesu vāḷamigā vā amanussā vā honti, tasmā
atk-vin02a3:540_8: “kaṃ kālaṃ pavisitabbaṃ, kaṃ kālaṃ nikkhamitabba”nti pucchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:541_0: Bahi ṭhitenāti bahi nikkhamantassa ahino vā amanussassa vā maggaṃ datvā ṭhitena nilloketabbo.
atk-vin02a3:541_1: Sace ussahati sodhetabboti yadi sakkoti, sabbo vihāro sodhetabbo. Asakkontena attano
atk-vin02a3:541_2: vasanokāso jaggitabbo. Sabbaṃ sodhetuṃ sakkontassa pana dassite vihārasodhanavatte
atk-vin02a3:544_0: 359. Āvāsikavatte – āsanaṃ paññapetabbanti evamādi sabbaṃ vuḍḍhatare āgate cīvarakammaṃ
atk-vin02a3:544_1: vā navakammaṃ vā ṭhapetvāpi kātabbaṃ. Cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjantena sammajjaniṃ nikkhipitvā
atk-vin02a3:544_2: tassa vattaṃ kātuṃ ārabhitabbaṃ. Paṇḍito hi āgantuko “sammajjāhi tāva cetiyaṅgaṇa”nti
atk-vin02a3:544_3: vakkhati. Gilānabhesajjaṃ karontena pana sace nātiāturo gilāno hoti, bhesajjaṃ akatvā
atk-vin02a3:544_4: vattameva kātabbaṃ. Mahāgilānassa pana bhesajjameva kātabbaṃ. Paṇḍito hi āgantuko
atk-vin02a3:544_5: “karohi tāva bhesajja”nti vakkhati. Pānīyena pucchantena sace sakiṃ ānītaṃ pānīyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:544_6: sabbaṃ pivati, “puna ānemī”ti pucchitabboyeva. Apica bījanenapi bījitabbo, bījantena
atk-vin02a3:544_7: sakiṃ pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ bījitvā sakiṃ majjhe sakiṃ sīse bījitabbaṃ, “alaṃ hotū”ti vuttena
atk-vin02a3:544_8: tato mandataraṃ bījitabbaṃ. Puna “ala”nti vuttena tato mandataraṃ bījitabbaṃ. Tatiyavāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:544_9: vuttena bījanī ṭhapetabbā. Pādāpissa dhovitabbā, dhovitvā sace attano telaṃ atthi,
atk-vin02a3:544_10: tena makkhetabbā. No ce atthi, tassa santakena makkhetabbā. Upāhanāpuñchanaṃ pana
atk-vin02a3:544_11: attano rucivasena kātabbaṃ. Teneva hettha “sace ussahatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā upāhanā
atk-vin02a3:544_12: apuñchantassāpi anāpatti. “Kattha mayhaṃ senāsanaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti pucchitena senāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:544_13: paññapetabbaṃ, “etaṃ tumhākaṃ senāsanaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti evaṃ ācikkhitabbanti attho. Papphoṭetvā
atk-vin02a3:545_0: Navakassa vatte – pānīyaṃ ācikkhitabbanti “etaṃ pānīyaṃ gahetvā pivāhī”ti ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:545_1: Paribhojanīyepi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Mahāāvāsepi attano santikaṃ sampattassa
atk-vin02a3:548_0: 360. Gamikavattesu dārubhaṇḍanti senāsanakkhandhake vuttaṃ mañcapīṭhādi. Mattikābhaṇḍampi
atk-vin02a3:548_1: rajanabhājanādi sabbaṃ tattha vuttappabhedameva. Taṃ sabbaṃ aggisālāya vā aññatarasmiṃ
atk-vin02a3:548_2: vā guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmetvā gantabbaṃ. Anovassake pabbhārepi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Senāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a3:548_3: āpucchitabbanti ettha yaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ, yattha
atk-vin02a3:548_4: upacikā nārohanti, taṃ anāpucchantassāpi anāpatti. Catūsu pāsāṇakesūtiādi upacikānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:548_5: uppattiṭṭhāne paṇṇasālādisenāsane kattabbākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Appeva nāma aṅgānipi
atk-vin02a3:548_6: seseyyunti ayaṃ ajjhokāse ṭhapitamhi ānisaṃso. Ovassakagehe pana tiṇesu ca mattikāpiṇḍesu
atk-vin02a3:548_7: ca upari patantesu mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgānipi vinassanti.
atk-vin02a3:551_0: 362. Anumodanavatthusmiṃ iddhaṃ ahosīti sampannaṃ ahosi. Catūhi pañcahīti saṅghattherena
atk-vin02a3:551_1: anumodanatthāya nisinne heṭṭhā paṭipāṭiyā catūhi nisīditabbaṃ. Anuthere nisinne mahātherena
atk-vin02a3:551_2: ca heṭṭhā ca tīhi nisīditabbaṃ. Pañcame nisinne upari catūhi nisīditabbaṃ. Saṅghattherena
atk-vin02a3:551_3: heṭṭhā daharabhikkhusmiṃ ajjhiṭṭhepi saṅghattherato paṭṭhāya catūhi nisīditabbameva.
atk-vin02a3:551_4: Sace pana anumodako bhikkhu “gacchatha bhante, āgametabbakiccaṃ natthī”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a3:551_5: gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Mahātherena “gacchāma āvuso”ti vutte “gacchathā”ti vadati, evampi
atk-vin02a3:551_6: vaṭṭati. “Bahigāme āgamessāmā”ti ābhogaṃ katvāpi bahigāmaṃ gantvā attano nissitake
atk-vin02a3:551_7: “tumhe tassa āgamanaṃ āgamethā”ti vatvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Sace pana manussā attano
atk-vin02a3:551_8: rucikena ekena anumodanaṃ kārenti, neva tassa anumodato āpatti, na mahātherassa bhāro
atk-vin02a3:551_9: hoti. Upanisinnakathāyameva hi manussesu kathāpentesu mahāthero āpucchitabbo, mahātherena
atk-vin02a3:551_10: ca anumodanāya ajjhiṭṭhova āgametabboti idamettha lakkhaṇaṃ. Vaccitoti sañjātavacco;
atk-vin02a3:554_0: 364. Bhattaggavatte “antogāmo vā hotu vihāro vā, manussānaṃ parivesanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantena
atk-vin02a3:554_1: cīvaraṃ pārupitvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhanameva vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Na there
atk-vin02a3:554_2: bhikkhū anupakhajjāti there bhikkhū atiallīyitvā na nisīditabbaṃ. Sace mahātherassa
atk-vin02a3:554_3: nisinnāsanena samakaṃ āsanaṃ hoti, bahūsu āsanesu sati ekaṃ dve āsanāni ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a3:554_4: nisīditabbaṃ. Bhikkhū gaṇetvā paññattāsanesu anisīditvā mahātherena nisīdāti vuttena
atk-vin02a3:554_5: nisīditabbaṃ. No ce mahāthero vadati, “idaṃ, bhante, āsanaṃ ucca”nti vattabbaṃ. “Nisīdā”ti
atk-vin02a3:554_6: vutte nisīditabbaṃ. Sace pana evaṃ āpucchitepi na vadati, nisīdantassa anāpatti;
atk-vin02a3:554_7: mahātherasseva āpatti. Navako hi evarūpe āsane anāpucchā nisīdanto āpajjati, thero
atk-vin02a3:554_8: āpucchite ananujānanto. Na saṅghāṭiṃ ottharitvāti na saṅghāṭiṃ avattharitvā nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:555: Ubhohi hatthehīti pattadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dakkhiṇodakaṃ pana purato ādhārake pattaṃ ṭhapetvā gahetabbaṃ. Sādhukanti udakasaddaṃ akarontena.
atk-vin02a3:556_0: Sūpassa okāsoti yathā sūpassa okāso hoti; evaṃ mattāya odano gaṇhitabboti attho.
atk-vin02a3:556_1: Samakaṃ sampādehīti idaṃ na kevalaṃ sappiādīsuyeva odanepi vattabbaṃ. Sappiādīsu
atk-vin02a3:556_2: pana yaṃ appaṃ hoti ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā anurūpakaṃ, taṃ sabbesaṃ samakaṃ sampādehīti
atk-vin02a3:556_3: vutte manussānaṃ vihasā hoti, tasmā tādisaṃ sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā gahetvā sesaṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:557_0: Na tāva therena bhuñjitabbanti idaṃ yaṃ paricchinnabhikkhukaṃ bhattaggaṃ, yattha
atk-vin02a3:557_1: manussā sabbesaṃ pāpetvā dātukāmā honti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana mahābhattaggaṃ
atk-vin02a3:557_2: hoti, yattha ekasmiṃ padese bhuñjanti, ekasmiṃ padese udakaṃ diyyati, tattha yathāsukhaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:558_0: Na tāva udakanti idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Antarā pipāsitena pana
atk-vin02a3:558_1: gale vilaggāmisena vā pānīyaṃ pivitvā hatthā na dhovitabbā. Sace manussā “dhovatha
atk-vin02a3:558_2: bhante pattañca hatthe cā”ti vadanti, bhikkhū vā “tumhe udakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:559_0: Nivattantenāti bhattaggato uṭṭhāya nivattantena saṅghena evaṃ nivattitabbanti dasseti.
atk-vin02a3:559_1: Kathaṃ? “Navakehī”ti sabbaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sambādhesu hi gharesu mahātherānaṃ nikkhamanokāso
atk-vin02a3:559_2: na hoti, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ nivattantehi pana navakehi gehadvāre ṭhatvā theresu
atk-vin02a3:559_3: nikkhantesu paṭipāṭiyā gantabbaṃ. Sace pana mahātherā dhure nisinnā honti, navakā
atk-vin02a3:559_4: antogehe, therāsanato paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā eva nikkhamitabbaṃ. Kāyena kāyaṃ aghaṭṭentena
atk-vin02a3:559_5: yathā antarena manussā gantuṃ sakkonti, evaṃ viraḷāya paṭipāṭiyā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:562_0: 366. Piṇḍacārikavatte – kammaṃ vā nikkhipatīti kappāsaṃ vā suppaṃ vā musalaṃ vā yaṃ
atk-vin02a3:562_1: gahetvā kammaṃ karonti, ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā honti, taṃ nikkhipati. Na ca bhikkhādāyikāyāti
atk-vin02a3:562_2: itthī vā hotu puriso vā, bhikkhādānasamaye mukhaṃ na ulloketabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:566_0: Pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvāti ettha sace bahigāme udakaṃ natthi, antogāmeyeva bhattakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a3:566_1: katvā atha bahigāme atthi, bahigāme bhattakiccaṃ katvā patto dhovitvā vodako katvā
atk-vin02a3:567_0: Paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbanti sace bhājanāni nappahonti, pānīyameva paribhojanīyampi
atk-vin02a3:567_1: katvā upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Bhājanaṃ alabhantena veḷunāḷikāyapi upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Tampi
atk-vin02a3:567_2: alabhantassa yathā samīpe udakaāvāṭo hoti, evaṃ kātabbaṃ. Araṇisahite sati aggiṃ
atk-vin02a3:567_3: akātumpi vaṭṭati. Yathā ca āraññikassa, evaṃ kantārappaṭipannassāpi araṇisahitaṃ
atk-vin02a3:567_4: icchitabbaṃ. Gaṇavāsino pana tena vināpi vaṭṭati. Nakkhattāneva nakkhattapadāni.
atk-vin02a3:570_0: 369. Senāsanavatte – dvāraṃ nāma yasmā mahāvaḷañjaṃ, tasmā tattha āpucchanakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a3:570_1: natthi, sesāni pana uddesadānādīni āpucchitvāva kātabbāni. Devasikampi āpucchituṃ
atk-vin02a3:570_2: vaṭṭati. Athāpi “bhante āpucchitameva hotū”ti vutte vuḍḍhataro “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati,
atk-vin02a3:570_3: sayameva vā “tvaṃ yathāsukhaṃ viharāhī”ti vadati; evampi vaṭṭati. Sabhāgassa vissāsenāpi
atk-vin02a3:570_4: vaṭṭatiyeva. Yena vuḍḍho tena parivattitabbanti vuḍḍhābhimukhena parivattitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:574_0: 373. Ācamanavatthusmiṃ – sati udaketi ettha sace udakaṃ atthi, paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a3:574_1: pana natthi, bhājanena nīharitvā ācamitabbaṃ. Bhājane asati pattena nīharitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:574_2: Pattepi asati asantaṃ nāma hoti. “Idaṃ ativivaṭaṃ purato aññaṃ udakaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-vin02a3:574_3: gatassa udakaṃ alabhantasseva bhikkhācāravelā hoti, kaṭṭhena vā kenaci vā puñchitvā
atk-vin02a3:574_4: gantabbaṃ, bhuñjitumpi anumodanampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Āgatapaṭipāṭiyāti vaccakuṭiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:575_0: 374. Vaccakuṭivatte – na dantakaṭṭhaṃ khādantenāti ayaṃ vaccakuṭiyāpi avaccakuṭiyāpi
atk-vin02a3:575_1: sabbattheva paṭikkhepo. Na pharusena kaṭṭhenāti phālitakaṭṭhena vā kharena vā gaṇṭhikena
atk-vin02a3:575_2: vā kaṇṭakena vā susirena vā pūtinā vā na avalekhitabbaṃ. Avalekhanakaṭṭhaṃ pana aggahetvā
atk-vin02a3:576_0: Na ācamanasarāvaketi sabbasādhāraṇaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatra hi aññe aññe
atk-vin02a3:576_1: āgacchanti, tasmā udakaṃ na sesetabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana saṅghikepi vihāre ekadese nibaddhagamanatthāya
atk-vin02a3:576_2: kataṃ ṭhānaṃ hoti puggalikaṭṭhānaṃ vā, tasmiṃ vaṭṭati. Virecanaṃ pivitvā punappunaṃ
atk-vin02a3:577_0: Ūhatāti ūhaditā; bahi vaccamakkhitāti attho. Dhovitabbāti udakaṃ āharitvā dhovitabbā.
atk-vin02a3:577_1: Udakaṃ atthi, bhājanaṃ natthi, asantaṃ nāma hoti. Bhājanaṃ atthi, udakaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a3:577_2: etampi asantaṃ. Ubhaye pana asati asantameva, kaṭṭhena vā kenaci vā puñchitvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:582_1: nandimukhā viya ratti khāyati. Tenāha “nandimukhiyā rattiyā”ti. Antopūtinti attacittasantāne
atk-vin02a3:582_2: kilesapūtibhāvena antopūtiṃ. Avassutanti kilesavassanavasena avassutaṃ. Kasambukajātanti
atk-vin02a3:582_3: ākiṇṇadosatāya saṃkiliṭṭhajātaṃ.) Yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāmāti “aparisuddhā ānanda parisā”ti
atk-vin02a3:582_4: vacanaṃ sutvāyeva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi
atk-vin02a3:582_5: nāma so moghapuriso āgamessati, acchariyamidanti dasseti.
atk-vin02a3:583_0: 384. Na āyatakeneva papātoti na paṭhamameva gambhīro; anupubbena gambhīroti attho.
atk-vin02a3:583_1: Ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattatīti vīcīnaṃ osakkanakandaraṃ mariyādavelaṃ nātikkamati.
atk-vin02a3:583_2: Tīraṃ vāhetīti tīrato appeti; ussāretīti attho. Aññāpaṭivedhoti arahattappatti.
atk-vin02a3:584_0: 385. Channamativassatīti āpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādento aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati
atk-vin02a3:584_1: idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatīti āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vivaranto aññaṃ
atk-vin02a3:587_0: 386. Ṭhapitaṃ hoti pātimokkhanti ettha pure vā pacchā vā ṭhapitampi aṭṭhapitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a3:587_1: khette ṭhapitameva pana ṭhapitaṃ nāma hoti. Tasmā “suṇātu me, bhante saṅgho, ajjuposatho
atk-vin02a3:587_2: pannaraso, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti ettha yāva re-kāraṃ
atk-vin02a3:587_3: bhaṇati, tāva ṭhapetabbaṃ, idañhi khettaṃ. Yya-kāre pana vutte ṭhapentena pacchā
atk-vin02a3:587_4: ṭhapitaṃ nāma hoti. “Suṇātu me”ti anāraddheyeva ṭhapentena pure ṭhapitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:590_0: 387. Amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapeti akatāyāti tena puggalena sā vipatti
atk-vin02a3:590_1: katā vā hotu akatā vā, pātimokkhaṭṭhapanakassa saññāamūlikavasena amūlikā hoti. Katākatāyāti
atk-vin02a3:591_0: Dhammikaṃ sāmaggiṃ na upetīti kammaṃ kopetukāmatāya saṅghassa kamme karīyamāne neva
atk-vin02a3:591_1: āgacchati, na chandaṃ deti, sammukhībhūtova paṭikkosati, tena dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a3:591_2: Iccassāpi sāpattikasseva pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ hoti. Paccādiyatīti “puna kātabbaṃ
atk-vin02a3:591_3: kamma”nti paccādiyati, tena ukkoṭanakena pācittiyaṃ āpajjati. Iccassāpi sāpattikasseva
atk-vin02a3:594_0: 388. Yehi ākārehi yehi liṅgehi yehi nimittehīti ettha maggenamaggapaṭipādanādīsu
atk-vin02a3:594_1: ākārādisaññā veditabbā. Tena diṭṭhena tena sutena tāya parisaṅkāyāti ettha diṭṭhañca
atk-vin02a3:594_2: sutañca pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Sace pana tehi diṭṭhasutehi parisaṅkaṃ uppādeyya, taṃ
atk-vin02a3:597_0: 398. Attādānaṃ ādātukāmenāti ettha sāsanaṃ sodhetukāmo bhikkhu yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attanā
atk-vin02a3:597_1: ādiyati, taṃ attādānanti vuccati. Akālo imaṃ attādānaṃ ādātunti ettha rājabhayaṃ
atk-vin02a3:597_2: corabhayaṃ dubbhikkhabhayaṃ vassārattoti ayaṃ akālo, viparīto kālo.
atk-vin02a3:598_0: Abhūtaṃ idaṃ attādānanti asantamidaṃ, mayā adhammo vā dhammoti, dhammo vā adhammoti,
atk-vin02a3:598_1: avinayo vā vinayoti, vinayo vā avinayoti, dussīlo vā puggalo sīlavāti, sīlavā vā
atk-vin02a3:598_2: dussīloti gahitoti attho; vipariyāyena bhūtaṃ veditabbaṃ. Anatthasaṃhitaṃ idaṃ attādānanti
atk-vin02a3:598_3: ettha yaṃ jīvitantarāyāya vā brahmacariyantarāyāya vā saṃvattati, idaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:599_0: Na labhissāmi sandiṭṭhe sambhatte bhikkhūti appekadā hi rājabhayādīsu evarūpā attano
atk-vin02a3:599_1: pakkhassa upatthambhakā bhikkhū laddhuṃ na sakkā honti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “na labhissāmī”ti.
