atk-vin02a3:599_2: Appekadā pana khemasubhikkhādīsu laddhuṃ sakkā honti, taṃ sandhāya “labhissāmī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:600_0: Bhavissati saṅghassa tatonidānaṃ bhaṇḍananti kosambakānaṃ viya bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho viggaho
atk-vin02a3:600_1: vivādo saṅghabhedo ca bhavissatīti. Pacchāpi avippaṭisārakaraṃ bhavissatīti subhaddaṃ
atk-vin02a3:600_3: dasavatthuke adhikaraṇe dasabhikkhusahassāni niggahetvā sattasatikasaṅgītiṃ karontassa
atk-vin02a3:600_4: āyasmato yasasseva, saṭṭhibhikkhusahassāni niggahetvā sahassikasaṅgītiṃ karontassa
atk-vin02a3:600_5: moggaliputtatissattherasseva ca pacchā samanussaraṇakaraṇaṃ hoti, sāsanassa ca vigatupakkilesacandimasūriyasassirikatāya saṃvattati.
atk-vin02a3:603_0: 399. Acchiddena appaṭimaṃsenātiādīsu yena gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu yo koci pahaṭo vā hoti,
atk-vin02a3:603_1: gihīnaṃ gaṇḍaphālanādīni vejjakammāni vā katāni, tassa kāyasamācāro upacikāhi khāyitatālapaṇṇamiva
atk-vin02a3:603_2: chiddo ca paṭimāsituṃ yattha katthaci gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya sappaṭimaṃso
atk-vin02a3:603_3: ca hoti, viparīto acchiddo appaṭimaṃsoti veditabboti. Vacīsamācāro pana musāvādaomasavādapesuññaamūlakānuddhaṃsanādīhi
atk-vin02a3:603_4: chiddo ca sappaṭimaṃso ca hoti, viparīto acchiddo appaṭimaṃso.
atk-vin02a3:604_0: Mettaṃ nu kho me cittanti palibodhe chinditvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogena adhigataṃ
atk-vin02a3:604_1: mettacittaṃ. Anāghātanti āghātavirahitaṃ, vikkhambhanavasena vihatāghātanti attho.
atk-vin02a3:604_2: Idaṃ panāvuso kattha vuttaṃ bhagavatāti idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ katarasmiṃ nagare vuttanti attho.
atk-vin02a3:607_0: 400. Kālena vakkhāmītiādīsu eko ekaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codento kālena vadati nāma. Saṅghamajjhagaṇamajjhasalākaggayāguaggavitakkamāḷakabhikkhācāramaggaāsanasālādīsu
atk-vin02a3:607_1: upaṭṭhākehi parivāritakkhaṇe vā codento akālena vadati nāma. Tacchena vadanto bhūtena
atk-vin02a3:607_2: vadati nāma. “Ambho mahallaka, parisāvacara, paṃsukūlika, dhammakathika, patirūpaṃ
atk-vin02a3:607_3: tava ida”nti vadanto pharusena vadati nāma. Kāraṇanissitaṃ pana katvā “bhante mahallakattha,
atk-vin02a3:607_4: parisāvacarā, paṃsukūlikā, dhammakathikattha, patirūpaṃ tumhākaṃ ida”nti vadanto
atk-vin02a3:607_5: saṇhena vadati nāma. Kāraṇanissitaṃ katvā vadanto atthasaṃhitena vadati nāma. Mettacitto
atk-vin02a3:607_6: vakkhāmi no dosantaroti mettacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā vakkhāmi, na duṭṭhacitto hutvā.
atk-vin02a3:610_0: 401. Ajjhattaṃ manasikaritvāti attano citte uppādetvā. Kāruññatāti karuṇābhāvo. Iminā
atk-vin02a3:610_1: karuṇañca karuṇāpubbabhāgañca dasseti. Hitesitāti hitagavesanatā. Anukampitāti tena
atk-vin02a3:610_2: hitena saṃyojanatā. Dvīhipi mettañca mettāpubbabhāgañca dasseti. Āpattivuṭṭhānatāti
atk-vin02a3:610_3: āpattito vuṭṭhāpetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpanā. Vatthuṃ codetvā sāretvā paṭiññaṃ āropetvā
atk-vin02a3:610_4: yathāpaṭiññāya kammakaraṇaṃ vinayapurekkhāratā nāma. Ime pañca dhammeti ye ete kāruññatātiādinā
atk-vin02a3:610_5: nayena vuttā, ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ manasi karitvā paro codetabboti.
atk-vin02a3:611_0: Sacce ca akuppe cāti vacīsacce ca akuppanatāya ca. Cuditakena hi saccañca vattabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:611_1: kopo ca na kātabbo. Neva attanā kujjhitabbo, na paro ghaṭṭetabboti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a3:616_0: 402. Bhikkhunikkhandhake – alaṃ gotami mā te ruccīti kasmā paṭikkhipati, nanu sabbesampi
atk-vin02a3:616_1: buddhānaṃ catasso parisā hontīti? Kāmaṃ honti, kilametvā pana anekakkhattuṃ yācitena
atk-vin02a3:616_2: anuññātaṃ pabbajjaṃ “dukkhena laddhā ayaṃ amhehī”ti sammā paripālessantīti bhaddakaṃ
atk-vin02a3:616_3: katvā anujānitukāmo paṭikkhipati. Aṭṭhagarudhammakathā mahāvibhaṅgeyeva kathitā.
atk-vin02a3:617: 403. Kumbhathenakehīti kumbhe dīpaṃ jāletvā tena ālokena paraghare bhaṇḍaṃ vicinitvā thenakacorehi.
atk-vin02a3:618: Setaṭṭhikā nāma rogajātīti eko pāṇako nāḷimajjhagataṃ kaṇḍaṃ vijjhati, yena viddhattā nikkhantampi sālisīsaṃ khīraṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-vin02a3:619_0: Mañjiṭṭhikā nāma rogajātīti ucchūnaṃ antorattabhāvo. Mahato taḷākassa paṭikacceva
atk-vin02a3:619_1: āḷinti iminā pana etamatthaṃ dasseti – yathā mahato taḷākassa āḷiyā abaddhāyapi kiñci
atk-vin02a3:619_2: udakaṃ tiṭṭheyya, paṭhamameva baddhāya pana yaṃ abaddhapaccayā na tiṭṭheyya, tampi
atk-vin02a3:619_3: tiṭṭheyya; evameva ye ime anuppanne vatthusmiṃ paṭikacceva avītikkamanatthāya garudhammā
atk-vin02a3:619_4: paññattā. Tesu apaññattesupi mātugāmassa pabbajitattā pañceva vassasatāni saddhammo
atk-vin02a3:619_5: tiṭṭheyya. Paṭikacceva paññattattā pana aparānipi pañcavassasatāni ṭhassatīti evaṃ
atk-vin02a3:619_6: paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ vassasahassameva ṭhassatīti. Vassasahassanti cetaṃ paṭisambhidāpabhedappattakhīṇāsavavaseneva
atk-vin02a3:619_7: vuttaṃ. Tato pana uttarimpi sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena vassasahassaṃ, anāgāmivasena
atk-vin02a3:619_8: vassasahassaṃ, sakadāgāmivasena vassasahassaṃ, sotāpannavasena vassasahassanti evaṃ
atk-vin02a3:619_9: pañcavassasahassāni paṭivedhasaddhammo ṭhassati. Pariyattidhammopi tāniyeva. Na hi
atk-vin02a3:619_10: pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthi, nāpi pariyattiyā sati paṭivedho na hoti; liṅgaṃ
atk-vin02a3:622_0: 404. Anujānāmi bhikkhave bhikkhūhi bhikkhuniyo upasampādetunti imāya anupaññattiyā
atk-vin02a3:622_1: bhikkhū pañcasatā sākiyāniyo mahāpajāpatiyā saddhivihāriniyo katvā upasampādesuṃ.
atk-vin02a3:622_2: Iti tā sabbāpi ekatoupasampannā nāma ahesuṃ. Ye kho tvaṃ gotamīti iminā ovādena gotamī arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-vin02a3:623: 409. Kammaṃ na karīyatīti tajjanīyādi sattavidhampi kammaṃ na karīyati. Khamāpentīti na puna evaṃ karissāmīti khamāpenti.
atk-vin02a3:624_0: 410. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnaṃ kammaṃ ropetvā niyyādetunti ettha
atk-vin02a3:624_1: tajjanīyādīsu “idaṃ nāma kammaṃ etissā kātabba”nti evaṃ ropetvā “taṃ dāni tumheva
atk-vin02a3:624_2: karothā”ti niyyādetabbaṃ. Sace pana aññasmiṃ ropite aññaṃ karonti, “tajjanīyakammārahassa
atk-vin02a3:624_3: niyassakammaṃ karotī”ti ettha vuttanayena kāretabbataṃ āpajjanti.
atk-vin02a3:625_0: 411. Kaddamodakenāti ettha na kevalaṃ kaddamodakena, vippasannaudakarajanakaddamādīsupi
atk-vin02a3:625_1: yena kenaci osiñcantassa dukkaṭameva. Avandiyo so bhikkhave bhikkhu bhikkhunisaṅghena
atk-vin02a3:625_2: kātabboti bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitvā “asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apasādanīyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:625_3: dasseti, etassa ayyassa avandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatī”ti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ sāvetabbaṃ. Ettāvatā
atk-vin02a3:625_4: avandiyo kato hoti. Tato paṭṭhāya yathā sāmaṇere disvā na vandanti; evameva disvāpi
atk-vin02a3:625_5: na vanditabbo. Tena bhikkhunā sammā vattantena bhikkhunupassayaṃ āgantvā vihāreyeva
atk-vin02a3:625_6: saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā ekapuggalaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā
atk-vin02a3:625_7: “bhikkhunisaṅgho mayhaṃ khamatū”ti khamāpetabbaṃ. Tena bhikkhunā bhikkhunīnaṃ santikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:625_8: āgantvā “eso bhikkhu tumhe khamāpetī”ti vattabbaṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya so vanditabbo. Ayamettha
atk-vin02a3:626_0: Obhāsentīti asaddhammena obhāsenti. Bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ sampayojentīti bhikkhunīhi
atk-vin02a3:626_1: saddhiṃ purise asaddhammena sampayojenti. Avandiyakaraṇaṃ vuttanayameva. Āvaraṇanti
atk-vin02a3:626_2: vihārappavesane nivāraṇaṃ. Ovādaṃ ṭhapetunti ettha na bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā ṭhapetabbo.
atk-vin02a3:626_3: Ovādatthāya pana āgatā bhikkhuniyo vattabbā “asukā nāma bhikkhunī sāpattikā, tassā
atk-vin02a3:626_4: ovādaṃ ṭhapemi, mā tāya saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karitthā”ti. Kāyavivaraṇādīsupi daṇḍakammaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-vin02a3:627: 413. Na bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā ovādo na gantabbotiādi bhikkhunivibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
atk-vin02a3:628: 416. Phāsukā namentīti gihidārikāyo viya ghanapaṭṭakena kāyabandhanena phāsukā namanatthāya bandhanti. Ekapariyākatanti ekavāraṃ parikkhipanakaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:629_0: Vilīvena paṭṭenāti saṇhehi veḷuvilīvehi katapaṭṭena. Dussapaṭṭenāti setavatthapaṭṭena.
atk-vin02a3:629_1: Dussaveṇiyāti dussena kataveṇiyā. Dussavaṭṭiyāti dussena katavaṭṭiyā. Coḷapaṭṭādīsu
atk-vin02a3:630_0: Aṭṭhillenāti gojaṅghaṭṭhikena. Jaghananti kaṭippadeso vuccati. Hatthaṃ koṭṭāpentīti
atk-vin02a3:630_1: aggabāhaṃ koṭṭāpetvā morapattādīhi cittālaṅkāraṃ karonti. Hatthakocchanti piṭṭhihatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:631_0: 417. Mukhalimpanādīni vuttanayāneva. Avaṅgaṃ karontīti akkhī añjantiyo avaṅgadese
atk-vin02a3:631_1: adhomukhaṃ lekhaṃ karonti. Visesakanti gaṇḍappadese vicitrasaṇṭhānaṃ visesakaṃ karonti.
atk-vin02a3:631_2: Olokentīti vātapānaṃ vivaritvā vīthiṃ olokenti. Sāloke tiṭṭhantīti dvāraṃ vivaritvā
atk-vin02a3:631_3: upaḍḍhakāyaṃ dassentiyo tiṭṭhanti. Naccanti naṭasamajjaṃ kārenti. Vesiṃ vuṭṭhāpentīti
atk-vin02a3:631_4: gaṇikaṃ vuṭṭhāpenti. Pānāgāraṃ ṭhapentīti suraṃ vikkiṇanti. Sūnaṃ ṭhapentīti maṃsaṃ
atk-vin02a3:631_5: vikkiṇanti. Āpaṇanti nānābhaṇḍānaṃ anekavidhaṃ āpaṇaṃ pasārenti. Dāsaṃ upaṭṭhāpentīti
atk-vin02a3:631_6: dāsaṃ gahetvā tena attano veyyāvaccaṃ kārenti. Dāsīādīsupi eseva nayo. Haritakapakkikaṃ
atk-vin02a3:631_7: pakiṇantīti haritakañceva pakkañca pakiṇanti; pakiṇṇakāpaṇaṃ pasārentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:633_0: 419. Bhikkhunī ce, bhikkhave, kālaṃ karontītiādīsu ayaṃ pāḷimuttakavinicchayo – sace
atk-vin02a3:633_1: hi pañcasu sahadhammikesu yo koci kālaṃ karonto “mamaccayena mayhaṃ parikkhāro upajjhāyassa
atk-vin02a3:633_2: hotu, ācariyassa hotu, saddhivihārikassa hotu, antevāsikassa hotu, mātu hotu, pitu
atk-vin02a3:633_3: hotu, aññassa vā yassa kassaci hotū”ti vadati tesaṃ na hoti, saṅghasseva hoti. Na
atk-vin02a3:633_4: hi pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ accayadānaṃ ruhati, gihīnaṃ pana ruhati. Bhikkhu hi
atk-vin02a3:633_5: bhikkhunivihāre kālaṃ karoti, tassa parikkhāro bhikkhūnaṃyeva hoti. Bhikkhunī bhikkhuvihāre
atk-vin02a3:633_6: kālaṃ karoti, tassā parikkhāro bhikkhunīnaṃyeva hoti.
atk-vin02a3:634_0: 420. Purāṇamallīti purāṇe gihikāle mallakassa bhariyā. Purisabyañjananti purisanimittaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:634_1: chinnaṃ vā hotu acchinnaṃ vā, paṭicchannaṃ vā appaṭicchannaṃ vā. Sace etasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-vin02a3:635_0: 421. Attano paribhogatthāya dinnaṃ nāma yaṃ “tumheyeva paribhuñjathā”ti vatvā dinnaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:635_1: taṃ aññassa dadato dukkaṭaṃ. Aggaṃ gahetvā pana dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace asappāyaṃ, sabbaṃ
atk-vin02a3:635_2: apanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Cīvaraṃ ekāhaṃ vā dvīhaṃ vā paribhuñjitvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Pattādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a3:636_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhiṃ bhikkhunīhi paṭiggāhāpetvāti hiyyo paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitamaṃsaṃ
atk-vin02a3:636_1: ajja aññasmiṃ anupasampanne asati bhikkhūhi paṭiggāhāpetvā bhikkhunīhi paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:636_2: Bhikkhūhi paṭiggahitañhi bhikkhunīnaṃ appaṭiggahitakaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, bhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-vin02a3:637: 426. Āsanaṃ saṃkasāyantiyo kālaṃ vītināmesunti aññaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā aññaṃ nisīdāpentiyo bhojanakālaṃ atikkāmesuṃ.
atk-vin02a3:638_0: Aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yathāvuḍḍhanti ettha sace pure aṭṭhasu nisinnāsu tāsaṃ abbhantarimā
atk-vin02a3:638_1: aññā āgacchati, sā attano navakaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā nisīdituṃ labhati. Yā pana aṭṭhahipi
atk-vin02a3:638_2: navakatarā, sā sacepi saṭṭhivassā hoti, āgatapaṭipāṭiyāva nisīdituṃ labhati. Aññattha
atk-vin02a3:638_3: sabbattha yathāvuḍḍhaṃ na paṭibāhitabbanti ṭhapetvā bhattaggaṃ aññasmiṃ catupaccayabhājanīyaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a3:638_4: “ahaṃ pubbe āgatā”ti vuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhitvā kiñci na gahetabbaṃ; yathāvuḍḍhameva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:640_0: 430. Dūtena upasampadā dasannaṃ antarāyānaṃ yena kenaci vaṭṭati. Kammavācāpariyosāne
atk-vin02a3:640_1: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunupassaye ṭhitā vā hotu nipannā vā jāgarā vā niddaṃ okkantā vā,
atk-vin02a3:640_2: upasampannāva hoti. Tāvadeva chāyādīni āgatāya dūtabhikkhuniyā ācikkhitabbāni.
atk-vin02a3:641: 431. Udositoti bhaṇḍasālā. Na sammatīti nappahoti. Upassayanti gharaṃ. Navakammanti saṅghassatthāya bhikkhuniyā navakammampi kātuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:642: 432. Tassā pabbajitāyāti tassā pabbajitakāle. Yāva so dārako viññutaṃ pāpuṇātīti yāva khādituṃ bhuñjituṃ nahāyituñca maṇḍituñca attano dhammatāya sakkotīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:643_0: Ṭhapetvā sāgāranti sahagāraseyyamattaṃ ṭhapetvā. Yathā aññasmiṃ purise; evaṃ dutiyikāya
atk-vin02a3:643_1: bhikkhuniyā tasmiṃ dārake paṭipajjitabbanti dasseti. Mātā pana nahāpetuṃ pāyetuṃ
atk-vin02a3:643_2: bhojetuṃ maṇḍetuṃ ure katvā sayituñca labhati.
atk-vin02a3:644_0: 434. Yadeva sā vibbhantāti yasmā sā vibbhantā attano ruciyā khantiyā odātāni vatthāni
atk-vin02a3:644_1: nivatthā, tasmāyeva sā abhikkhunī, na sikkhāpaccakkhānenāti dasseti. Sā puna upasampadaṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a3:645: Sā āgatā na upasampādetabbāti na kevalaṃ na upasampādetabbā, pabbajjampi na labhati. Odātāni gahetvā vibbhantā pana pabbajjāmattaṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a3:646_0: Abhivādanantiādīsu purisā pāde sambāhantā vandanti, kese chindanti, nakhe chindanti,
atk-vin02a3:646_1: vaṇapaṭikammaṃ karonti, taṃ sabbaṃ kukkuccāyantā na sādiyantīti attho. Tatreke ācariyā
atk-vin02a3:646_2: “sace ekato vā ubhato vā avassutā honti sārattā, yathāvatthukameva”. Eke ācariyā
atk-vin02a3:646_3: “natthi ettha āpattī”ti vadanti. Evaṃ ācariyavādaṃ dassetvā idaṃ odissa anuññātaṃ
atk-vin02a3:646_4: vaṭṭatīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Taṃ pamāṇaṃ. “Anujānāmi bhikkhave sāditu”nti hi vacaneneva taṃ kappiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:647_0: 435. Pallaṅkena nisīdantīti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdanti. Aḍḍhapallaṅkanti ekaṃ
atk-vin02a3:647_1: pādaṃ ābhujitvā katapallaṅkaṃ. Heṭṭhā vivaṭe upari paṭicchanneti ettha sace kūpo
atk-vin02a3:647_2: khato hoti, upari pana padaramattameva sabbadisāsu paññāyati, evarūpepi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a3:648: 436. Kukkusaṃ mattikanti kuṇḍakañceva mattikañca. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a3:653_0: 441. Pañcasatikakkhandhake – cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā avasesāni khuddānukhuddakānīti
atk-vin02a3:653_1: evamādi ekasikkhāpadampi apariccajitvā sabbesaṃ saṅgahetabbabhāvadassanatthaṃ pariyāyena
atk-vin02a3:653_2: vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vo samaṇānanti idaṃ samaṇānaṃ. Padapūraṇamatte vokāro.
atk-vin02a3:654_0: 443. Idampi te āvuso ānanda dukkaṭanti “idaṃ tayā duṭṭhu kata”nti kevalaṃ garahantehi
atk-vin02a3:654_1: therehi vuttaṃ, na āpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi te āpattānāpattiṃ na jānanti. Idāneva
atk-vin02a3:654_2: cetaṃ anussāvitaṃ – “saṅgho apaññattaṃ na paññapeti, paññattaṃ na samucchindatī”ti.
atk-vin02a3:654_3: Desehi taṃ dukkaṭanti idampi ca “āma, bhante, duṭṭhu mayā kata”nti evaṃ paṭijānāhi,
atk-vin02a3:654_4: taṃ dukkaṭanti idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na āpattidesanaṃ. Thero pana yasmā asatiyā na
atk-vin02a3:654_5: pucchi na anādarena, tasmā tattha duṭṭhukatabhāvampi asallakkhento “nāhaṃ taṃ dukkaṭaṃ
atk-vin02a3:654_6: passāmī”ti vatvā theresu gāravaṃ dassento “apicāyasmantānaṃ sandhāya desemi taṃ dukkaṭa”nti
atk-vin02a3:654_7: āha. Yathā tumhe vadatha, tathā paṭijānāmīti vuttaṃ hoti. Eseva nayo avasesesu catūsu
atk-vin02a3:654_8: ṭhānesu. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ nidānavaṇṇanāyameva vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:659: 446. Sattasatikakkhandhake – bhikkhaggenāti bhikkhuaggena, bhikkhū gaṇetvā tattake paṭivīse ṭhapesunti attho. Mahiyāti himapātasamaye himavalāhakā.
atk-vin02a3:660_0: 447. Avijjānivuṭāti avijjāpaṭicchannā. Posāti purisā. Piyarūpaṃ abhinandanti patthentīti
atk-vin02a3:660_1: piyarūpābhinandino. Aviddasūti avijānantā. Rāgarajehi sarajā. Magasadisāti magā.
atk-vin02a3:660_2: Saha nettiyāti sanettikā. Vaḍḍhenti kaṭasinti punappunaṃ kaḷevaraṃ nikkhipamānā bhūmiṃ
atk-vin02a3:660_3: vaḍḍhenti. Evaṃ vaḍḍhentāva ghoraṃ ādiyanti punabbhavaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:661: 454. Pāpakaṃ no āvuso katanti āvuso amhehi pāpakaṃ katanti attho.
atk-vin02a3:662: 455. Katamena tvaṃ bhūmi vihārenāti ettha bhūmīti piyavacanametaṃ. Piyaṃ vattukāmo kira āyasmā sabbakāmī navake bhikkhū evaṃ āmanteti. Kullakavihārenāti uttānavihārena.
atk-vin02a3:663_0: 457. Sāvatthiyā suttavibhaṅgeti kathaṃ suttavibhaṅge paṭikkhittaṃ hoti? Tatra hi
atk-vin02a3:663_1: “sannidhi nāma ajja paṭiggahitaṃ aparajjū”ti vatvā puna “sannidhikārake asannidhikārakasaññī
atk-vin02a3:663_2: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā āpatti pācittiyassā”ti āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a3:663_3: vadantena paṭikkhittaṃ hoti. Tatreke maññanti “yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:663_4: vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti hi vuttaṃ, idañca loṇaṃ nāma yāvajīvikattā sannidhibhāvaṃ nāpajjati.
atk-vin02a3:663_5: Yampi aloṇakaṃ āmisaṃ paṭiggahetvā tena saddhiṃ paribhuñjati, taṃ tadahupaṭiggahitameva,
atk-vin02a3:663_6: tasmā “‘yāvakālikena, bhikkhave, yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappati, vikāle
atk-vin02a3:663_7: na kappatī’ti vacanato dukkaṭenettha bhavitabba”nti. Te vattabbā – “tumhākaṃ matena
atk-vin02a3:663_8: dukkaṭenapi na bhavitabbaṃ, na hi ettha yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ, yāvakālikameva
atk-vin02a3:663_9: tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ, na ca taṃ vikāle paribhuttaṃ. Yadi vā “vikāle na kappatī”ti vacanena
atk-vin02a3:663_10: tumhe dukkaṭaṃ maññetha, yāvajīvikamissaṃ yāvakālikaṃ vikāle bhuñjantassa vikālabhojanapācittiyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:663_11: na bhaveyya. Tasmā na byañjanamattaṃ gahetabbaṃ, attho upaparikkhitabbo.
atk-vin02a3:664_0: Ayañhettha attho – yāvakālikena yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ yadi sambhinnarasaṃ
atk-vin02a3:664_1: hoti, yāvakālikagatikameva hoti. Tasmā “yo pana bhikkhu vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ
atk-vin02a3:664_2: vā”ti iminā sikkhāpadena kāle kappati, vikāle na kappati. Na idha “na kappatī”ti
atk-vin02a3:664_3: vacanamattenettha dukkaṭaṃ hoti. Yatheva yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ yāvakālikena
atk-vin02a3:664_4: sambhinnarasaṃ vikāle na kappati, vikālabhojanapācittiyāvahaṃ hoti. Evaṃ ajja paṭiggahitampi
atk-vin02a3:664_5: aparajju yāvakālikena sambhinnarasaṃ na kappati, sannidhibhojanapācittiyāvahaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a3:664_6: Taṃ “sannidhikataṃ ida”nti ajānantopi na muccati. Vuttañhetaṃ – “sannidhikārake asannidhikārakasaññī
atk-vin02a3:664_7: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā āpatti pācittiyassā”ti. Tasmā
atk-vin02a3:664_8: “kattha paṭikkhitta”nti imissā pucchāya “parisuddhamidaṃ byākaraṇaṃ sāvatthiyā suttavibhaṅge”ti.
atk-vin02a3:665_0: Rājagahe uposathasaṃyutteti idaṃ “na bhikkhave ekasmiṃ āvāse dve uposathāgārāni sammannitabbāni;
atk-vin02a3:665_1: yo sammanneyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti etaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vinayātisāre dukkaṭanti
atk-vin02a3:665_2: “na bhikkhave ekasmiṃ āvāse dve uposathāgārāni sammannitabbānī”ti etassa vinayassa
atk-vin02a3:665_3: atisāre dukkaṭaṃ. Campeyyake vinayavatthusminti idaṃ “adhammena ce bhikkhave vaggakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a3:665_4: akammaṃ na ca karaṇīya”nti evamādiṃ katvā campeyyakkhandhake āgataṃ vinayavatthuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a3:666_0: Ekacco kappatīti idaṃ dhammikaṃ āciṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Chedanake pācittiyanti suttavibhaṅge
atk-vin02a3:666_1: hi “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti āgataṃ, tasmā dvinnaṃ sugatavidatthīnaṃ upari
atk-vin02a3:666_2: dasāyeva vidatthimattā labbhati. Dasāya vinā taṃ pamāṇaṃ karontassa idaṃ āgatameva
atk-vin02a3:666_3: hoti – “taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiya”nti. Tasmā “kiṃ āpajjatī”ti puṭṭho
atk-vin02a3:666_4: “chedanake pācittiya”nti āha. Chedanakasikkhāpade vuttapācittiyaṃ āpajjatīti attho.
atk-vin02a3:672: Yā tesaṃ vaṇṇanā esā, antarāyaṃ vinā yathā;
atk-vin02a3:673: Siddhā sijjhantu kalyāṇā, evaṃ āsāpi pāṇinanti.
